98b1(mdo sde): brgya dang ldan pa sbyin pa byin pa dang /de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs
98b2(mdo sde): pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig lnga nyin gtsog zan cig byin na/'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do//'jam dpal rigs/
98b3(mdo sde): kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gong la le zhig gis bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten
98b4(mdo sde): gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/'jam dpal
98b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'bri ba dang /yi ger 'brir 'jug pa dang /klog pa 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams
98b6(mdo sde): grangs med par skyed do//bzlog ste bsti stang ma byas pa'i mi dge ba'i las kyang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o//phyugs kyi shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang /rta'i shing rta lta bus
98b7(mdo sde): 'gro ba dang /glang po che'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang /zla ba dang nyi ma'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang /nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'ang de bzhin te/'jam
99a1(mdo sde): dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i
99a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi bar chad byas pa bas 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gos de bzhin gshegs
99a3(mdo sde): pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad byed cing khro ba dang /brnyas
99a4(mdo sde): pa'i sems skyed na/'di ni de bos chos bsod nams ma yin pa grangs med par skyed do//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis
99a5(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'o 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi mig phyung nas bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs
99a6(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa'i sems bskyed pa gshe ba dang /mi snyan par smra ba dang /snyogs par byed na/'di ni de bas
99a7(mdo sde): ches sdig pa mang du skyed do//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la rkyen ci'ang rung bas bsnyas pa
99b1(mdo sde): skyed de spyos na/de mi dge ba'i las des sems can dmyal ba ngu 'bod chen por lus dpag tshad lnga brgya par skye bar 'gyur te/de la mgo lnga brgya yod par 'gyur ro//de'i
99b2(mdo sde): mgo re re la'ang kha lnga brgya lnga brgya yod par 'gyur/de'i kha re re la'ang lce lnga brgya lnga brgya yod par 'gyur te/lho re ra la'ang gshol lnga brgya lnga brgya rmo bar 'gyur
99b3(mdo sde): ro//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gi sa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su skyes pa'i sems can thams
99b4(mdo sde): cad la dbyug pa dang mtshon gyis bsnun te bdeg pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la
99b5(mdo sde): brnyas pa'i sems bskyed nas khro ba dang /gnod sems dang /tha ba dang /khros pa'i sems skyed na/'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed do//'jam dpal
99b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis sdang ba'i sems kyis sems can rnams la gnod par 'dod cing /'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye
99b7(mdo sde): ma snyed dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang /gling re re ni dgra bcom pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi srog gcad pa dang /rin po che'i mchod rten rin po che'i
100a1(mdo sde): thams bcamams sa nanathams ma.a ma can thas mthathas mthamatham thamamamanamamamaman aH /mamaHmamama.am ma yas thas bam
100a2(mdo sde): stegs busna yongs su bskor cing gdugs dang /rgyul mtshan dang /lha'i ba dan btsugs pa gAng+gA'i klung gi bye ma skyed dgu bshig pa bas/'jam
100a3(mdo sde): dpal rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po nyid la sgro btags te brnyas pa'i
100a4(mdo sde): sems bskyed nas rkyen ni'ang rung /khro ba dang /gshe ba dang /mi snyan par zer ba dang /khyod du gsod par byed na/'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par
100a5(mdo sde): skyed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' las de bzhin gshegs pa nges par 'byung ba'i phyir te/de ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs gcod pa'i phyir zhugs
100a6(mdo sde): po yin no//gang byang chub sems dpa' la skur pa des chos sbyangs pa yin no//chos kyang gzhan la chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan
100a7(mdo sde): ma yin te/byang chub sems dpa' nyid chos so//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gung la la zhig khros nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
100a8(mdo sde): khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad btson ra mun gnag dag tu bcug pa bas/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la khros te/byang chub
100b1(mdo sde): snyoms dpa' la rgyab kyis phyogs shing 'dug nas ma rungs pa 'dim blta'o zhes zer na/'di ni de las rgyas sdig pa grangs med par spyad do//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/
100b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' ji lta
100b3(mdo sde): bu'ang rung ba la smad na/'din de bas sa sdig pa grangs med par skyed do//'jam dpal 'di lta ste/dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyis 'odi lta ste/mtho ba dang /
100b4(mdo sde): pa dang che bas rI thams cad zil gyis mnon nas lham me/lhan no/lhung nge'o//'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri la mos
100b5(mdo sde): pas kyang /'di lta ste/mtho ba dang /yangs pa dang /tsho bas phyogs bcu dag na byang chub sems dpe'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta ma mos pa/'jig rten
100b6(mdo sde): khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed yod pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa lnga las byung ba/bskam pa grangs med par bsags pa zil gyis mnan nas l+h+wam mo//
100b7(mdo sde): lhan ne/lhang nge'o//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang le la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams
101a1(mdo sde): cad byang chub kyi sems la bkod pa byas/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis phung po med pa'i gzhi la mos na/
101a2(mdo sde): 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do//'jam dpal gal te sems can thams cad phung po med pa'i gzhi la mos par gyur pa bas 'jam dpal
101a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri la mos pa/mos nus kyang yi ger 'dri ba dang /yi ger 'dir 'jug pa dang /klog
101a4(mdo sde): pa dang /klog du 'jug pa dang /tha ni glegs bam du bris bya la mos nas 'dzin par byed cing mar me dang /me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /
101a5(mdo sde): byug pa rnams kyis mchod pa bskyed na/'di ni de bas chos bsod nams grangs med par skyed do//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig
101a6(mdo sde): gos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dag/nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang
101a7(mdo sde): dag por zhugs pa re re'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhal du med pa grangs med pa rnams dang /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang /
101b1(mdo sde): lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chud bsan pa bas/gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa bu gcig chud zos par byasmra na/'di ni de bas
101b2(mdo sde): chos sdig pa grangs med par skyed na/gshe ba dang /mi snyan par smra ba lta ci smos/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la lo zhig gis mchod
101b3(mdo sde): rten gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dog bshig pa dang /bsregs pa bas/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub
101b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' la gnod sems dang /tha ba dang /khro ba'i sems bskyed de/gshe ba dang mi snyan par smras na/'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa ro skyed do///
101b5(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nges par byung la/sangs rgyas las mchod rten rnams byung zhing /songs
101b6(mdo sde): rgyas las 'jig rten thams cad dang /lha'i ris thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad byung la/sangs rgyas kyang byang chub sems dpa' las byung
101b7(mdo sde): bos na/byang chub sems dpa' la bsti stang ma byas pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad la bsti stang ma byas pa yin no//byang chub sems dpa' la bsti stang byas pa
102a1(mdo sde): ni sangs rgyas thams cad la bsti stang byas pa yin no//sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa bla na med pas mchod pa byed 'dod pas byang chub sems
102a2(mdo sde): dpa' rnams mchod par bya'o//'jam dpal gal te grong khyer la la zhig na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya'am/bye ba stong ngam/bye ba brgya stong ngam/gzhal
102a3(mdo sde): du med pa grangs med pa dag yod la/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma mos na de dag gi las ni rgyal po 'khrug par 'gyur ba 'am/chus 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i
102a4(mdo sde): las sam/chom rkun gyis 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las sam/mu ges 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las sam/mos 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las sA ma/kla
102a5(mdo sde): klos 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las su 'gyur ro//grong khyer chen po de na chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yod na de'i las ni bskal ba
102a6(mdo sde): grangs med par mtshams med pa'i gnas su skye bar mi 'gyur/grong khyer der 'khrug par mi 'gyur ro//gal te byang chub sems dpa' de dag las rgyal
102a7(mdo sde): po 'khrug par 'gyur ba mi 'byung /chus 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung /chom rkun gyi 'khrug par mi 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung /mu ges 'khrug
102b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung /mes 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung /kla klos 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i
102b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i las bskal pa rgya mtsho grangs med par sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yi dgas su skye bar 'gyur ba yod na der 'khrug par 'gyur ro///
102b3(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i las bskal pa grangs med/brjod du med par mtshams med par skye bar 'gyur ba dang /de'i las bskal pa bcu dang /nyi shu dang /sum
102b4(mdo sde): cus ngan song myong bar 'gyur ba'ang tshe 'di la myong ste/'khrug par byang bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bsod nams chen po'i tshogs bsags pa'i phyir ro///
102b5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/dper na brgyar dpag tshad brgya pa'i rdzing yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang pa la dug srang stong yang mi 'dug par 'gyur ro//de
102b6(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/chu'i phung po chen pos rab tu phye ba'i phyir ro//de bzhin du bskol pa grangs med par sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yi dwags kyi
102b7(mdo sde): nang du gnas par 'gyur ba'i las rab tu mang ba'ang rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa'i phyir ro///
103a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag dang /byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa dpag tu med grangs
103a2(mdo sde): med pa rnams dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten ya rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
103a3(mdo sde): 'phags pa dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /
103a4(mdo sde): zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sngos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//rgya gar skad du/Ur+yA ni ya ta oM ni ya ta ga ti mu drA a bi tA ra~M nA ma ma
103a5(mdo sde): hA yA na sU tra/bode skad du/'phags pa nges pa dang ma nges par 'gro ba'i phyag rgya la 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//sangs rgyas dang byang chub
103a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la
103a7(mdo sde): dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu la 'di lta ste/'jam dpal gzhon
103b1(mdo sde): nur gyur pa dang /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /mthu chen thob dang /sman gyi rgyal po dang /sman gyi yang dag 'phags dang /mchod rten mngon par bsgrags
103b2(mdo sde): ba'i sgra skad rgyal po dang /de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu thams cad kyang rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi
103b3(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa/zab cing brtan pa'i chu'i rgya mtsho'i dus rlobs kyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa/dbang bskur ba'i gzungs thob pa/sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog
103b4(mdo sde): mtha' yab pa yongs su 'grub pa'i gzungs thob pa sho stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di
103b5(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya gang gis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges te/
103b6(mdo sde): na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir log por 'gyur ba'o//byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges te/bla
103b7(mdo sde): na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir mi ldog pa'o zhes bgyi bar bdag gis 'tshal bar 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nges pa dang ma nges par 'gro ba'i
104a1(mdo sde): phyag rgya la 'jug pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon
104a2(mdo sde): nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni lnga po 'di dag yin te/lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste/phyugs kyi shing
104a3(mdo sde): rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang /glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang /zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu dang /nyin thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu dang /de bzhin gshegs
104a4(mdo sde): pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu ste/'jam dpal lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba yin no//'jam dpal de la byang chub sems dpa' gnyis
104a5(mdo sde): ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges pa'i 'gro ba pa yin no//byang chub sems dpa' gsum ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
104a6(mdo sde): tu nges pa'i 'gro ba pa yin no//'jam dpal gyis gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma
104a7(mdo sde): nges pa'i 'gro ba pa bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las slar ldog pa dag gang legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal byang chub sems
104b1(mdo sde): dpa' phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang /glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu yin te/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' 'di gnyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par
104b2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges te/bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir ldog pa yin no//'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu pa
104b3(mdo sde): dang /byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi 'gro ba lta bu ba 'di gsum
104b4(mdo sde): ni bla na mong pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges te/bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir mi ldog pa yin no//'jim dpal ji ltar byang chub sems
104b5(mdo sde): dpa' phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu po yin par rig par bya zhe na/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/dper ni skyes bu la la zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga brgya'i rdul phra rab
104b6(mdo sde): kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams 'da' bar 'dod lo/der yang de'i bya ba dang /bya ba chen po dang /don dang /don chen po dang /ched tsho ba dang /chad
104b7(mdo sde): chung ba gcig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis gzhon pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo//de'ang 'di snyam
105a1(mdo sde): du dpyod de/ma la bdag phyugs kyi shing rtal zhon la 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya gor ma chug snum ste/'jam dpal mi de phyugs kyi
105a2(mdo sde): shing rta la zhon te/lam der zhugs nas/de yun ring zhing dus ring mo zhig na dpag tshad brgyar phyin pa las/de rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen pos de nas bzlog nas dpag
105a3(mdo sde): tshad brgyad cur phyir deng de phul na 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems mi des bskal pa gcig gam/bskal pa brgya 'am/bsgral pa stong ngam/bskal pa bye
105a4(mdo sde): ba phrag 'bum mo ma/bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjid du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' ba 'am/'jig rten gyi khams gcig
105a5(mdo sde): 'da' bar nus sam/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni gnas ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das de ni skabs ma mchis te/phyugs
105a6(mdo sde): kyi shing tAl 'tshal ba'i mi des bskal pa gcig gam/bskal pa brgya 'am/bskal pa spyong ngam/bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum mam/bskal pa brjod
105a7(mdo sde): du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus pa de ni gnas ma mchis legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
105b1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la theg
105b2(mdo sde): pa chen po mi 'dzin mi klog par nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas te/nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la snyan cing sten la bsnyon bkur byed cing de dog dang lhan
105b3(mdo sde): cig tu 'dris par byed la kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed la/kun dga' ra ba 'am/gtsug lag khang ngam/'chag sar spyod yul mthun par gnas par byed //
105b4(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi theg pa klog cing kha ton byed/dpyod cing khong du chud par byed la gzhan dag kyang klog tu 'jug pa nas khong du chud pa'i bar du byed na/de nyan thos kyi theg
105b5(mdo sde): pa 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des shes rab rtul por 'gyur te/bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir 'dren cing phyir zlog go/
105b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po shes rab kyi mig gang yin pa de'adra de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing
105b7(mdo sde): 'chang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des rtul por byed cing nyams par byed do//'jam dpal dper na mi la la zhig mig nad kyi mig
106a1(mdo sde): zum par gyur nas/de mig dbye ba dang mthong du rung bar bya ba'i phyir zla bu gcig gi bar drung byed byas te/zla ba gcig lon nas mig 'byid cing
106a2(mdo sde): 'dzums par byed pa las/de'i dgra 'am/mi mdza' ba gzhan zhig gis pi pi ling gi phye ma spar gang gis migo bkang nas de'ang long bar byas pa de bzhin du/
106a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po shes rab kyi mig gang yin pa de 'ong de nyan thos kyi theg
106a4(mdo sde): pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bu bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des rdul por byed cing nyams par byed de/'jam dpal 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
106a5(mdo sde): phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o//'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig
106a6(mdo sde): par bya zhe na/'jam dpal dper na mi la la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/drir yang de'i bya ba dang /bye ba chen po dang /don dang //
106a7(mdo sde): don chen po dang /ched che ba dang /ched che rab cig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi gzhon pa ji lta bu zhig gos 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da'
106b1(mdo sde): bar bya snyam mo//de'ang 'di snyam du spyod do/ma la bdag glang po che'i shing rta yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa la zhon te 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya gor ma chug
106b2(mdo sde): snyam nas/'jam dpal mi dri glang po che'i shing rta yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa la zhon te lamader zhugs nas/de lo brgyas dpag tshad nyis stong du son po las rlung gi
106b3(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor chen pos de nas phyir phul te bzlog na/'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/glang po che'i shing rta la zhon pos mi des bskal pa gcig gam/bskal pa brgya
106b4(mdo sde): 'am/bskal pa stong ngam/bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum mam/bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'dra' bar nus
106b5(mdo sde): sam/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni gnas ma mchis legs so//bcom ldan 'das de ni skabs ma mchis te/glang po che'i shing rta 'tshal
106b6(mdo sde): ba'i mi nges bskal pa gcig gam/bskal pa brgya'am/bskal pa stong ngam/bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum mam/bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang
106b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus pa de ni gnas ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu
107a1(mdo sde): sa slo lal ga/na myo pa nga ga par drug byung chub sems pa rgyun rgyas ga d+ma kun drug
107a2(mdo sde): ga pa d+magal ste ban byed cing ga da na ga kho ni d+hI ni kyi ba byu/
107a3(mdo sde): spyod na po na byus ga ga bye/phyu rgyu po skyed
107a4(mdo sde): g-i d+hA g+hu Sh+ya byung ci laton byed du'i drug la yang sa su spyod par bye du 'gyun na sa zhig pa 'dzin pa dge pa'i rgyub bskyed po maungan hU~M
107a5(mdo sde): /ming sa mi la 'i b+h+ri ga/nga chub sems 'a la na
107a6(mdo sde): ba'i skyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des tshul por byed cing nyams par byed do//'jam dpal dbyer na shing gi sdong po chen po sring du dpag tshang
107b1(mdo sde): stong pa zhig yod la/de'ang rgya mtsho chen pos khyer ba las bar snang la gnas pa'i gnod byin dag gis de rgya mtsho chen po'i lam lus phyir phul te bzlog nas/de la lcags
107b2(mdo sde): kyi gar bu dpag tshad lnga stong yod pa zhig btags na/'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/shing gi sdong po chen po de rgya mtsho chen po la 'gro ba 'am/sems zhan bsgral
107b3(mdo sde): ba'i phyir spyad par nus sam/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsalnga pa/'jam dpal de bzhin
107b4(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi shing chen po'ang nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bya bskyed pa
107b5(mdo sde): mngon par 'du byed pa des/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho las phyir phul zhing bzlog ste/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtshor 'gro bar
107b6(mdo sde): yang mi 'gyur/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las kyang sems can rnams sgrol migs te/'jam dpal 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba skye bu
107b7(mdo sde): pa yin par rig par bya'o//'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nya ma dang zla bas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/'jam dpal dper na mi la
108a1(mdo sde): la 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/der yang de'i bya ba dang /bya ba chen po dang /don dang /don chen po dang /ched che ba dang /
108a2(mdo sde): ched cha rab cig yod nas da 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo//de'ang 'di snyam du
108a3(mdo sde): dpyod de/ma la bdag gis nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'gro bas 'jig rten gyi khrims de dag 'da' bar bya gror ma chug snyam nas/'jam dpal mo de nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'gribs
108a4(mdo sde): lam der zhugs na/'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/mi des nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'gro bas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar nus sam/'jam dpal gyis
108a5(mdo sde): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rdo thog lags so//bde bar gshegs pa rgyud de'i lo dus ring mo zhig gis rngo thog lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
108a6(mdo sde): stsal pa/'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la lo zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la nyan thos
108a7(mdo sde): kyi theg pa pa dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/nyan thos kyi theg pa dag la mi snyan cing mi sten la/bsnyen bkur mi byed nyan thos kyi theg pa pa de dag dong lhan cig
108b1(mdo sde): tu 'dris par mi byed/kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par mi byed/kun dga' ra ba 'am/gtsug lag khang ngam/'chag sar spyod yul mthun par gnas par mi byed la/
108b2(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi theg pa klog par mi byed/kha ton mi byed/sems par mi byed la/gzhan dag kyang tha na tshigs su bcad po gcig tsam yang klog tu 'jug par mi
108b3(mdo sde): byed/kha ton byed du 'jug par mi byed de de glang klog pa de'ang theg pa chen po kho na klog la/gang ston pa de'ang theg pa chen po kho na ston na/'jam dpal 'di ni byang chub
108b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o//'jam dpal dper na nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i rgyal po chen po lang tsho dang /stobs dang /
108b5(mdo sde): mthu chen po thob pa ni 'dod na ri rab kyi rtse mo nas ri rab kyi rtse mor 'gro'o//'jam dpal de bzhin du zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang /
108b6(mdo sde): thos pa dang /bsam pa dang /lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang /lang tsho dang /mthu chen po thob pa'ang 'dod na/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nus sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro
108b7(mdo sde): zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su ston par byed do//'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba
109a1(mdo sde): lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/'jam dpal dper na mi la la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/der yang de'i bya ba dang /
109a2(mdo sde): bya ba chen po dang /don dang /don chen po dang /ched che ba dang /ched che rab cig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig
109a3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams de dag 'dra' bar bya snyam mo//de'ang 'di snyam du dpyod de/ma la bdag nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya'o snyam
109a4(mdo sde): na/'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/mi des nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar nus sam/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa//
109a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rdo thog lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla
109a6(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la mi snyen
109a7(mdo sde): mi sten cing bsnyen bkur mi byed la/nyan thos kyi theg pa po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par mi byed/kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par mi byed/kun dga'
109b1(mdo sde): ra ba 'am/gtsug lag khang ngam/'tshog sar spyod yul mthun par gnas par mi byed la nyan thos kyi theg pa klog par mi byed/kha ton mi byed/dpyod cing khong
109b2(mdo sde): du chud par mi byed la/gzhan dag kyang tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang klog tu 'jug par mi byed/kha ton byed du 'jug par mi byed de/de gang klog
109b3(mdo sde): bye de'ang theg po chen po kho na klog la/gang ston pa de'ang theg pa chen po kho na ston cing de theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /theg pa chen
109b4(mdo sde): po klog pa rnams dang /theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnams la gus pa dang bcas/zhes dang bcas par byed cing der gzhol/der 'bab/der bab la/de
109b5(mdo sde): dag dang lhan cig tu gnas te/de dag la snyen cing sten la bsnyen bkur byed/de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed/kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed/de dag
109b6(mdo sde): dang kun dga' ra ba 'am/gtsug lag khang ngam/'chag sar spyod yul mthun par gnas par byed lA/de theg pa chen po yongs su 'chol zhing sdud la 'chang
109b7(mdo sde): bar byed/mar me dang /bdug pa dang /me tog dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug po dag gis mchog tu gus par mchod par byed/de theg pa
110a1(mdo sde): chen po klog cing kha ton byed la/dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' bas lung 'bog par byed/ma bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnams la brnyas
110a2(mdo sde): pa'i sems mi skyed/bzhin 'dzum pa dang gasdong por smra la/tshig mi brlang mi gtum mo rtsub pa dang /dga' ba dang snyan par smra zhing /de sgrog gi phyir yang theg pa
110a3(mdo sde): chen po mi spong lo de theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang /theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnams
110a4(mdo sde): la ci nus ci lcogs kyis snying ni lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su 'dzin par byed cing /de su dang yang lhan cig 'gyed pa dang rtsod par mi byed la/de sngon ma byung ba dang
110a5(mdo sde): ma thos pa'i mdo sde rnams 'tshol ba'i rang bzhin can yin zhing /gang dgo las thos pa du da la ston pa la gus pa drag po lta bu skyed par byed/byang chub sems
110a6(mdo sde): dpa' gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la ma bslabs pa dag la khyad du gsod par mi byed la/nyes pa bden pa dang mi bden pas gzhon dag la gleng bar
110a7(mdo sde): mi byed la/nyos pa gzhan gyi 'khrul pa'ang mi 'chol zhing byams pa dang /snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyoms la slob pa 'di ni 'jam dpal byang
110b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o//'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis/
110b2(mdo sde): 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/'jam dpal dper na mi la la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/der yang de'i bya ba dang /bya ba
110b3(mdo sde): chen po dang /don dang /don chen po dang /ched che ba dang /ched che rab cig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten
110b4(mdo sde): gyi khams de dag myur du 'da' bar bya snyam mo//de'ang 'di snyam du dpyod de/ma la bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
110b5(mdo sde): pa la gsol ba gdab par gror ma chag snyam nas/'jam dpal mi de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du song nas gsol ba btab ste/bcom ldan 'das bdag
110b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga brgya'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'da' bar 'tshal te/der yang bdag gis bgyi ba dang /bgyi ba chen po dang /
110b7(mdo sde): don dang /don chen po dang /ched che ba dang /tshad che rab cig mchis na/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar mdzad du
111a1(mdo sde): gsol zhes byas la/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas kyang mi de 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar mdzad na/'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems//
111a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag myur du 'da' bar mdzad spyod dam/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das spyod lags so//bde bar
111a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa spyod lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gong la la zhig bla na med pa
111a4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/nyan thos kyi theg pa ba dag la mi snyan mi sten
111a5(mdo sde): cing bsnyen bkur mi byed pa/nyan thos kyi theg pa po de dag dang lhan cig 'dris par mi byed/kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par mi byed/kun dga' ra ba 'am/gtsug
111a6(mdo sde): lag khang ngam/'chag sar spyod yul mthun par gnas par mi byed la/nyan thos kyi theg pa klog par mi byed/kha ton mi byed/dpyod cing khong du chud par mi byed la/
111a7(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang klog tu 'jug par mi byed/kha ton byed du 'jug par mi byed de/de gang klog pa de'ang theg pa chen
111b1(mdo sde): po kho na klog/gang kha ton byed pa de'ang theg pa chen po kho na kha ton byed/gang ston pa de'ang theg pa chen po kho na ston cing de lus dang /ngagra dang /yid yongs su dag la//
111b2(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dge ba'i chos can yin la gzhan dag kyang lus dang /ngag dang /yid yongs su dag pa la dgod/tshul khrims dang /dge ba'i chos can/
111b3(mdo sde): la dgod/theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang /theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnams la gus
111b4(mdo sde): pa dang bcas/zhe sa dang bcas par byed la/der gzhol/der 'bab/der bab cing de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas te/de dag la snyan cing stan la bsnyen bkur byed
111b5(mdo sde): cing de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed/kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed la/de dag dang kun dga' ra ba 'am/gtsug lag khang ngam/'chag sar spyod
111b6(mdo sde): yul mthun par gnas par byed/do theg pa chen po yongs su 'chol zhing spur la 'chang bar byed mar me dang /bdug pa dang /me tog dang /spos dang /me tog
111b7(mdo sde): phreng dang /byug pa dag gi so mchog tu gus pa drag pos mchod par byed de/theg pa chen po klog cing kha ton byed la/gzhan dag kyang dga' ba dang /mchog
112a1(mdo sde): tu dga' ba chen po drag pos klog tu 'jug cang kha ton byed du 'jug ma bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brnyes pa'i sems mi skyed la/byung
112a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho na la 'god par byed/de bzhin 'dzum zhing gasdong po smra la/gzhan dag kyang bzhin 'dzum zhing gsong por smra ba la
112a3(mdo sde): dgod/de tshig mi brlang /mi gtub/mi rtsub la/gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho na la 'god cing /de dga' ba dang snyan par smra la/srog gi phyir yang thog pa
112a4(mdo sde): chen po mi spong zhing /de theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /thug pa chen po klog pa rnams dang /theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa
112a5(mdo sde): rnams la gus pa drag po dang /dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba chen pos sri zhu bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas la/gzhan dag kyang bsam pa chen po dang /lhag
112a6(mdo sde): ba'i bsam pas bslab pa de kho na la 'god par byed/su dang yang lhan cig 'gyed pa dang rtsod par mi byed/de sngon ma byung ba dang /ma thos pa'i mdo sde rnams
112a7(mdo sde): gus pa drag pos don du gnyer zhing 'tshol ba dang /gang dag las thos pa de dag la gus pa drag po lta bu skyed par byed la/gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho na
112b1(mdo sde): la 'god/gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la ma bslabs pa rnams la'ang rlom sems mi byed/nyes pa bden pa dang /mi bden pas gzhan dag la gleng bar mi byed//
112b2(mdo sde): nyes pa gzhan gyi 'khrul pa'ang mi 'tshol/gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho na la 'grod par byed/de byang chub sems dpa'i las chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khamos
112b3(mdo sde): la rnam par lta bar byed/gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i las chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de byang chub sems dpa'i
112b4(mdo sde): lam chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lam chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par
112b5(mdo sde): lta ba la 'god par byed/de byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan drag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i
112b6(mdo sde): spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lto ba la 'god par byed/de byang chub sems dpa'i rgyu chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar
112b7(mdo sde): byed la/gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rgyu chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la
113a1(mdo sde): mkhas pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa chud zos pa'i sems
113a2(mdo sde): can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang
113a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i spyod pa'i stobs
113a4(mdo sde): tshud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i spyod pa'i stobs chud zos pa'i sems
113a5(mdo sde): can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i gnas chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khamos la rnam par lta bar byed la//
113a6(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i gnas chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de byams pa dang /snying rje dang /
113a7(mdo sde): dga' ba dang /btang snyoms chud zos po'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang byams pa dang /snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /
113b1(mdo sde): btang snyoms chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de bgo ba sha'i rang bzhin can yin la/gzhan dag kyang bgo ba sha'i rang bzhin can
113b2(mdo sde): la 'god par byed/de sangs rgyas kyi chos chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos chud zos pa'i sems
113b3(mdo sde): can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa dang bral ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang
113b4(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa dang bral ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de bcing bas bcings pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta
113b5(mdo sde): bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang bcing bas bcings pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de yun ring po nas na ba'i sems can gyi khams la
113b6(mdo sde): rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang yun ring po nas na ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
113b7(mdo sde): pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams
114a1(mdo sde): la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de mgon med pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang mgon med pa'i sems can/
114a2(mdo sde): gyi khams la rnam par lta bu la 'god par byed/de yun ring po nas gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang yun ring
114a3(mdo sde): po nas gnyid kyi log pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de rigs ngan du skyes pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la//
114a4(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang rigs ngan du skyes pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de byang chub kyi sems chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la
114a5(mdo sde): rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang byang chub kyi sems chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de byang chub sems dpa'i
114a6(mdo sde): spyod pa chud zos po'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams lnga
114a7(mdo sde): rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de chos spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang chos spyod pa chud zos pa'i
114b1(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bu la 'god par byed/de bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chud zos bya'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan
114b2(mdo sde): dag kyang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chung zas pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bra la 'god par byed/de theg pa chen po la mos pa chud zas pa'i sems
114b3(mdo sde): can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang theg pa chen po la mos pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khrims la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de tshul
114b4(mdo sde): khrims kyi sdom pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnams
114b5(mdo sde): byar lta ba la dgod par byed/de chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i
114b6(mdo sde): chos chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de bzod pa dang des pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed
114b7(mdo sde): la/gzhan dag kyang bzod pa dang nges pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khoms la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de zhi gnas dang lhag mthong chud zos pa'i
115a1(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang zhi gnas dang lhag mthong chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta
115a2(mdo sde): bal 'god par byed/de sbyin pa dang /dul ba dang /legs par sdom pa dang /dris pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan
115a3(mdo sde): dag kyang sbyin pa dang /dul ba dang /legs par sdom pa dang /des de chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de dran pa dang /
115a4(mdo sde): blo gros dang /brtan pa dang /rtogs pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed lnga/gzhan drug kyang dran pa dang /blo gros dang /brtan
115a5(mdo sde): pa dang /rtogs pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi tshul la 'jug pa chud zos pa'i sems can
115a6(mdo sde): gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi tshul la 'jug pa chu de zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god
115a7(mdo sde): par byed/de sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye ba chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye ba chung
115b1(mdo sde): zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'grod par byed/de dge ba'i bshes gnyen chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan dag
115b2(mdo sde): kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de sems can la phan par 'dod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams
115b3(mdo sde): la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang sems can la phan par 'dod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de chos la rton
115b4(mdo sde): pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang chos la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par
115b5(mdo sde): byed/de ye shes la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khamos la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang ye shes la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la
115b6(mdo sde): rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de don la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khoms la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang don la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems
115b7(mdo sde): can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang
116a1(mdo sde): nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de yang dag par spong ba bzhi chud zos pa'i
116a2(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams la rnam par lte bar byed la/gzhan dag kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par
116a3(mdo sde): byed/de bden pa'i chos dang /don dang /'dul ba smra ba la mkhas pa yin la/gzhan dag kyang bden pa'i chos dang don dang /'dul ba smra ba la mkhas pa la 'god
116a4(mdo sde): par byed/de dbul po'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed cing gzhan dag kyang dbul po'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/de
116a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byams pas khyab par byed de/kye ma sems can 'di dag ni mgon med pa/sems can 'di dag ni skyabs med pa/sems
116a6(mdo sde): can 'di dag ni dpung gnyen med pa/sems can 'di dag ni gleng med pa/sems can 'di dag ni gnas med pa/sems can 'di dag ni skyob pa med pa yin na//
116a7(mdo sde): kye ma nam zhig na bdag sems can 'di dag gi mgon du 'gyur zhig gu/skyabs su 'gyur zhig gu/dpung gnyen du 'gyur zhig gu/gling du 'gyur zhig gu
116b1(mdo sde): gnas su 'gyur zhig gu/skyob par 'gyur zhig gu snyam pa'o//'jam dpal dper na bya'i rgyal po nam mkha'i lding lang tsho dang /stobs dang /mthu chen po thob pa de ni
116b2(mdo sde): 'dod na ri rab kyi rtse mo nas ri rab kyi rtse mor 'gro'o//'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' yang dge ba'i
116b3(mdo sde): rtsa ba'i stobs dang /mgyogs pa dang /shugs dang /rtul ba chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang du skye bar 'dod pa der yang skye bar 'gyur la/
116b4(mdo sde): ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung bar skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang skyabs dang /dpung gnyen dang /gling dang /gnas dang /skyob por yang 'gyur bya
116b5(mdo sde): de ni 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo
116b6(mdo sde): gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zhal zas
116b7(mdo sde): ro brgya dang ldan pa phul zhing /lha'i na bza' dag kyang phul te de bzhin gshegs pa re re la'ang nyin gcig bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
117a1(mdo sde): nor bu rin po chu dbang gi rgyal pos yongs su gang bar byas na sbyin pa byin te/de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du phul la/rigs
117a2(mdo sde): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gzhig no/'di na de bas chos bsod nams glengs med pa skyed
117a3(mdo sde): do//'jam dpal gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo grang li la zhog gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems
117a4(mdo sde): can thams cad rgyun du zhugs pra'i 'bras bu la bkod la/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i
117a5(mdo sde): 'bras bu la bzhig na/'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do//'jam dpal gral te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang lnga la zhig gis phyogs
117a6(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad lan+da cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod la/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
117a7(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bzhag na/'di ni de bos ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do//'jam dpal
117b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi pa 'am rigs kyi bu mo gdul la zhig gis phyogs brgya'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cud phyir mi 'ong ba'i lngas
117b2(mdo sde): brabul bkong la/rigs kyi bru'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gos ni sems can gcig dgra bcom pa nyid lnga bzhago na/'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med
117b3(mdo sde): pabaskyed do//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang lnga la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can
117b4(mdo sde): thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod la/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can+d+ra gcig rang sangs rgyas nyid la bya zhig ni/'di ni de bas
117b5(mdo sde): ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
117b6(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi rdul skyid kyi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig re'i shi
117b7(mdo sde): rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa spyod do//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
118a1(mdo sde): gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad ra'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta ba'i
118a2(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag
118a3(mdo sde): na/'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams
118a4(mdo sde): cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan
118a5(mdo sde): zhig gis ni sems can gcig zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do//'jam dpal
118a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cang zla ba dang nyi mas
118a7(mdo sde): 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu'i
118b1(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo grang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i
118b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/rigs
118b3(mdo sde): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/'di ni de bas ches
118b4(mdo sde): bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab
118b5(mdo sde): kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
118b6(mdo sde): snyed du byin la/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni dge bsnyen drang po can gsum la skyabs su song ba/bslab pa'o gzhi lnga dang ldan pa/bcom ldan
118b7(mdo sde): 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
119a1(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi dge bsnyen dad pa can gsum la skyabs su song
119a2(mdo sde): ba/bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang ldan pa/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing
119a3(mdo sde): lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gi ni gang zag brgyad pa la nyin
119a4(mdo sde): gcig zan cig byin na 'di ni de bas tshes bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i
119a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi gang zago brgyad pa rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag
119a6(mdo sde): kyang byin te de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni rgyun du zhugs po gcig la nyin gcig
119a7(mdo sde): zan cig byin na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig
119b1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la/nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/de ltar
119b2(mdo sde): sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mA gzhan zhig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ang ba gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na 'dri ni
119b3(mdo sde): dongo bas ches bsod ni mas grangs med pa spyod do//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gros phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
119b4(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa
119b5(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na 'di ni de bas ches bsod
119b6(mdo sde): nams grangs med pa skyed do//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhog gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul
119b7(mdo sde): snyed kyi phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos kyang byin te/de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin
120a1(mdo sde): la/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni dgra bcom pa gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs
120a2(mdo sde): med pa skyed do//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi dgra
120a3(mdo sde): bcom po rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin
120a4(mdo sde): la/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhi na zhig gis ni rang sangs rgyas gcig le nyin gcig zin cig byin ni/'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa
120a5(mdo sde): skyed do//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rang
120a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams la/nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gros dag kyang byin te/de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du
120a7(mdo sde): byin la/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni ri'i shIng rta so 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' gci ga la nyin gcig zan cig byin no/'di ni
120b1(mdo sde): de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang gi tshe gang dang gang las brtsams te byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa
120b2(mdo sde): de'i tshe des sems de la mi dge ba'i las ma spangs pa ci'ang med la/des sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang ma gzung ba med pa'i phyir te/'jam dpal de ltar na byang chub
120b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin no//'jam dpal dper na bya'i rgyal po ka la bid sgo ngo'i sbubs na 'dug cing /mig ma bye ba
120b4(mdo sde): dag gis kyang sgra skad kyi gdangs zab cing snyan pas bya'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon par byed do//'jam dpal de bzhin du dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub
120b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug cing /mig las dang nyon mongs pa'i mun pa'i rab srab kyi dris yog pa'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba'i sbyor ba bsgrub
120b6(mdo sde): pa'i sgra skad kyis nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon par byed do//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang lnga la zhig gis phyogs
120b7(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi ra'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/nyin gcig bzhin du lci'o zas
121a1(mdo sde): ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/de ltar sbyin pa bskul pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan
121a2(mdo sde): zhig gis ni glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyeng
121a3(mdo sde): do//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi glang po che'i shing
121a4(mdo sde): rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas rlo brgyu dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/de ltar sbyin pa
121a5(mdo sde): bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gos ni zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig
121a6(mdo sde): la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs
121a7(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi zla ba dang nyi mos 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lho'i zas
121b1(mdo sde): robargya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis na
121b2(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i nyin gcig zan cig byin na/'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do//'jam dpal
121b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'ami rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhog gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi 'gro ba lta bu
121b4(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos kyang byin te/de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
121b5(mdo sde): du byin la/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gcig la nyin gcig
121b6(mdo sde): zan cig byin na/'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
121b7(mdo sde): gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/nyin gcig bzhin du

122a2(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos shing yid ches par byed na/'di ni de bas chos bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do//'jam
122a3(mdo sde): dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi kha zas byed du bcug la/

122a5(mdo sde): spras pa/nor bu rin po che snang ba thams cad brtsegs pa'i stegs bus bskor ba/nor bu dang /mu tig dang /rin po che'i chun pos mdzes par byas pa/gdugs
122a6(mdo sde): dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba den bsgreng ba/nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra bas bkab pa/dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i bla bre bres pa/tsan+dan sgrol gyi snying pos

122b1(mdo sde): go ta ra ni dang /dri mchog dang /d+ha nu ska ri dang /lha'i snga ma'i me tog dang /ut+pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu ta dang /pad+ma dkar po dang /me tog chen po rnams bkram pa byed
122b2(mdo sde): du bcug ste/rang sangs rgyas de dag la lha'i zas ro birgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la rigs
122b3(mdo sde): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'am/thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba 'am/'jig rten gyi mgon pa zhes bya ba'i sgra thos sam/ri mor

122b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal dper na chu'i thigs pa chung ngu rgya mtsho chen por song ba'ang sreg pa'i bskal pa'i me ma byung gi bar du bar ma dor yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ro//'jam
123a1(mdo sde): dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ji ltar chung ba'ang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi me ma byung gi bar du bar mdor
123a2(mdo sde): yongs su zad pa 'am/mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro//'jam dpal dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni ji ltar chung yang /'di lta ste/bong dang /khyon dang /che

128b6(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams ni nang nu'ang mi dmigs/phyi rol na'ang mi dmigs/gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigros te/sems can gyi khams kyi rang bzhin gang

129a1(mdo sde): skad du so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams las kyang ma 'das la zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyang ma thob pa de tsam gyis na dge slong legs par gsungs bu'i
129a2(mdo sde): chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba 'phags pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdzogs par bsnyen pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin te/de ltar rab tu byung ba glang dag yin
129a3(mdo sde): pa de dgra ni yang dag par rab tu byung ba yin gyis/de lta ma yin par rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag nI leg par rab tu byung ba yin no//shA ri'i bu dge slong
129a4(mdo sde): de lta bu ni dad pas byin pa longs spyod par 'os te/gos dang /zas dang /mal cha dang /stan dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang /sman zong rnams longs spyad par
129a5(mdo sde): 'os so zhes gang gsungs pa de'ong tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang dag gi rten num/gnas med pa de dag ni ji ltar thob par rung /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
129a6(mdo sde): gal te zag pa med pa'i chos rnams thob tu rung na ni dmigs pa las dgra bcom pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dri bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
129a7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid ni ltos pa med pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dgongs nas 'di skad du so so'i skye bo'i chos
129b1(mdo sde): rnams las kyang ma 'das la/zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyang mthob pa de tsam gyis na dge slong legs pa ru gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba 'phags pa
129b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdzogs par bsnyen pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin te/de ltar rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni yang dag par rab tu byung ba yin gyi/de ltar
129b3(mdo sde): ma yin pa rab tu byung ba gang yin pa de dag ni log par rab tu byung ba yin no//shA ri'i bu dge slong de lta bus ni dad pas byin pa la longs spyad par 'os te/gos dang /
129b4(mdo sde): zas dang /mal cha dang /stan dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang /sman zong rnams longs spyod par 'os so zhes bka' stsal to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yang
129b5(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyis ci la dgongs te brtson pa mi gtong ba'i dge slong gang yin pa de ni
129b6(mdo sde): gzugs gtong bar mi byed/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa gtong bar mi byed de/de tsam gyis na dge slong legs par gsungs
129b7(mdo sde): pi'i chos 'dul ba las rab tu byung ba 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'ongs pa'i rdzogs par bsnyen pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin te/de ltar rab tu byung ba gang dag yin
130a1(mdo sde): pa de dgra ni yang drug par rab tu byung ba yin gyi/de lta ma yin par rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni ldog par rab tu byung ba yin no//
130a2(mdo sde): ri'i bu dge slong de lta bus ni dad pas byin pa longs spyod par 'os te/gos dang /zas dang /mal cha dang /stan dang /nu ba'i gsos sman dang /sman zong rnams longs
130a3(mdo sde): spyad par 'os so zhes de skad bka' stsal/shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis chos nyid las dgongs nas 'di skad du brtson pa
130a4(mdo sde): mo gtong ba'i dge slong gang yin pa de ni gzugs gtong bar mi byed/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa gtong bar mi
130a5(mdo sde): byed ces bka' stsal to//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings ni nang na'ang mi dmigs/phyi rol na'ang mi dmigs/gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so//
130a6(mdo sde): nang gdags pa na gdags su med pa dang skye ba med pa'i gdagos pa'o//de ltar na sems can gyi khams mnyam pa nyid kyis chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid do//
130a7(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis semaso can gyi khams mnyam pa nyid do//de ltar na sems can gyi khams dang chos kyi dbyings 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis
130b1(mdo sde): su dbyer myed do//gang la gnyis su med pa de gnyis su dbyer med pa de la ni gsal ba'ang med/gzhug pa'ang myed do//gang la gsal bya'ang med/gzhag pa'adu
130b2(mdo sde): med po de ni 'dre' ba'am 'thob par byar mi nus te/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dgongs nas 'di skad du brtson pa mi gtong ba'i dge sbyong
130b3(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni gzugs gtong bar mi byed/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa gtong bar mi byed de/de tsam gyis na dge slong
130b4(mdo sde): legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdzogs par bsnyen pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin te/de ltar rab tu byung
130b5(mdo sde): ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni yang dge par rab tu byung ba yin gyi/de lta ma yin par rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni logs par rab tu byung ba yin no//shA ri'i bu
130b6(mdo sde): dge slong de lta bus ni dad pas byin pa longs spyad phyir 'os te/gos dang /zas dang /mol cha dang /sbyin dang /na ba'i gaspos sman dang /sman zing rnams longs spyad par 'os
130b7(mdo sde): so zhes bka' stsal to//dogs pa med pa'i dge slong ni dogs pa khas mi len to//yi ge med cing yi ge las 'das pa'i dge slong gang yin pa de ni bgrang ba las bstan
131a1(mdo sde): bar mi nus la de la ni 'ong ba'ang med 'gro ba'ang med/'greng ba'ang med/'dug pa'ang med/nyal ba'ang med do//rtog pa can ma yin pa'i dge
131a2(mdo sde): slong ni brtags pa la longs spyod pa'o//rtog pa can gyi dge slong ni ma brtags pa la longs spyod pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis de la
131a3(mdo sde): dgongs nas de tsam gyis na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdzogs par bsten pas
131a4(mdo sde): rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin te/de ltar rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni yang dag par rab tu byung ba yin gyi/de lta ma yin par rab tu byung ba gang
131a5(mdo sde): dag yin pa de dag ni log par rab tu byung ba yin no//shA ri'i bu dge slong de lta bus ni dad pas byin pa langs spyad par 'os te/gos dang /zas dang /mal cha
131a6(mdo sde): dang /stan dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang /sman zong rnams longs spyad par 'os so zhes bka' stsal to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
131a7(mdo sde): la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/shA ri'i bu legs so legs so//khyod kyis ji skad bstan pa bzhin du ngas de las dgongs nas bstan pa yin te/'di ni legs
131b1(mdo sde): par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba yin no//shA ri'i bu phyag rgya 'dis mngon pa'i nga rgyal can brtag par 'dod pas ni phyag rgya de'i mdun du brjod par bya'o//
131b2(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu shin tu gartag pa ni phyag rgya 'das ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can mang po brtag par nus so//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na dge sbyong bdun brgya len pa med par
131b3(mdo sde): zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//srid pa tha ma pa'i dge slong brgya ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma zhugs shing ma rtogs la ma mos nas stan las langs te dong
131b4(mdo sde): ngo //dge slong lnga ni spong bar byas shing bzlog par byas nas rang gi lus dang bcos te sems can du myal ba chen por lhung ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
131b5(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu ngas kye ma chos 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun no snyam ste/de la dgongs nas de skad bstan mod kyi 'on kyang gang dang yang mi mthun pa med de/shA ri'i bu/
131b6(mdo sde): dper na mi la la zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du skye bo phal po che'i mdun du khyod la ngas chos bshad par bya'o//chos de'ang 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun no zhes tshig/
131b7(mdo sde): tu smra na/shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/chos de'ang mi mthun pa gang dag yin pa'i mi de dag yod pa yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags
132a1(mdo sde): so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du nga'ang kye ma chos 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun no zhes de skad du'ang
132a2(mdo sde): ston la de 'jig rten de'ang yang dag par ma mthong ngo //'jig rten med pa la na chos kyang bgrang du med do//'jig rten gdags pa'ang med do//shA ri'i bu 'jig
132a3(mdo sde): rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa zhes bya ba ni chos rnams ma 'dres shing chos rnams 'dre ba med pa la bya bar gsungs so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ma 'dres
132a4(mdo sde): pa zhes bgyi ba'i tshig gi don gang lags/bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba ni chos rnams ro gcig par gdags pa yin te/gcig pu kho na'ang
132a5(mdo sde): ma yin te/tha dad pa kho na'ang ma yin no//shA ri'i bu ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid
132a6(mdo sde): ces bgyi ba'i tshig gi don gang lags/bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni gdags su med pa'o//gang gdags su med pa de ni gdags par mi nus so//
132a7(mdo sde): gang gdags par mi nus pa de ni 'jig rten pa'ang ma yin/'jig rten las 'das pa'ang ma yin no//shA ri'i bu gang 'jig rten pa'ang ma yin 'jig rten las/
132b1(mdo sde): 'das pa'ang ma yin pa de ni stong pa nyid ces bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun thams
132b2(mdo sde): cad dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan

132b4(mdo sde): pradI ba dA nI yA na nA ma mA hA yA na sU tA/bde skad du/'phags pa mar mo 'bul ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
132b5(mdo sde): cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mogron med zas sbyin gyi kun
132b6(mdo sde): dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu dpog tu med pa bzhi po 'di dag ni lcags
132b7(mdo sde): par yongs su sbyongs pa'i chos rnams dang ldan pa/rnam par smin pa dpag tu med pa/snang ba dpag tu med pa/bsod nams la yang dag par gzhol bar
133a1(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa/gzugs dpag tu med pa/bde ba la yang dag par gzhol ba dpag tu med pa dag ste/de dag ni tshul khrims la 'jug pa dang /ting
133a2(mdo sde): nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la 'jug pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa dang /len
133a3(mdo sde): pa med par zag pa zad par 'gyur ba dag go/bzhi gang zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshul khrims
133a4(mdo sde): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pas bsam gtan par gyur pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pas shes rab dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/shes rab yangs pa dang
133a5(mdo sde): ldan pa/nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa/ji lta ba bzhin gyi shes rab dang ldan pa/grangs med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa/rnam par nges pa'i shes rab
133a6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/rnam par nges pa gzigs pa/mchog tu rnam par grol zhing shin tu rnam par grol ba'i thugs dang ldan pa/g.yo ba med pa'i thugs dang ldan pa//
133a7(mdo sde): 'khrug pa med pa'i thugs dang ldan pa/'phrin las legs par mdzad pa'i thugs dang ldan pa dang /shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
133b1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa/dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa/spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa/yid la mdzad pa dang ma bral ba/
133b2(mdo sde): bden pa smyon pa/bden pa gzigs pa/snang bar gyur pa/dpag tu med pa/tshogs dpag tu med pa/zil gyis gnon pa/zil gyis mi gnon pa'i tshul khrims dang //

133b4(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa'i stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa/so so yang dag
133b5(mdo sde): par rig pa'i stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa/sngon gyi bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa/sngon yongs su sbyong ba mdzad pa/shes rab rin po che dang ldan pa/brtson pa ma bor
133b6(mdo sde): ba/brtson 'grus dpag tu med pa/mya ngan dang gnod pa dang bral ba/yongs su 'dzin pa mi mnga' ba/thams cad gzigs pa thams cad mkhyen pa/glang po chen po

134a1(mdo sde): rgyas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa/rig pa gsum dang ldan pa/bsod nams kyi zhing gi de bzhin
134a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i mchod rten la dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma sems dang bsod nams don du gnyer ba/bsod nams la dmigs
134a3(mdo sde): pa/bsod nams yo byad du byed pa/bsod nams 'dod pa/rnal 'byor dang mthun pa'i rjes su dran pa yid la byed pa/sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pas tha na mar
134a4(mdo sde): me'i snying po chung ngu'am ngan pa zhig 'bru mar gyis bskus sam mar gyis bskus te 'bul lam/nges par 'bul lam/yongs su 'bul lam/'jog par
134a5(mdo sde): byed pa dang /dge ba don du gnyer ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyi ma'i mtha'i skye ba'i
134a6(mdo sde): 'khor ba spangs pa/de ltar byung ba na tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs
134a7(mdo sde): pas bzung ba nyid yid la byed dam/de las yon tan gang yang rung ba zhig yid la byed dam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir dang gzhi de las de bzhin gshegs
134b1(mdo sde): pa yid la byed cing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar sems bskyed de//
134b2(mdo sde): mur me 'di 'bar bar bya/rab tu 'bar bar bya/dbul bar bya/yongs su dbul bar bya/rab tu bzhag par bya'o snyam pa'am/sems kyi rgyud dang bar gyur pas tshul khrims

134b5(mdo sde): zhig gamA/gasrog tsam zhig gam/tha na glog gi rgyun tsam zhig kyang snang bar byed dram/tha na them sgras kyi gzhi gcig snang bar byed na'ang shA ri'i bu de'i
134b6(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa ni nyan thos rnams kyis sam/rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan por mi nus so//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang lan la ni myi re zhing da pa dang /
134b7(mdo sde): dga' ba dang /dang bas yongs su gtang ba'i rnam par smin pa bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pas ston par spyad do//shA ri'i bu gzhan
135a1(mdo sde): yang dad pa dang ldan la gus par gnas shing g.yo med la sgyu med pa sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la nges par sems pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo
135a2(mdo sde): dge ba'i bsam pa skyes nas mar me cung zad tsam mam/chung ngu tsam zhig kyang snang bar byas te mar me snang bar byas pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod
135a3(mdo sde): rten de tha na them skas tsam snang ngam/bskor sa tsam snang ngam/smad dam/gdugs som/thams cing snang ngam tha na bar skabs gang yang rung ba zhig snang ba'i
135a4(mdo sde): mar me de mod la myur du shi ste rlung gi skrod pas sam/char pas sam/mar zad pas sam/snying po zad pas shi la/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/dper na kris dkrugs
135a5(mdo sde): pan sprin stug po'i dro ba 'khrigs pa la so num mkha' las glog byung nas nub na/shA ri'i bu myur du 'byung ba'i rjes su 'brang ba de mthong bas sems can rnams kyi
135a6(mdo sde): mig thibs shes byed pa de tsam du shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar mi 'bul ba'i dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/

135b1(mdo sde): 'dun la mngon par dad pa/bdag nyid bskyab par bya ba la gnas pa/bsod nams 'dod pa rnams kyis ji tsam du chung ba'i mar me phul ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po
135b2(mdo sde): ji tsam du dpag tu med pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen to//shA ri'i bu mar me 'bul ba cung zad cig phul ba'i

135b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ma gtogs par lha dang bcas/tshungs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dring /dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus bstan par mi nus so//
135b5(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/shA ri'i bu mar me 'bul ba yongs su phul ba des bsod nams kyi phung po ji
135b6(mdo sde): tsam du dpag tu med grangs med pa yongs su bzung bar gyur pa'i don de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/shA ri'i bu mar me de tsam du chung ngu phul ba'i rnam par
135b7(mdo sde): smin pa'ang dpag tu med na/gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa khyad par can
136a1(mdo sde): byed dam byed du 'jug ste/spos sam/me tog phreng ngam/gdugs sum/ba dan rnams sam/grang yang rung ba'i mar me'i phreng ba rnam pa mang

136a3(mdo sde): zhe na/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni dpag tu med do snyam du dad pas rtogs par bya ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar chung ngu'i rnam par smin pa'ang dpag tu med par
136a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dad pas rtogs par bya ba dang /dkon mchog gsum la dad pa'i las mngon par 'du byed pa'i rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de ston pa mthong ba nyan thos
136a5(mdo sde): khyed kyis kyang rnam pa thams cad du bsam pa 'am yongs su bsam par mi nus na/'phags pa'i rigs la mi gnas pa gzhan rnams kyis las kyi rnam par smin
136a6(mdo sde): pa mngon sum du shes pa 'am/khong du chud par nus pa lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do//gzhan du na de ni dad pas rtogs par bya ba yin pa dang /shA ri'i bu nyan thos rnams
136a7(mdo sde): kyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam pa'am/shes par mi nus te/shA ri'i bu khyed rnams gnas 'di la bsam pa dang bral bar gyis
136b1(mdo sde): shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu sems can rnams kyi lus kyi rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bu
136b2(mdo sde): sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pra dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa
136b3(mdo sde): zhes gsungs so//shA ri'i bu mi 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par
136b4(mdo sde): smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do zhes ston par 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu sems can gyi bsam pa dang /sems dang /lhag mthong yang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/drad pas
136b5(mdo sde): rtogs par bya ba yin no//shA ri'i bu 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas pa khyed cag nyid kyang sems can thams cad kyi shes pa de la mig dang mkhas pa la shes pa mi 'jug
136b6(mdo sde): na/sems mi dul ba tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang bral ba/brjod ngas pa/
136b7(mdo sde): ma rig pa'i mun pas mig bsgribs pa gzhan gang dag bdag ci zhig/bdag su zhig/bdag ci 'dra ba zhig/bdag gang nas/bdag ci tsam zhig/bdag ji lta bu
137a1(mdo sde): zhig/bdag ldan pa'i drang tshul can nam/bdag mi ldan pa'i ngang tshul can nam/bdag brjed ngas pa 'am/bdag dran pa nye bar gnas pa 'am/bdag
137a2(mdo sde): mkhas pa'i las byed pa'am/bdag byis pa'i las byed pa'am/bdag gang nas 'ongs/bdag gang du 'gro zhes rang gi chos la shes pa 'jug pa'ang med pa rnams lta//
137a3(mdo sde): ci smos/shA ri'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo ni bdag la shes pa 'jug pa'ang med na phyin ci log gi lta ba can de las kyi rnam par smin pa shes par lto ga la 'gyur te de ni gnas
137a4(mdo sde): med do//shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshul khrims dang bral ba ma yin/ting nge 'dzin dang bral ba ma yin/shes rab dang bral ba ma yin/rnam par grol ba
137a5(mdo sde): dang bral ba ma yin/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang bral ba ma yin/rig pa dang bral ba ma yin no//shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
137a6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni tshul khrims dpag tu med pa'o//tshul khrims chags pa med pa'o//tshul khrims bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o//tshul khrims gzhal du
137a7(mdo sde): med pa'o//tshul khrims rdzogs pa'o//tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'o//de las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//
137b1(mdo sde): ri'i bu ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/shA ri'i bu 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab
137b2(mdo sde): tu mkhyen te/sems can 'di ni dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su zad cing mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyis gang ba'o//sems can 'di ni dge ba'i chos rnams 'byung bar
137b3(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing mi dge ba'i chos rnams 'gag par 'gyur ba'o//sems can 'di ni mi dge ba'i chos rnams skye bar 'gyur zhing dge ba'i chos rnams 'gag par 'gyur
137b4(mdo sde): ba'o zhes shA ri'i bu 'jug pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa sems can de dang de dag gi las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa sna tshogs rjes su 'jug pa rab tu mkhyen to//
137b5(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu de la sems can rnams mun pa yod cing mkhas pa med de mkhyen pa de lta bu dang ldan pa/mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ngas sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam
137b6(mdo sde): par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa lung ston to//shA ri'i bu de la gang drug dad pa de dag ni yid ches par 'gyur la gang dag ma dad cing bstan pa 'di las nyams
137b7(mdo sde): pa de dag na smad par 'gyur zhing rtsod par 'gyur te/de ni de dag la yun ring por mi phan pa dang /don med pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /log par ltung bar
138a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'o//shA ri'i bu de la sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me 'bul ba des mar me 'bul ba yongs su phul ba dang /
138a2(mdo sde): nges par phul ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i las mngon par 'dus byas pa dang /rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu bde ba 'dod pa dang /dga' ba dang mchog
138a3(mdo sde): tu dga' ba dang ldan pa dang /dad pas yongs su phul ba bsags pas tshe 'di nyid la sems kyi nges par sems pa gsum 'thob ste/gsum gang zhe na/de 'dri
138a4(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mchod pa byas te/lus thob pa snying po dang /snying
