203a4(mdo sde): ro//btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang la la chos la bzod pa 'di lta bu dang ldan te/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'ang yang dag par khong du chud na de la de bzhin gshegs
203a5(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha
203a6(mdo sde): kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bla na med pa
203a7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de skad ces smras nas/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
203b1(mdo sde): dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas bshad bral mngon
203b2(mdo sde): par bstod do//'phags pa sA lu'i ldang ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so///rgyo gar skad du/pra tI t+ya sa mud pa
203b3(mdo sde): da A di na tsa bi b+hang+ga nir do sha nA mi sU tra/bod skad du/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang po dang rnam par dbye ba bstan pa zhes bya ba'i mdo//dkon mchog gsum la phyag
203b4(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
203b5(mdo sde): so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyed la rton cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang po drang rnam par dbye ba bstan gyis/de
203b6(mdo sde): legs par rab tu nyon la yid lnga gzung zhig dang bshud do//rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang po gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'di yod na 'di 'ab+h+ring /'di skyes pas
203b7(mdo sde): 'di skye ba ste/'di lta ste/ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ming dang
204a1(mdo sde): gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/srung ba'i rkyen
204a2(mdo sde): gyis len pa/len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shri dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba
204a3(mdo sde): drang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'bra' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'di ni rten
204a4(mdo sde): cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang po zhes bya'o//rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rnam par dbye ba gang zhe na/ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed ces bya ba'i ma rig pa gang zhe na/
204a5(mdo sde): gang sngon gyi mtha' mi shes pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' mi shes pa dang /sngon dang phyi mo'i mtha' mi shes pa dang /nang mi shes pa dang /phyi mi shes pa dang /nang
204a6(mdo sde): drang phyi mi shes pa dang /las mi shes pa dang /rnam par smin pa mi shes pa dang /las dang rnam par smin pa mi shem pa dang /sangs rgyas mi shes pa dang /chos
204a7(mdo sde): mi shes pa dang /dge 'dun mi shes pa dang /sdug bsngal mi shes pa dang /kun 'byung dang /'gog pa dang /lam mi shes pa dang /rgyu mi shes pa dang /rgyu
204b1(mdo sde): las yang dag par 'byung ba'i chos mi shes pa dang /dge ba dang /mi dge ba dang /kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /bsten par bya ba
204b2(mdo sde): dang /bsten par bya ba ma yin pa dang /dran pa dang /gya nom pa dang /nag po dang /dkar po dang /rnam par dbye ba dang bcas pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
204b3(mdo sde): dang /reg pa'i skye mched drug yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin khong du mi chud pa dang /gang de dang der yang dag pa'i lta ba bzhin du mi shes pa dang /ma mthong ba dang //
204b4(mdo sde): mngon par ma rtogs pa dang /rmongs pa dang /kun tu rmongs pa dang /ma rig pa dang /mun pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mi rig pa zhes bya'o//ma rig pa'i rkyen
204b5(mdo sde): gyis 'du byed ces bya ba'i 'du byed gang zhe na/'du byed ni rnam pa gsum ste/gsum gang zhe na/lus kyi 'du byed dang /ngag gri 'du byed dang /yid kyi 'du
204b6(mdo sde): byed do//'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par shes pa gang zhe na/rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug ste/mig gi rnam par shes pa dang //
204b7(mdo sde): rno ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o//rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba la ming
205a1(mdo sde): klung zhe na/gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bashrIb+h+yAM/tshor ba'i phung po dang /'du shes kyi phung po dang /'du byed kyi phung po dang /rnam par /
205a2(mdo sde): shes pa'i phung po'o//gzugs gang zhe na/gzugs gang yin pa ci'ang rung /de dag thams cad 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang /'byung ba chen po bzhi dgra rgyur
205a3(mdo sde): byas pa ste/gzugs 'di dang /snga mi'i ming gnyis ka gcig tu mngon par bsdus nas ming dang gzugs zhes bya'o//ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye
205a4(mdo sde): mched drug ces bya ba'i skye mched drug gleng zhe na/nang gi skye mched drug ste/mig nang gi skye mched dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid
205a5(mdo sde): nang gi skye mched do//skye mched drug gri rkyen gyis reg pa zhes bya ba'i reg pa gang zhe na/reg pa'i tshogs drug ste/mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /rna ba dang /
205a6(mdo sde): sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o//rog bla'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba'i tshor bu gang zhe na/tshor ba ni gsum ste/bde ba dang //
205a7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba dang /bde ba'ang ma yin/sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa'o//tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa zhes bya ba'i sred pa gang zhe na/sred pa ni gsum ste/
205b1(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i sred pa dang /gzugs kyi sred pa dang /gzugs med pa'i sred pa'o//sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa zhes bya ba'i len pa gang zhe na/len pa ni bzhi ste/
205b2(mdo sde): 'dod pa nye bar len pa dang /lta ba nye bar len pa dang /tshul khrims drang brtul zhugs nye bar len pa dang /bdag tu smra ba nye ba ru len pa'o//len pa'i rkyen gyis
205b3(mdo sde): srid pa zhes bya ba'i srid pa gang zhe na/srid pa ni gsum ste/'drod pa'i srid pa dang /gzugs kyi srid pa dang /gzugs med pa'i srid pa'o//srid pa'i rkyen gyis
205b4(mdo sde): skye ba zhes bya ba'i skyo ba gang zhe na/gang sems can de dang de dag gi sems can gyi ris de dang de dag tu gang skye ba dang /shin tu skye ba dang /'pho ba dang /mngon par
205b5(mdo sde): 'byung ba dang /rab tu byung ba dang /phung po so sor thob pa dang /khrims so sor thob pa dang /skye mched so sor thob pa dang /phung po rnams mngon par grub pa dang //
205b6(mdo sde): srog gi dbang po rab tu skyes pa 'di ni skye ba zhes bya'o//skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi zhes bya ba'i rga shi grang zhe na/gang de'i spyi ther dang /skra dkar dang /gnyer ma tshogs
205b7(mdo sde): pi dang /rnyis pa dang /zhum pa dang /ba lango chu 'thung ba ltar gug pa dang /lu so nag po'i thig les gang ba dang /lud pa lu zhing dbugs rgod pa dang /mdun
206a1(mdo sde): du lus 'bub pa ltar byed pa dang /'khar ba la brten pa dang /blun pas mi 'gul bA nyid dang /zhan pa nyid dang /nyams pa dang /yongs
206a2(mdo sde): su nyams pa dang /dbang po rgud pa dang /nyams pa dang /'du byed rnams rnyings pa dang /shin tu rnyings par gyur ba 'di ni rga ba zhes bya'o//'chi ba gang zhe
206a3(mdo sde): na/sems can gang yin pa de dang de dag sems can gyi ris/de dang de dag nas 'phos pa dang /'pho ba nyid dang /zhig pa dang /nang nyams pa dang /tshe
206a4(mdo sde): nyams pa dang /drod yal ba dang /srog gi dbang po 'gags pa dang /phung po rnams 'dor ba dang /shi ba dang /dus byed pa 'di ni shi ba zhes bya ste/shi ba 'di
206a5(mdo sde): dang snga ma rga ba gnyis gcig tu bsdus nas rga shi zhes bya ste/'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par dbye ba yin no//dge slong dag khyed la rton cing 'brel
206a6(mdo sde): par 'byung ba dang po dang rnam par dbye ba bshad par bya'o//zhes ngas smras pa gang yin pa de'i ched du ngas smos par 'a dag yin no//rten cing 'brel bar 'byung
206a7(mdo sde): ba'i dang po dang rnam par dbye ba bstan pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so////rgya gar skar du/Ar+ya pra tI t+ya sa mud pA ra nA ma ma hA lA na sU tra/
206b1(mdo sde): bod skad du/'phags pa rton cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
206b2(mdo sde): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang na/ar mo nig lta bu'i rdo leb la rta thul la sogs po nyan thos chen po
206b3(mdo sde): rnams dang /'phags pa byams pa dang /'phags pa spyan rAs gzigs dbang phyug dang /lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
206b4(mdo sde): yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pas brgyan pa rnams dang /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po dang /sred med kyi bu dang /dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha
206b5(mdo sde): rnams dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan
206b6(mdo sde): ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzir nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga ri rab kyi rtse mo la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga
206b7(mdo sde): la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das lha 'di dag ni mchod rten bgyid par 'tshal ba sha stag
207a1(mdo sde): ste/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'drir mchis na/ci nas tshangs pa'i bsod nams 'phel ba dang /lha dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa/tshangs
207a2(mdo sde): pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu las dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma drag bsod
207a3(mdo sde): nams shin tu mung du 'phel bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la chos bstan du gsol/de nus bcom ldan 'das kyis rten cing 'brel
207a4(mdo sde): par 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/ye d+har+m+ma he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShA na ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma Na/chos gang
207a5(mdo sde): rgyu byung de dag gi/rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa'ang //de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te//dge slong chen pos de skad gsungs//spyan ras gzigs
207a6(mdo sde): dbang phyug 'di lta ste/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku yin te/sus rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mthong ba des
207a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo //spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang la la zhig gis mi gnas pa'i phyogs su
207b1(mdo sde): mchod rten ni skyu ru ra'i 'bru tsam srog shing ni khab tsam gdugs ni ba ku lA'i me tog tsam zhig byas la/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba chos kyi dbyings kyi tshogs su btsong/
207b2(mdo sde): pa nang du bcugi na de tshangs pa'i bsod nams bskyed par 'gyur te/'di nas shi 'phos shing 'chi ba'i dus byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten drag tu skye bar 'gyur ro//
207b3(mdo sde): de nas shi 'phos te 'chi ba'i dus byas nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
207b4(mdo sde): nas nyan thos de dag dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag/lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas po'i
207b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa mngon par bstod do//'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
207b6(mdo sde): rdzogs so///ye d+har+m+ma he tu pra b+ha bA hwe tun+te ShAn ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e waM bA dI ma hA shra ma Na/sar+b+ba bA bA s+ya ka rA Ni ku shA la s+yo
207b7(mdo sde): bas ma pa dam/swa tsit+taM pa ri da ma nu me taR+Yu d+hA nu shA sa ni shu b+ha mastu sar+b+ba dza ga taM/rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya aM gu li mA lI yaM nA mo
208a1(mdo sde): ma hA yA na sU tra/bod skad du/'phags pa sor mo'i phreng ba la phan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po dang ngo //sangs rgyas drang
208a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems drapa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
208a3(mdo sde): mogon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bo na bzhugs te/de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sha stag mang po dang /'khor bzhi dang /lha dang /klu
208a4(mdo sde): dang /gnod sbyin dang /nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs mang po dang /sha za dang /'byung po'i tshogs dang /lha'i bu mo dang /
208a5(mdo sde): lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /nyi ma dang /lha ma yin dang /srin po dang /'jig rten skyong dang /bdud la sogs pa las sems can thams cad nges par sgrol ba/
208a6(mdo sde): shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sde chen po mtshon cha thogs pa zhes bya ba ston te/thog mar yang dge/bar du yang dge/tha mar yang dge don bzang po/tshig/
208a7(mdo sde): 'bru bzang po/ma 'dres pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/yongs su dag pa/yongs su dkar ba tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par rab tu ston to//gang gi tshe mdo
208b1(mdo sde): sde chen po mtshon chu thogs pa mthar phyin par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen po nas byang phyogs logs su rgyud mi ring ba zhig na/bram ze'i bu 'jig
208b2(mdo sde): rten thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba/ri sding zhes bya ba'i grong khyer nas skyes pa/shin tu dbul po bram ze mo bzang mo zhes bya ba'i bu phas bor ba/lo bcu
208b3(mdo sde): gnyis lon pa/gzugs dang /mdog dang /stobs dang /khong dpa' la phun sum tshogs pa shin tu blta na sdug pa/tshig 'jam po zhig yod de/slob dpon nor
208b4(mdo sde): bu bzang po/rig byed bzhi'i pha rol tu song ba/ha la ha se zhes bya ba'i grong na gnas pa de'i drung na/bram ze'i bu 'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba/
208b5(mdo sde): shin tu yid gzhungs shing /bla ma la mchod pa byed pa/dbang po thul ba/brtul zhugs dang ma 'gyur ba la spyod pa de/srid srung gi rig byed slob po//de'i tshe slob
208b6(mdo sde): dpon nor bu bzang po de rgyal pos bos nas/mnyan du yod par 'gro ba na/rang gi slob ma bram ze'i bu 'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na sdig pa khyim srung du bcug ste//
208b7(mdo sde): mnyan du yod par song ngo //de nas de'i tshe mkhan po'i chung ma gzhon nu gzugs bzang zhing phun sum tshogs pa des bram ze'i bu 'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na sdug
209a1(mdo sde): pa mthong ba dang /sems chags nas rab tu mi bzod par gyur pa dang /gos dang rgyan rnams kyang da 'byung ste/'dod chagus kyis non nus//
209a2(mdo sde): mgyogs pa mgyogs par bram ze'i bu 'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa'i gos la bzung ste/'dod pa la gzhol zhing bsod nams me yin pa bskyed do//
209a3(mdo sde): de nas bram ze'i bu 'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa de rang bzhin gyis bla mA la gus pa dbang po thul ba/brtul zhugs dang mi 'gyur ba la spyod pa snyoms can
209a4(mdo sde): gyi mchog des mkhan po'i chung ma la 'di skad du bla ma'i btsun mo khyod ni bdag gi ma dang 'dra ste/de lta ma mdzad cig ces smras so//de gtong ba lta mi byed nas/
209a5(mdo sde): gos gcig borA te/ngo tsha nas gos gcig dang gud du song ngo //de nas mkhan po'i chung mas 'jig rten thams cad kyi sra blta na sdug pa'i sems la rnam par brtags
209a6(mdo sde): nas/mig mchi mas gang zhing 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis non nas rnam par sems par gyur te/de nas sdug bsngal zhing 'di snyam sems so//'jig rten thams
209a7(mdo sde): cad kyis blta na sdug pa bde ba'i bar chad byed pa de shi'ang slas bud med gang gi khyor yang ma gyur par thal bar gyur cig snyam ste/lus kun rang gi sen mos dral
209b1(mdo sde): nus na zhing mi bde ste/lus mi sdug par bcos nas bud med des g.yo sbyar te/khyim gnyis kyi bar gyi gdung ma la gyen du bcings nas btags so//de nas de'i tshe
209b2(mdo sde): slob dpon nor bu bzang po rgyal pos mchod nas slar rang gi khyim du 'ongs pa dang /des mthong ngo //mthong nas de'i thag pa bcad de kye ma zhes skad drag tu phyung nas
209b3(mdo sde): rang gi chung ma la 'di skad ces smras so//bzang mo 'di ci sus khyod 'di lta bur byas/bzang mos smras pa/khyod kyi slob ma 'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na sdug pas
209b4(mdo sde): nan gyis kho mo la nyal po byas nas 'di ltar byas so//de nas slob dpon nor bu bzang pos 'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa de'i mthu chen po shes te/de thog ma
209b5(mdo sde): btsas ma thag tu rgyal rigs thams cad kyi mtshon rnams shubs nas phyung ste/mda' ste ru kha ma bzhin du thams cad du lhung nas/de'i tshe rgyal rigs thams cad skrag
209b6(mdo sde): cing rab tu 'jigs par gyur te/'jig rten thams cad kyis blta ni sdug pa sems can gyi mchog de'i mthu chen po de lta bu shes nas/de la cung zad bsgo ba tsam
209b7(mdo sde): zhig nus te/'jig rten thams cad blta na sdug pa de la 'di skad ces smras so//bdag nyid ngan pa bla ma'i chung ma ma rung bar byed pa khyod nyes pa chen po byas pas
210a1(mdo sde): bram zer mi 'gyur gyis mi stong sod cig dang dri nas byang bar 'gyur ro//de skad ces rang gi slob ma bram ze'i bu 'jig rten thams cad kyis bldan
210a2(mdo sde): sdug pa la bsgo ba dang /bram ze'i bu 'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa de rang bzhin gyis bla mya la gus pas rang gi slob dpon la 'di skad ces smras so//
210a3(mdo sde): kyi mkhan po bdag la 'os pa ma lags so//yang slob dpon gyis smras pa/ji bdag nyid dran pa khyod mtho ris su 'gro ba 'am/bram zer 'gyur bar mi 'dod
210a4(mdo sde): ngam/yang slob mas smras pa/legs so legs so//mkhan po de ltar bgyi'o zhes smras te/mi stong bsad de 'ongs nas rang gi slob dpon la gus par smra
210a5(mdo sde): bar byas pa dang /slob dpon gyis de mthong nas gtum po 'di rung ma shi ba lta zhes ngo mtshar du gyur te/'o na nga shi bar bya'o snyam nas/dri skad ma zer bur
210a6(mdo sde): bsad pa re re'i sor mo rnams long zhig/mi stong srod la sor mo rnams phreng ba byas te 'ongs dang /gdod bram zer 'gyur ro zhes zer nas de'i phyir sor mo'i phreng ba
210a7(mdo sde): zhes bya'o//yang sor mo'i phreng ba des legs so zhes smras nas/mi nyis stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba bsad do//de'i tshe sor mo'i phreng ba'i ma zas kyi mchog
210b1(mdo sde): dang mngar sna bzhi thogs nas bdag gi bu 'di ltar gyur pa lta zhig na nyon mongs blud do snyam ste 'ongs pa dang /sor mo'i phreng bas rang gi ma 'ongs par mthong nas bdag gi
210b2(mdo sde): ma mtho ris su 'gro bar bya'o snyam ste ral gri thogs nas 'ongs so//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yul dang dus mkhyen nas mnyan du yod pa nas gnag pa'i
210b3(mdo sde): dgongs su 'dom bzhi bcus ma tshang ba'i bar du shing a sho ka'i drung na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thams cad dang ldan pa de dang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du mdun na bzhugs
210b4(mdo sde): par gyur to//de nas sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das mthong nas 'o na dge sbyong go'u ta ma bsad do snyam ste/ral gri thogs nas mgyogs pa mgyogs par 'ongs
210b5(mdo sde): so//de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes thams cad dang ldan pas bdag nyid gshegs pa lta bur bstan pa dang /sor mo'i phreng bas ma la mdun gyis bltas te/
210b6(mdo sde): gnyis kyi bar du tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/zas gtsang sras po bzhugs su gsol//bdag ni sor mo'i
210b7(mdo sde): phreng ba ste//sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/chos gos mnabs pa bzhugs su gsol//bdag ni sor mo'i
211a1(mdo sde): phreng ba ste//sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/mkhas pa'i gtso bo bzhugs su gsol//bdag

211b7(mdo sde): bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/mdzod spu'i thig le mchog mnga' bzhugs//bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste//sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig/bzhugs
212a1(mdo sde): k+Sha da bzhugs //dbu m+b+ha mngon rna ma mchog mnga' bzlugs//bdag ni sor ma'i byung ba ste//so m-i'i sh+logs bdag snyam
212a2(mdo sde): cig/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/snyan dang phyag ring mchog mnga' bzhugs//bdag ni sor mo'i phyed bu ste//sor mo'i shro gum bdag
212a3(mdo sde): stsol cig/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/phyag mchog glang po'i sna 'dra bzhugs//bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste//sor mo'i sh+lo gam bdag
212a4(mdo sde): stsol cig/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/gsang ba sbubs su sbas pa bzhugs//bdag ni sor myo'i phreng ba ste//sor mo'i sho gam bdag
212a5(mdo sde): stsol cig/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/pus mo bzang po mnga' ba bzhugs//bdag ni sdor mo'i phreng ba ste//sor mo'i sho gam bdag
212a6(mdo sde): stsol cig/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/zangs kyi sen mo mchog mnga' bzhugs//bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste//sor mo'i sho gam bdag
212a7(mdo sde): stsol cig/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/'gro ba mchog gis spos byugs bzhugs//bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste//sor mo'i sho gam bdag
212b1(mdo sde): stsol cig/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/ka la bing+ka'i sgra dbyangs bzhugs//budag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste//sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig/
212b2(mdo sde): bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/khu byug sgra dbyangs snyan sgrogs bzhugs//bdag ni sor mo'i phreng bsti//sor mo'i sho gram bdag stsol TIg/bzhugs
212b3(mdo sde): shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/nyi 'od bye ba brgya 'das bzhugs//bdug ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste//sbyor mo'i sho gam badrag stsol cig/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod
212b4(mdo sde): bzhugs shig/dus rab bstabs la phyag 'tshal bstod//bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste//sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs
212b5(mdo sde): shig/de ltar dul 'gros rab mgyogs bzhugs//bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste//sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/
212b6(mdo sde): stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' bzhugs su gsol//bdag ni sror mo'i phreng ba ste//srir mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/bden
212b7(mdo sde): bzhi mchog mnga' bzhugs su gsol//bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste//ser mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shog/phan mdzad/
213a1(mdo sde): lam brgyad ston pa bzhugs//bdag ni sror mo'i phreng bste//sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shi bla/
213a2(mdo sde): mtshon mchog sum cu gnyis mnga' bzhugs//bdag ni sror mo'i phreng ba ste//sor mo'i sho gam bdagra stsol cig/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/
213a3(mdo sde): dpe bzung brgyad cu mnga' ba bzhugs//bdag ni sror mo'i phreng ba ste//sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shog/nA
213a4(mdo sde): chung mchog la 'dod spangs bzhugs//bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste//sor mo'i sho gam badrag stsol cig/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/ji srid
213a5(mdo sde): bdag ma khros par bzhugs//bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste//sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod ni bzhugs su gsol//lha min dbang
213a6(mdo sde): dang srin po rgyags bcas bcom//bdag ni 'di 'dra'i ngo mtshar yong ma mthong //shin tu mgyogs pa'i shugs ldan khyod su zhig/ral gri ma btab bar du dge
213a7(mdo sde): sbyong bzhugs//bdag gi ming yang khyod kyis ma gsan tam//bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste//sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig//bzhugs shig dge sbyong
213b1(mdo sde): khyod ni bzhugs su gsol//badrag ming gang gis thos pa tsam gyis 'gum 'gyur na//mngon sum bdagra mthong gson par 'gyur ba ni//shin tu mthu ldan sems
213b2(mdo sde): can ga la mchis//bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod ni bzhugs su gsol//bdag nyid mngon sum du ni mchis gyur kyang //rta yi bang ltar shin tu bgyogs bzhud pa//
213b3(mdo sde): lha 'am klu 'am khyod su myur du gsungs//bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/da ni bdag kyang mthu dang mi ldan gyur//brtan pa khyod ni slebs par mi nus
213b4(mdo sde): so//bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste//sor mo'o sho gamra bdag stsol cig/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig/dge sbyong brtul zhugs khrims 'dzin na//
213b5(mdo sde): sho gam gnas las ma 'da' zhig/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste//sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol TIg/de nas bcom ldan 'das dang po'i rgyal po bzhin du gom pa
213b6(mdo sde): bdun gshegs te/seng ge'i lta bas kun tu gzigs nas sor mo'i phreng ba la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//yang dag nyid kyi mtha' la nga gnas te//
213b7(mdo sde): de yang song phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung //'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug
214a1(mdo sde): cig/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//khyod la mtshon rnon sh+lo gam+b+ha sbyin
214a2(mdo sde): par bya//'dus ma byas kyi mtha' lang gnas te//de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//sh+lo gam sbyin gyis
214a3(mdo sde): chos khu zhim po 'thud //'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug/nga ni yang dag rdzogs po'i sangs
214a4(mdo sde): rgyas te//khyod la mtshon rnon shro gam sbyin par bya//zhi ba ma skyes mtha' la nga gnas te//de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go//nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i

219b4(mdo sde): sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung //'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug/nga ni yang drag rdzogs pa'i
219b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas te//khyod la mtshan rnon sho gam sbyin par bya//mkhas pa'i chos kyi mtha' la nga gnas te//de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/nga ni yang dag rdzogs
219b6(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas te//sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung //'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs lnga 'dug/
219b7(mdo sde): nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya//mthong bar dka' ba'i mtha' la nga gnas te//de yang ser phreng khyod kyis mi
220a1(mdo sde): rig go/da ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//sh+lo gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung //'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig/
220a2(mdo sde): tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug/dra nr-i yang dag rdzogs pa'o sangs rgyas te//khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya//kun gzhi med
220a3(mdo sde): pa'i mtha' la nga gnas te//de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung //
220a4(mdo sde): 'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//khyod la
220a5(mdo sde): mtshon rnon sho gram sbyin par bya//za ba med pa'i mtha' la nga gnas te//de yang sngor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//
220a6(mdo sde): sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung //'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug/nga ni yang dag
220a7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya//nyon mongs med pa'i mtha' la nga gnas te//de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/nga ni
220b1(mdo sde): yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//sho gram sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung //'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon+ya tan+da
220b2(mdo sde): rdzogs la 'dug/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//khyed la mtshon rnon sho gram sbyin par bya//de ni drug pa'i mtha' la gnas pa ste//de yang ser phreng khyod kyis
220b3(mdo sde): mi rig go/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung //'dug cig song mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig/tshul khrims brtul
220b4(mdo sde): zhugs yon tan rdzogasA la 'dug/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i spangs rgyas te//khyod la mtshon rnon shro gam sbyin par bya//rnam par grol ba'i mtha' la nga gnas te//
220b5(mdo sde): de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung //'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod
220b6(mdo sde): 'dug cig/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon+ya tan rdzogs la 'dug/nga ni yang dag rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas te//khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam+ba sbyin par bya//nga ni zhi
220b7(mdo sde): ba'i mtha' la gnas pa ste//de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go//nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung //'dug
221a1(mdo sde): cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug/nga nI yang dgra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//khyod
221a2(mdo sde): la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya//nga ni zhi gnas mtha' la granas pa ste//de yang sor phred khyod kyis mi rig go/dA ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//
221a3(mdo sde): sho gam sbyin gyis chos khro zhim po 'thung //'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug/nga ni yang drag
221a4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//khyod la mtshan rnon shro glam sbyin par bya//nye bar zhi ba'i mtha' la nga gnas te//de yang sor phreng khyod kyisku mi rig go/ngani
221a5(mdo sde): yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung //'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig/tshul khrims brtul zhugs
221a6(mdo sde): yon tan rdzogs la 'dug/nga ni yang drug rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//khyod la mtshon rnon sho glam sbyin par bya//nye bar chad pa'i mtha' lang gnas te//de
221a7(mdo sde): yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas to//sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung //'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod

221b2(mdo sde): ba'i mtha' la gnas pa ste//de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/da ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//sho gam sbyin gyis chos khro zhim po 'thung //'dug
221b3(mdo sde): cig sngor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs lnga 'dug/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//khyod la mtshon rnon+do shi
221b4(mdo sde): gam sbyin par bya//nga ni gya nom mtha' la gnas pa ste//de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/da ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//sho gam sbyin kyis

221b6(mdo sde): te//khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya//spros pa med pa'i mtha' la du gnas te//de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs
221b7(mdo sde): rgyas te//sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung //'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug/nga ni yang
222a1(mdo sde): dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//khyod la mtshon rnon sh+lo gam+b+ha sbyin par bya//nga na gnas mang mAtha' la gnas pa ste//de yang sor phreng khyod kyis
222a2(mdo sde): mi rig go/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung //'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig/tshul khrims

222a4(mdo sde): nga gnas te//de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//sho gam sbyin gyis tshes khu zhim po 'thung //'dug cig stor/

222a6(mdo sde): par bya//sgyu ma 'dul ba'i mtha' la nga gnas te//de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhimi
222a7(mdo sde): po 'thung //'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//khyod

226a6(mdo sde): chos khu zhim po 'thung //'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug/dri na yang dag rdzogs pa'i
226a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas te//khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya//nga dang nga yi med pa'i mtha' la nga gnas te//de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/nga ni yang
226b1(mdo sde): dadrug rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//sho gan+da sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung //'dub cig sdor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan

226b3(mdo sde): phreng khyod kyis mi rig go//nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung //'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig
226b4(mdo sde): tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rtogs la 'dug/nga ni yung dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//khyod la mtshon rnon sh+lo gam sbyin par bya//zhi gnas kun gyi mtha'
226b5(mdo sde): lcalung gnas te//de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/de ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//sho gam+ba sbyin gyis chos khro zhim po 'thung //'dug ci ga sor
226b6(mdo sde): mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs lnga 'dug/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i spongs rgyas te//khyod la mtshon rnon sho gem sbyin par
226b7(mdo sde): bya//lam gcad pa yi mtha' lang gnas te//de yang sor phreng khyed kyis mi rigag/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//sho ga ma sbyin gyis chos khro zhim pa
227a1(mdo sde): 'thung //'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs lnga 'dug/dra ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
227a2(mdo sde): te//khyod la mtshon rnon sh+lo gam sbyin par bya//stong chen sgo yi mtha' la nga gnas te//de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/
227a3(mdo sde): sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung //'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug/da ni yang
227a4(mdo sde): dgra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//khyod la mtshon rnon sho gram sbyin par bya//nyon mongs kun spangs byang mthar du gnas te//de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go//
227a5(mdo sde): nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhom po 'thung //'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig/tshul khrims brtul zhugs
227a6(mdo sde): yon tan rdzogasA la 'dug/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya//sred pa zad pa'i mtha' lung gnas te//de yang
227a7(mdo sde): sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung //'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig
227b1(mdo sde): tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//khyod la mtshon rnon sho gram sbyin par bya//'dod chags bral 'grog
227b2(mdo sde): mtha' la nga gnas te//de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go//nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//sh+lo gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung //'dug cig sor
227b3(mdo sde): mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//khyod la mtshon rnon sho gram sbyin par
227b4(mdo sde): bya//bde mchog mya ngan 'das mthar nga gnas te//de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu
227b5(mdo sde): zhim po 'thung //'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug/de ni yang drag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//
227b6(mdo sde): khyod la mtshan rnon sho gam sbyin par bya//rtag brtan mchog shis rab bsil mtha' lha dra gnas te//de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/nga ni yang dag rdzogs
227b7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas te//sho gom sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung //'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug/
228a1(mdo sde): da ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//sho gam mtshon rnon khyod la sbyin par bya//shin tu rno ba'i mtshon 'di myur bor la//rig pa'i ye shes
228a2(mdo sde): skyabs su myur du shog/tshur shog slob dpon ngan 'gro'i dbang song bas//chos ma yin po'i phung po chos su sems//de nas bdag nyid khong du chud par 'gyur//
228a3(mdo sde): kun kyang chad pas rab 'jigs shing //thams cad la ni srog phangs te//bdag nyid kho na dper byas la//mri bsad gsod du mi gzhug go/pha rol ji ltar
228a4(mdo sde): de bzhin bdag/bdag nyid ji lta de bzhin gzhan//bdag rang nyid ni dper byas la//mi bsad gsod du mi gzhug go/srin po'i byad gzugs de ltar ma
228a5(mdo sde): byed cig/yan lag lus la shin tu khrag chags shing //bsad pa'i mtshon cha rnon po khrag byugs pa//khyod kyis phrag la thogs pa mi mdzes so//sor
228a6(mdo sde): mo'i phreng ba mgo las myur du bor//kye ma bram ze'i bu'i las 'di 'dra zhing //chos 'dod bram ze'i bu yang 'di 'dra na//srin po ma rungs pa dag ji 'dra ba/
228a7(mdo sde): phyugs rnams la yang ma ni mchod yin na//kye ma brtse med sdig grogs dbang song mi//shin tu rno ba'i mtshon cha gdengs brtsams te//rang gi ma yi drung du
228b1(mdo sde): nye bar 'ong //gang yang sor mo'i phreng ba khyod lta bu//sdig byed mi yi nang na gcan gzan yin//srin po'i nang na shin tu sdig can de//lha min nang na'ang ma rungs las byed
228b2(mdo sde): pa//sor phreng khyod ni shin tu ches dkris shing //sdig pa sems pa mi yis spangs pa ste//ma ni 'jig rten dag na dka' mchog byed//nyon mongs des ni zla bcu ru ma na
228b3(mdo sde): bsrel//de nas phyis ni btsas par gyur nas kyang //bshang gci mang reg sdug bsngal myong bas gsos//ltos shig sor phreng khyod kyi gtso mo ni//mig ni khrag
228b4(mdo sde): gi mchi mas rab tu gang //bud med bu la byams shing sdug pa yis//mngar gyi bum pa phrag la thogs te 'ongs//rgan mo nyon mongs rlung gi sgra yang bshig/gos
228b5(mdo sde): ngan ral po rlung gis bskyod cing 'brul//lus la rdul gos rkang pa ser ka byung //rgan mo nyon mongs sdug bsngal chen po myong //lus bskams yun ring rlung dang lhags
228b6(mdo sde): pas nyen//sdug bsngal mang pos shin tu gdungs par gyur//bud med de ni rnam par snying myos te//bsam yas sdug bsngal ldan zhing kyi hud 'bod//de nas sor
228b7(mdo sde): mo'i phreng ba'i mas de bzhin gshegs pa dang /bdag gi bu sor mo'i phreng ba gnyis phan tshun lan dang yang lan gyis rgya zhing cher rtsod pa las bdag gi bu pham ste/lag
229a1(mdo sde): chu bor bar mthong nas/sdug pa'i sdug bsngal chen pos reg ste/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan rin chen gter
229a2(mdo sde): sbyor ba//bdag gis nyon mongs myong bas rnyed//bdag gis mig tu gyur pa thob//mig gi rdul rnams bdag gis bsal//bdag gri bu ni mi khrag gis//
229a3(mdo sde): kye ma lus drang zas la reg/kun tu 'khyams shing mtshon rnon thogs//'gro ba mang po'i phung po gsod//bdag gi bu yang mgu byas shing //sangs rgyas
229a4(mdo sde): phyag bya'am ji ltar bya//khyod kyi bu ngan 'di 'dra zhes//'gro mang tshig rtsub mnyan mi nus//de la sogs pa rnam pa du mar smra'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
229a5(mdo sde): snor mo'i phreng la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sor mo'i phreng ba khyod kyi gtso mo ni shIng drung na 'dug ste/de lta bu shin tu dka' ba byed pa'i bud med 'di la khyod ral
229a6(mdo sde): gri thogs te/bdag gi ma mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ro snyam nas bsad par 'dod pa ni sor mo'i phreng ba chos ma yin pa'i phung po la chos su nor to//'di lta ste dper na//
229a7(mdo sde): sos ka'i dbyar zla ra ba'i dus la smig rgyu ba la chu yin snyam nas ri dwags rnams kun tu 'khyams pa de bzhin du/sor ma'i phreng ba khyod kyang slob dpon ngan pa'i man
229b1(mdo sde): dgra gis rmongs par gyur te/chos ma yin pa la chos su sems pa'i sems can ni mnar med pa zhes bya ba'i mi zad pa chen por 'gro'o//sor mo'i phreng ba de bzhin gshegs
229b2(mdo sde): pa'i skyabs su myur du song zhig song zhig/zhugs shig/sor mo'i phreng ba khyod ma 'jigs shig/de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dzugs pa med pa'i 'byung gnas te/sangs
229b3(mdo sde): rgyas ni sems cin thams cad la sgra gcan zin dang mtshungs par gzigs pa/na ba rnams gso ba dang /skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs so//sangs rgyas ni dbye gnas
229b4(mdo sde): no bzhugs pa/rtsa lpag med pa rnams kyi rtsa lag go//sangs rgyas ni dbul po rnams kyi mi zad pa'i gter ro//sangs rgyas ni lom stong pa rnams la lam bzang po ston
229b5(mdo sde): pa'o//sangs rgyas ni 'jigs pas gzir ba rnams kyi skyabs su gyur pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa ni gru zhig pa rnams kyi grur gyur pa'o//mtshon rnon po myur du bor la/
229b6(mdo sde): rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa ldong zhig/song la bla ma'i rkang pa la gtugs te bzod pa gsol cig/rgan mo nyin mongs ma la rab tu 'byung bar thong zhig
229b7(mdo sde): ces gsol ba thob la srid pa mi zad pa las sems can rnams sgrol zhig dang /she gam bzang po rab tu dbyung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa sbyin no//sor mo'i phreng ba khyod
230a1(mdo sde): sun ring por lam dran par 'khyams shing ngal bar gyur gyis chos kyi ro'i chu 'thung zhig/sor mo'i phreng ba khyod kyang sho gam len pa yin/de bzhin
230a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'ang sho gram len pa yin te/sror mo'i phreng ba de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sho gam len pa lam sel gyi rgyal po yin te/sems
230a3(mdo sde): can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral cing lam sel/rtag tu sho gam len to//de nas sor mo'i phreng bas de nyid du srin po lhur shin tu rno zhing mi zad pa'i
230a4(mdo sde): mtshon rnon po bor nas/byis pa lo gcig lon pas me mdag blangs pa dang me mngag de bor nas rang gi lag lnga nyug cing /bus te cho nges 'dobs pa de bzhin du sor
230a5(mdo sde): mo'i phreng ba'ang mtshon shin tu rno ba de bor nusra ngu zhing cho nges btab ste/mi nyis stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba'i sor mo'i phreng ba thogs pa'ang rang gi lus las phud
230a6(mdo sde): nas kyi hud ces zer te/dper na/mi zhig nyal ba las rang gi rkang pa la sbrul gyis zin ma thag tu myur du sad nas/lag pa bskum pa las sprugs te/shin tu
230a7(mdo sde): mi zad pa'i sbrul bzung nas 'dor ba de bzhin du sor mo'i phreng ba'ang rang gi mgo las sor mo'i phreng ba myur du bor ro//ji ltar bdag nyid gdon dang bral bar gyur par
230b1(mdo sde): shes nus ngo tsha ba de bzhin du/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas kyang /bdag nyid mngon par rig nas me tog rtsa lag 'tsho zhes bya ba'i kha dog ltar khrag gis lus thams cad
230b2(mdo sde): yog cing /sprin chen po ltar mig mchi mas gang nas rab tu bu zhing bdag la rdeg ste/ji ltar sbrul gyis zin nas smyos pa'i mi sbrul ltar ltos 'phye zhing 'gro 'gro ba de
230b3(mdo sde): bzhin sor mo'i phreng ba'ang tshang shing sum cu rtsa dgu kho ra khor yug gi sa la ltos 'phye zhing song nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs mgro la bzhag ste/tshig 'di skad ces
230b4(mdo sde): smras so//kye ma sangs rgyas byams pa'i mchog mnga' zhing //skyes 'dul kha sgyur bdag gi slad gshegs pas//gti mug chos kyi rlabs chen mi shes chu//rgya mtsho
230b5(mdo sde): tshe lngas bdag deng nges par bsgral//kye ma sangs rgyas thugs rje mchog mnga' zhing //skyes 'drul kha sbyar bdag gi slad gshegs pas//'di rtsa 'bras bu lo ma mang
230b6(mdo sde): bya yi//dgon pa la sta ni deng bdag nges par bsgral//kye ma sangs rgyas dga' ba mchog mnga' zhing //skyes 'dul khe sgyur bdag gi slad gshegs pas//lta ba sna
230b7(mdo sde): tshogs ri mer bris pa yis//stag gi lag nas bdag deng nges par bsgral//kye ma sangs rgyas btang snyoms mchog mnga' yang dag gzigs//skyes 'dul kha lo sgyur
231a1(mdo sde): ba bdag gi slad gshegs pas//'o dod 'thob dang cher 'bod mnar med pa'i//sems can dmyal chen gtad nas deng bdag bad+ma la//'di ni
231a2(mdo sde): skyabs med pa yi skyabs lags te//rtswa lag med pa rnams kyi rtsa lag go/bdag gis yang tsha ba'i las bgyis na//bdag ni 'di 'drar gyur la skyabs mdzad
231a3(mdo sde): gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sor mo'i phreng ba la slar bka' stsal pa/sor mo'i phreng ba khyod longs la myur du song ste/ma'i rkang pa la gtugs la bzod
231a4(mdo sde): pa gsol cig/bzod pa gsol nas/rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol cig ces gsol ba thob cig/de nas sor mo'i phreng ba bcom ldan
231a5(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung nas langs nas/rang gi ma ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /rang gi me la lan mang du bskor ba byas te/chu srin byis pa gsod ces bya ba
231a6(mdo sde): bzhin du 'gre zhing ngus nas cho nges btab ste/rang gi ma la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so//slob dpon ngan pa'i dbang song bas//mi stong dgu brgya bkum
231a7(mdo sde): lags te//kye ma bdag gis mi zad bgyis//bdag gis sdig phung mang po rnyed//ma khyod bdag gi rten lags te//sangs rgyas shin tu skyabs su gda'//
231b1(mdo sde): khyod kyi zhabs ni mgor bzhag ste//rab 'byung bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol//de nas mas rang gi bu la tshigs su bcad pas phyir smras pa/dasra ni bu khyod btang zin gyis///
231b2(mdo sde): rab byung 'jig rten pha rol spyod//bdag kyang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la//de bzhin rab tu 'byung bar gsol//kye ma bcom ldan bsam mi khyab//de bzhin gshegs
231b3(mdo sde): pa dpe med de//sangs rgyas bdag gi bu sgrol ba//'jig rten kun la thugs kyang brtsi//mgon po khyod kyi gzugs rnams dang //yon tan dpe yang 'gro la med//
231b4(mdo sde): bdag gis cung zad brjod nus te//de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi lha//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgan mo la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad gsungs so//khyod kyi
231b5(mdo sde): bu ni nga mdun du//rab tu 'byung bar gnang ba ni//legs so bud med nyon mongs ma//rgyun mi 'chad par bde bar shog/khyod ni rab tu byung ba yi//dus las shin
231b6(mdo sde): tu yol zin gyis//dge bsnyen ma yi chos rnams kyis//rgan mo bdag nyid dbugs phyung zhig/skad cig tsam du 'dir sdod de//rgyal po gsal rgyal ji srid
231b7(mdo sde): na//'di dag tu ni mthong gyur pa//de tsam du yang bde bar 'dug//bam po gnyis pa//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
232a1(mdo sde): lha rnams dang /lha'i bu mo'i tshogs dang bcasu pas bskor cing mdun du bdar te/snang ba chen pos mnyan du yod pa'i yul thams cad snang bar
232a2(mdo sde): byas nas/de bzhin gshegs pa dang /sor mo'i phreng ba gnyis mi ltar 'thab pa dang /cang shes ltar 'thab pa mthong ste/rab tu dga' nas bcom ldan 'das
232a3(mdo sde): dang sor mo'i phreng ba gnyis la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so//kye ma mi 'dul kha lo sgyur//sangs rgyas noR+Ya la bzang po mdzes//kye ma 'di ltar
232a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis//sor mo'i phreng ba rab tu btul//rtag tu mi yi khrag gis lus byugs te//lha min dbang dang lha min srin po dang //gnod sbyin stobs dang
232a5(mdo sde): ldan pa rtsal chen dang //klu dang sha za lto 'phye mi 'am ci//stobs ldan rtsal che na nam mkha' lding dag dang //sems can gtum po stabs ldan gzhan
232a6(mdo sde): dge kyang //sor phreng ming thos nyal bzhin mig btsums 'dug/de 'dra gtum po'i las byed sor phred de//mi yi rgyal po tsam gyis ga la sod//de ni
232a7(mdo sde): btsas ma thag tu de yi tshe//lha dang lha ma yin pa kun skrag na//mi yi rgyal po tsam lta ci zhig smos//ming gis go cha mtshan kun rdol cing snang //de ltar drag
232b1(mdo sde): cing stobs ldan rtsal che ba//kye ma de bzhin gshegs kyis btul ba legs//mthu drang rtsal kyang bsam gyis myi khyab mnga'//sangs rgyas zla sam gyis mi khyab
232b2(mdo sde): srungs rgyus ni//yul dang ye shes spyod yul bsam mi khyab//skor mo'i phreng ba de ring mdzes par snang //shin tu gzugs bzang btso ma'i gser ltar gyur/
232b3(mdo sde): nyi ma'i zor shar kha dog lta bur mdzes//ser phreng byad sdug tshul khrims gnas pa mdzes//tshul khrims bral ba'i mi ni yong mi mdzes//kye ma bdag dang khyim
232b4(mdo sde): chos mang thob snyam//sor mo'i phreng ba chos gang stsal par bgyi//sangs rgyas bcom ldan bdag la thugs brtse bzhes//sor mo'i phreng ba dge sbyong tshul 'dra stsal//
232b5(mdo sde): slong ba kun gyi rgyal po chen po la//de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gzugs su gsol//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces
232b6(mdo sde): smras so//skyes bu dam pa nga'i lha'i gos mchog 'di khyod kyi chos gos gyis shig/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so//sbrang ma
232b7(mdo sde): lta bu khyod su zhig/brgya byin ma dad pa'i sbyin pa nga len nam//brgya byin khyod ni 'dod pa'i gong bu ste//khyod kyis da dung chu klung mang po ma brgal te//rang bzhin
233a1(mdo sde): gyis gcer bus gzhan la ji ltar gos sbyin/khyod ni rang bzhin gyis gcer bu na/chos gos kyi phyir ji ltar rin thang med pa'i gos gzhan la sbyin//
233a2(mdo sde): dper na rgyal po'i gyad stong thub pa bdag nyid lus thams cad thog mar 'gyel na/ba lang rgan po 'dam du song ba bzhin/ma brgal ba nyid du 'gyel bas rgyal po
233a3(mdo sde): gzhan gyi gyad sbyong thub pa la ji ltar brgal bar bya/de bzhin du ngas kyang khyod kyi rin thang med pa'i gos gyon nu brgya byin mig stong can nyon mongs pa'i bdud byed pa
233a4(mdo sde): dang /rang bzhin gyis bdud la sogs pa drang ji ltar 'gyed/ngas ni bdud mtha' yas pa dang /'thab cing nyon mongs pa mang po zad par bya ste/dge sbyong gi/
233a5(mdo sde): chos de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pa'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis la spyad par bya'i/khyod kyi mal cha ni de ltar gnas par mi bya'o//brgya byin mig
233a6(mdo sde): stong can khyod ni lha rnams kyi dbang phyug ma yin te/khyod ni dmus long du gyur pa dang khyad par med do//brgya byin khyod kyis gtum po'i las kyi sdig pa ci 'dra
233a7(mdo sde): ba'i bye brag mi shes so//sor mo'i phreng ba gtum po yin par sbrang ma lta bu khyod kyis ji ltar shes/kye ma brgya byin gyis gsal bar gtum po'i las mi shes so///
233b1(mdo sde): bstan pa'i tshul shes na rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa thog mur rin thang med pa'i gos gyon na/dge sbyong ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/brgya byin khyod ni rab tu 'byung ba'i dben pa
233b2(mdo sde): tsam yang mi shes te/brgya byin khyed ni bstan pa las phyi rol tu gyur pa'o//'di lta ste/nor bu dang /mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /gser dang /nor bu zla mdzes la
233b3(mdo sde): sogs pa'i rin po ches gang ba'i bum pa brgyad khri dang /sa la sbram dang /rin po che'i bum pa gzhan yang dpag tu med pa spangs te/mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin du rin
233b4(mdo sde): thang med pa'i gos bor te/gang dge sbyong gi chos la nges par byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras thu bo/gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po gnas mal nags khrod du 'cha'
233b5(mdo sde): zhing /sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis kyis bsdams te/lus kyis brtul zhugs spyod pa'ang ci'i phyir rin thang med pa'i gos mi gyon/ci'i phyir khang pa'i gnas mal
233b6(mdo sde): spangs shing gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po bdud rtsi lta bu'i kha zas sna tshogs dang /sha'i ro'i kha zas spangs te/sha med par brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa la yang dag par spyod//
233b7(mdo sde): khyim nas khyim du rgyu zhing lkug pa ma yin par lkug par 'du shes pas mdun dang /rgyab dang /glo nas med ces zer ram gshe na'ang bde bar gyur cig ces brtan par phyir
234a1(mdo sde): 'byung ngo //yod ces zer na'ang gnas brtan chags par mi 'gyur te/bde bar gyur cig ces brtan par phyir 'byung la bum pa re res kyang ma
234a2(mdo sde): 'ongs pa'i dge sbyong rnams nam 'tsho'i bar du bza' ba dang /bca' ba dang /bldag pa spyad par gyur na/ci'i phyir de lta bu'i longs spyod kyi phung po chen po dge
234a3(mdo sde): 'dun gyi nor du mo bzhug ste/bdag gir bya ba spangs shing btang nas yi dwags dang /dbul po dang /bkren pa dang /slong ba la sogs pa'i gter zad mi shes
234a4(mdo sde): bar byas pa de lta bu ni brgya byin dge sbyong gi tshos te/til tsam gyi bgra sogs pa de'ang dge sbyong gi chos ma yin no//bran pho dang /bran mo dang /nor rnam pa mang po
234a5(mdo sde): dang /zhing gri dngos po dang /de bzhin du nyo ba dang /'tshong ba de ni dge sbyong gi chos dang mthun pa ma yin te/de dag ni khyim na gnas pa rnams kyi nor lta bu yin no///
234a6(mdo sde): sngar smos pa'i nor de dag len pa gang yin pa dang /rung ba ma yin pa'i nor sbyin par byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni blun por mtshungs te/'bras ma rung bar byed pa'i
234a7(mdo sde): zhing gi ngo dang 'dra bar skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan can de dag da chad pas gcad par bya'o//gang ngas bsad nas sor mo'i phreng bar byas pa de dag thams cad kyang bstan
234b1(mdo sde): pa la sun 'byin pa sha stug ste/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma 'am/dge sbyong ngam/dge sbyong ma gcig kyang med do//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sor
234b2(mdo sde): mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so//chos ni bsad pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de/de bzhin gshegs pa'ang sras gcig po sgra gcan zin bzhin du sems can thams cad
234b3(mdo sde): la gzigs na/ji ltar skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan can rnams kyi yan lag gcad par bka' stsol bar 'gyur/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas/brgya byin lha'i dbang po la 'di
234b4(mdo sde): skad ces smras so//bsad pa dang /mi bsdad pa'i bye brag brgya byin khyod kyis ga la shes/sgyu ma byed pa'i sgyu ma ji ltar zhing pas mi shes pa de bzhin du byang chub sems
234b5(mdo sde): dpa'i yul sgyu ma'ang /brgya byin bstan pa'i phyi rol tu gyur pa zhing pa lta bus ga la shes/mi bsad pa dang /bsad pa la'ang rnam pa gnyis yod de/byang chub sems
234b6(mdo sde): dpa'i gsod pa dang /nyan thos kyi gsod pa ste/rnam pa de gnyis kyang sbrang bu khyod kyis gra la shes/byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang /khyod kyi yul gyi khyad par ni
234b7(mdo sde): nam mkha' la sbrang bu'i 'phur stabs bzhin no//'di lta ste dper na/dge sbyong 'dres zin pa la dge sbyong rnams 'gog par zhugs na/skye bo mang pos ci'i phyir 'gog
235a1(mdo sde): pa la zhugs zhes dris na brgya byin khyod la dri ste/de'i tshe de ltar 'gog pa'i zlog pa de mchog yin nam/bsgo ba de'i tshe gal te 'gog pa de shin su
235a2(mdo sde): la sdig par 'gyur te/gal te gsod pa'i sems sbyangs na/su la'ang sdig par mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin du skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan can rnams chad pas bcad
235a3(mdo sde): pa las gal te shi na su la'ang sdig par mi 'gyur gyi/bsod nams kyi phung po mang du bskyed do//de ltar gsod pa dang /mi gsod pa'i bye brag ni shes par dka' ste/
235a4(mdo sde): de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gsod pa'i chos su mi 'gyur ro//dper na/sman pas nad pa'i lce'i drung du gtsags bus btab ste/khrag phyung ba las de'i
235a5(mdo sde): 'og tu de gal te shi na ci sman pa la sdig tu 'gyur ram sman pa ni mi mang po la phan par byed pas sman pa la sdig tu mi 'gyur te/gsod pa'i sems ni ma gtogs
235a6(mdo sde): so//de bzhin du skyon chags pa'i ye mtshan can rnams chad pas bcad pa las gal te shi na su la'ang jig par mi 'gyur gyi/bsod nams kyi phung po mang du 'phel
235a7(mdo sde): te/gsod pa'i sems ni ma gtogs so//dper na bu slob dpon mthong ma thag tu byis pa shin du 'aslob dpon la sdig par 'gyur ram/de bzhin du khong nas
235b1(mdo sde): dpa' ba'i gzi brji du bathong nas/mthong ba tsam gyis skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan can shi nA ci zlog pa la sdig par 'gyur ram/rdog pa la sdig par mi 'gyur bye/bskyod/
235b2(mdo sde): nams mang du 'phel te/gsod pa'i sems ni ma gtogs so/de'i phyir brgya byin khyod sdig pa'i las dang /bsod nams rnams kyi las kyi bye brag mi shes so//dge sbyong
235b3(mdo sde): dang /dge sbyong ma yin pa'i bye brag mi shes kyis dam pa'i chos la sdang ba'i yo mtshan can rnams ni chad pas gcad do//gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po la sogs pa nyan
235b4(mdo sde): thos chen po brgyad cu dang /sa yA gro zhun skyes dang /thug pa med la sogs pa de dag thams cad kyang nor gyi bum pa mang po bor nas yo byad bsnyungs shing chog shes pas
235b5(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos la gnas pa dag ci rin thang med pa'i gos gyon nam/dge slong gi lus mgo bregs shing rgyags pa thams cad bcom pa mgon med pa bzhin du/lag na
235b6(mdo sde): lhung bzed thogs pa gos la sogs pa yang kha dog bsgyur cing kha dog ngan par byed pa'i dge slong de dag la bag med pa ji ltar rung /rtag tu grang ba dang /tsha ba dang //
235b7(mdo sde): bru ba dang /skom pas nyen cing ri dwags bzhin du rtag par rkang lag rdul gyis reg kyang tshul khrims las cung zad 'das pa'i dri ma'ang med pa khra'i sgo nga bzhin du
236a1(mdo sde): tshul khrims srung ba de dag la 'du 'dzi dang /smra bral dga' bas ci zhig bya/bal glang mche ba bcad pa bzhin du 'jigs shing gzugs mi sdug pa
236a2(mdo sde): de dag la rin thung med pa'i gos gyon pas ci zhig bya/lan gnyis su de skad ma zer ci gro/brgya byin khyod ni bstan pa'i phyi rol pa yin te/mu stegs rnams su
236a3(mdo sde): bram ze'i dam tshig la gdol pa mi chud pa de bzhin du/khyod kyang phyi rol gyi gdol pa yin gyis sbrang bu khyod cang ma smra zhig/de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag
236a4(mdo sde): pos snang ba chen po byung nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/de bzhin gshegs pa dang /sor mo'i phreng ba la lha'i mchod
236a5(mdo sde): pa chen po byas nas/bcom ldan 'das dang /sor mo'i phreng ba la tshig 'di skad ces smras so//kye ma bdag gis g.yul chen rab mthong ste//seng ge gnyis
236a6(mdo sde): ni drag tu 'thab pa bzhin//kye ma sangs rgyas mi 'dul khe lo sgyur//de bzhin gshegs pas sor phreng dge bar btul//sbrul gyis sman pa mthong nas shin
236a7(mdo sde): tu sgra 'byin cing //mi 'jigs kha rlangs 'byin pa zhi ba myur btul ltar//de bzhin 'jig rten gsum gyi sman pa mthong nas ni//sor phreng gtum rab las
236b1(mdo sde): bgyid shin tu dul bar gyur//khams gsum sman pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//kyang mchog rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa thabs kyi sku
236b2(mdo sde): mnga' ba//bsam yas stobs 'chang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//chos nyid la yang sor phreng bzhag pa ni//de ring lha khyod shin tu rnam par mdzes//de ltar shin
236b3(mdo sde): tu mdzes pa dpe mi rnyed//de phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dpe ma mchis//ser phreng tshul khrims deng gnas shin tu mdzes//dul zhing byang la 'jigs pa ma mchis
236b4(mdo sde): shing //gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis kyang gser 'dra ste//dzam+bu'i chu bo gser 'bar mdog ltar mdzes//de bzhin gshegs la bdag gsol bdag la thugs
236b5(mdo sde): brtse bas//bdag gi 'phrul gos de bzhin gshegs pas deng bzhes te//sor mo'i phreng bas lha yi chos gos bgyi bar gsol//de yi 'bras bus bdag kyang
236b6(mdo sde): byang chub mchog thob shog/sor phreng chos gos bdag gi gos bgos nas//tshungs pa'i spyod pa sems brtan rtogs par shog/bcom ldan 'das lce sor mo'i
236b7(mdo sde): phreng ba yang //tshangs par spyod pa phun sum tshogs par srungs//de nas sor mo'i phreng bas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po la slar 'di skad ces smras so//phra ma
237a1(mdo sde): can cal col smra ba khyod su zhig/sor mo'i phreng bas bdag gi gos bgos nas/sor mo'i phreng bas tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs srungs shig/ser mo
237a2(mdo sde): phreng ba yun ring du tshul khrims srungs shig ces nga la brnyas shing smra ba/tshangs pa ngan pa tshangs pa ma yin pa'i tshangs pa'i gzugasu 'dir 'ongs na tshangs pa zhes bya ba'i don ci/'jig/
237a3(mdo sde): rten na tshangs pa'i las gang yin/ngas sbrang bu lta bu las gos blangs te bgos la tshul khrims dang /brtul zhugs yun rang por bsrung ngam/nga ni su'i khol po'ang ma
237a4(mdo sde): yin te/nga nI su'i dad pa la'ang mi 'jug/nga la su'i bu lon yang ma chags te/ngas ni sngon sems can dbul po rnams la nor byi no//dper na dpyid zla ra ba la
237a5(mdo sde): 'phyang mo nyug pa'i thag pas btags te/ring du song yang slar myur du rang gi gnasu 'khor ba de bzhin du tshangs pa sbrang bu khyod kyang dpyod zla ra ba la 'phyang thag btags pa
237a6(mdo sde): ltar tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bde ba myong nas phyir ltung ba'i chos can du ltung bar 'gyuraro//byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i don yon tan gyi 'thad pa mi shes par
237a7(mdo sde): gang sdig pa dang /sdig pa ma yin par rtog pa khyod 'dra ba sbrang bu lta bu de dag srid pa dag na/mi mkhas shing mi ldan pa 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi nang na
237b1(mdo sde): /ngas pa na nga na ma sgru na da sudu ma rdzus du rgyu na das
237b2(mdo sde): sbyong buM m+b+ha ltung du shes kyis/byang chub sems pa'i spyod pa la rlabs shig/de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos/son ma'i phreng ba lnga srung 'di nad ces smras
237b3(mdo sde): zer mo'i rlung dri ma nyis stong dru gtsug ma ching ba bsad de/ dza pa byas pa ni mngo na snyam du dung yang snang ngo //khyod kyi drug shul gyi las ni byed shung dadu/
237b4(mdo sde): khrub kyang byed ma'adi lta bu drug shul rgyu las ma sbyin no/drug shul gyi las m+b+hi zla yin/gal te 'di /bu 'a ma yinan/sbyin gyi mdzad
237b5(mdo sde): 'ang m+b+hi buM gi yod de/ser mi'i phreng ba bag yod par gyisa'o/khyod kyis lngas byas pa rnams rjenas spyod bar 'byar bde ltar ba dz+nyAn pa
237b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ni thug sa dz+nyAn te/sir mu'i'aphreng ba la sogs pa gzhum pa'i la skyo byud pa rnams nges par stsal lo/dri nas se ma'i nga
237b7(mdo sde): bas tshangs pa mi mdzod kyi bdag po la slar 'di skad ces smras so//tshangs pa khyod srin bu phra mo bzhin du mtshang zhing 'khyim du kar 'gru ste ga pa dang mi sdig pa mi shes pa'i na
238a1(mdo sde): sgru/rgyun dul la smrig rgyugs rlung du sa nanam naman du nan shing giHpa'i sted na sbyin blam khyud blung nga mdzo /
238a2(mdo sde): na pad ldan pa nga rlung smra sate/ gnas rnying ba dang / brjod pa dar dang byubyungan masbyin na gnod na sbyin ma
238a3(mdo sde): so//drim pa yin na gas d+d+he'aM sgyu skur la /ba de bzhin+da rme bden pa nyid kyang seng ma'i byung ba rdzun par nas sbyin cing bdag nyi dang /
238a4(mdo sde): mang po'ang shin tu brnyas te/phyis kyu ma'i phreng po de snang bu lta dus kyang shes/sems ni na mang pos kyang shes par 'gyur ro//zla gros 'argyal pa blun pa la la na
238a5(mdo sde): nigs byed du sa nas/shing myong ni zang de na gas me tog nus pa mdzad pa dang /me yin pa sgyum du byas mas te/skrig nas gling drung tshong 'dus skyed /
238a6(mdo sde): bsdang po 'ang de bzhin du byin pa dang /rim gyis mye dang /shing mya ngan med pa'i bye brag shes pa de bzhin du spyad bu lta bu khyod kyis sdig pa dang /sdig pa ma yin
238a7(mdo sde): pa rim gyis shes pade'i 'gyur ro//de nas phyis skye ba mang pos tshod sgyu ma'i phung po lta bu 'di shes par 'i rgyu gyis tshangs po don pa khyod lan gnyis su dang /
238b1(mdo sde): zer cig/de ltar rdzun smra ba ma skyob par khyod lta bu blo zhan pa/sbrang bu lta bu rnams ni cang ma zer bar 'dug cig/de nas 'jig rten skyong ba bzhis snang ba chen po phyung ste/de
238b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dang /sor mo'i phreng ba la mchod pa chen po byas nas/bcom ldan 'das dang sar mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so//kye ma skyes bu stag gi thob mo
238b3(mdo sde): mchog/don dram brgal zhing lan ljon shin tu mdzes//kye ma ston pa mi 'dul kha lo sgyur//de phyir mtha' yas stobs 'dzin sangs rgyas lags//zhabs mchog pad+ma
238b4(mdo sde): lta bur mnyen zhing 'jam//rdul gyis mi reg pa la phyag 'tshal to//lan mangs skyabs mchis de bzhin gshegs pa la//gsol pa bdag gi lhung bzed sor phreng
238b5(mdo sde): stsol//sor mo'i phreng ba dang mdzes te//nam mkha' la ni zla ltar mdzes//sor phreng tshul khrims yon tan dang //brtul zhugs gzi brjid rdzogs pa mdzes//de nas
238b6(mdo sde): sor mo'i phreng bas 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi la slar smras pa sbrul lta bu 'jig rten skyong ba phra mo khyod su dag cig 'jig rten skyong ba 'jig rten skyong ba snyam ste/nga rgyal gyis khengs
238b7(mdo sde): pas bdag gis lha'i lhung bzeng sbyin no zhes nga la 'drid cing /yi dwags ltar 'jungs pa dag yud tsam gzhan gyi tshe nga'i yang ba dag ltos shig/gyo mo'i snod ni su la'ang
239a1(mdo sde): mi drug san/'jig rten gyi mgron po sgyum du snyams pas bdag gi wA lI ba s+yAng sbyin nam/'jig rten+da na ma rungs du'i yum tshan can rnamapa
239a2(mdo sde): thal bar byed pa ni 'jig rten skyong ba zhes grags te/chos yang dag par bskyod par bya'i/'jig rten bskyong bar mi bya'o//yang dper na lwa las khru byug gi sgra
239a3(mdo sde): thos sam/kha dog phun sum tshogs pa mthong ba dang de nas yud tsam na/bya rog skad 'byin pa mthong nas khu byug khu byug ces nor ba de bzhin du khyod kyang chos su
239a4(mdo sde): sems shing chos ma yin pa srung ngo //nags khrod na 'dug pa'i bya rog skad 'byin pa mthong nas/khru byug snyam du sems pa bzhin du 'jig rten skyong ngo //khyed
239a5(mdo sde): bzhis chos skyong sa la 'jig rten ma skyong zhig/'jig rten skyong ba skye bo mi shes pa sbrang bu lte khyed bzhi zung thub par gyis la cang ma smra zhig/de nas bdud sdig can
239a6(mdo sde): sor mo'i phreng ba'i thud du 'ongs te/de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa cher byas nas/sor mo'i phreng ba lnga 'di skad ces smras so//sor mo'i phreng ba myur du byung /
239a7(mdo sde): nga yis tshong 'dus grong zhugs bslus pa ni//sor mo'i phreng ba ni mi dga' ste//sems can dmyal ba gting nas khyod brgal to//de nas sor mo'i phreng pos
239b1(mdo sde): bdud sdig can la slar 'di skad ces smras so//sdig can khyi rkun sbrang bu lta bu phar song /khyod ci shin tu spobs par smra 'am/bdud sdig can khyod dang myur du byung ste
239b2(mdo sde): song zhig/ji srid du khyi ltar bcing ba lngas bcings te/rkang pa g.yon pas ma bsdams pa de'i bar du ni bdud khyod rab tu rten to//grong dang /tshong 'dus dang /
239b3(mdo sde): lung ba'i sgo thams cad kyang ngas stong par byas te/dper na nam mkha' lding ri rab kyi steng du 'dug nas rgya mtsho dpag tshad kyi bar mang po na/klu phrug mthong na len
239b4(mdo sde): pa de bzhin du sems can dmyal ba pa thams cad la'ang nga nam mkha' lding ltar rnam par rtse zhing thar pa'i khu bas ngoms so//rtag tu bdud sdig can khyod kyi mgo bcad de//
239b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu'i glang po che rnams rol to//bdud khyi rkun lta bu khyod cang ma zer bar chos bdud rtsi'i tshig nyon la yud tsam gyi bar du sdod de/chos thos nas
239b6(mdo sde): rlung gri grong khyer du song zhig dang /tshong 'dus dang /grong khyer rnams shes par 'gyur ro//de nas lha'i bu dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dang /sor
239b7(mdo sde): mo'i phreng ba la lha'i mchod pa chen po byas nas/tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to//de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs mchog bdag gis mchog gtugs te/
240a1(mdo sde): pad+mo mchog dang 'dra ba'i bsngags brjod bstod par bgyi//bde gshegs pad+mo 'dab stong spyan mnga' 'dab stong ldan//zhabs mchog 'jam pa
240a2(mdo sde): pad+mo 'dab ma stong can 'dra//zhabs ni pad+mo dmar skye 'dra zhing rdul mi chags//zhabs mchog ut+pa l-i 'dab 'dra phyag mthil shin tu 'jam//ut+pal
240a3(mdo sde): 'dri ba ma mchog gi zhal gyi dri bda' ste//'jig rten dag na ut+pal 'dab ma bzhin+da du bsil//badre gshegs kun tu blta sdug ut+pal 'dra ba mchog/
240a4(mdo sde): bzhin//dbu skra 'jam zhing snum la ut+pal mthing ka 'dra//dbu sku ut+pal mthing ka dri mchog bsil ba 'dra//ut+pal mthang kr-i snum pa'i mdog 'dra
240a5(mdo sde): yid du 'ong //dbu skra nyam phra zhing lcang lo phreng ba mnga'//khyod kyi tshems mchog ku mu da dang zla ba 'dra//ku mu da dang zla ba pad+mo'i snying po ltar//chu dang
240a6(mdo sde): nya lcibs dag gi skyon gyis yong myi gos//tshems ni ku mud zla ba lta bur dri ma med//nyes pas mi gos tshems mchog ku mud kha dog 'dra//tshems kyang
240a7(mdo sde): nyon mongs bsal cing thabs mchog tshems mnga' ba//puN+Da ri ka bzhin du dri med gsal ba'i blo//puN+Da ri ka bzhin du sems mchog dag pa ste//sems
240b1(mdo sde): ni puN+Da ri ka lta bur mi gos pa//'dod khro glen pa'i nye sra spangs sangs rgyas puN+Da ri//sangs rgyas pad+mo dkar po lta bu'i blo gros mnga'//pad+mo'i drung na ut+pal dri mchag
240b2(mdo sde): mdzes pa ltar//sangs rgyas deng mdzes ut+pal gnyis ltar sor phreng mdzes//sor phreng dong mdzes 'di ltar sdig can bdud kyang ni//gos dkar gyon pa sA thog
240b3(mdo sde): mar btul cing pam byas te//lan dang yang lan dag gis de bzhin gshegs deng rol//'di ni 'jig rten du yang mgon po myur du 'gyur//kye ma ral gri 'phyar
240b4(mdo sde): nas bde gshegs bkrongs bsam nas//sor mo'i phreng ba 'dir 'ongs ma yang gsad par sems//deng zhi so so'i skye bo skal ba yod pa 'dra//bden par smra ba'i
240b5(mdo sde): tshig ni gzhan du yong mi 'gyur//khyod kyi sdig byas ci nas lus 'di byang 'gyur ba//de ltar sor phreng khyod kyis rtsoms shing nan tan gyis//kye ma dpa' bo khyod kyis
240b6(mdo sde): gtum pa'i las byas na//de ring chos kyi rje bor gyur na bdag dga'o//de nas sor mo'i phreng bas lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la slar 'di skad ces smras so//stobs mi
240b7(mdo sde): sdug pa gtum po khyod su zhig/khyod ni nga dbang phyug snyam ste/khyod ni ming gi dbang phyug yin gyi/dbang phyug ji lta ba bzhin ma yin no//so so'i skye bo'am/dgra
241a1(mdo sde): bcom pa gang yin/ji ltar shes/myur du smros shig/dbang phyug khyod sha za ltar rnon du rung yang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa ma thob bam/
241a2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/skyes bu mdze tshubs chen pos btab pas/mdze rab tu zhi ba bstan ni/'jig rten pa rnams 'di snyam du sems so//gang bdag nyid kyi nang zhi bar mi
241a3(mdo sde): nus paM des gzhan gyi nad ji ltar gso snyam mo//de bzhin du gtum po sbrang bu lta bu khyod kyang bdag rtogs pas bdag gi khams kyang da rung ma shes te/gtum po
241a4(mdo sde): mdze tshabs chen pos btab pa lta bus sor mo'i phreng ba so so'i skye bo 'am/dgra bcom pa'o zhes pha rol gyi sems shes par ga la 'gyur/sbrang bu lta bu khyod
241a5(mdo sde): cang ma zer cig/khyod ni sa'i dbang phyug tu dbang bskur ba dang /sa'i dbang phyug gi rgyal tshab tu ngos pa ma yin gyis/dmus long lta bu khyod yud tsam sdod cig/
241a6(mdo sde): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shing gang la brtan te/bzhugs pa'i shing de'i lha mos sor mo'i phreng ba la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so//dpa' bo sor mo'i
241a7(mdo sde): phreng ba myur bar du//khyod ni ngur smig rgyal mtshan gyon cig dang //bde gshegs thabs cig thog sar bsod snyoms gsol//dpa' bo 'bras bu dam pa
241b1(mdo sde): thob par bgyi//de nas sor mo'i phreng bas lha mo la tshogs su bcad pas smras pa/de bzhin gshegs pa bshos mi gsol//nyan thos rnams kyang de bzhin no//
241b2(mdo sde): khyod kyi sbyin pa su la sbyin//myur spros bzang mo yangs pa'i mig/nga yi the tshom la glor chod//de nas lha mo yangs pa'i mig gis slar sor mo'i phreng ba la tshigs su bcud
241b3(mdo sde): pas smras bA/sangs rgyas rtag tu bshos gsol te//nyan thos rnams kyang de bzhin na//brtan pa rab tu 'byung 'dod la//rdzun du smra ba mi cha'o//rdzun gyi tshig ni
241b4(mdo sde): rnam spongs shig/g.yo yi bsam pa sdig can yin//chos gcig las ni 'das pa yi//skye bo rdzun gyi tshig smra ba//'jig rten pha rol btang ba dag/mi byed pa ni ci
241b5(mdo sde): yang med//de nas sor mo'i phreng bas lha mo de la 'di skad ces smras so//bud med khyod ci zhig 'khyal/khyod kyang dma' ba'i rigs su skyes kyis/sbrang bu lta bu sangs
241b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyis smad pa'i bud med kyi dngos po'i bdag nyid la shin tu rtogs shig/'jig rten na rdzun du smra ba gang /'jig rten na bden pa 'dzin pa gang /'jig rten na zang
241b7(mdo sde): zing la chags pa gang /'jig rten na na zhing shi ba gang yin sbrang bu lta bus mi shes so//sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bdag nyid chen po mi
242a1(mdo sde): shes pa'i sems can de dag ni rdzun smra ba'o//sems can gang zang zing la chags pas/de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang zang zing gis bkur ba'i
242a2(mdo sde): sems can de dag ni rdzun du smra ba ste/de dag la rab tu 'byung ba'ang med na/bsnyen par rdzogs par lta ga la 'gyur/sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
242a3(mdo sde): ldem po dag mi shes pa'i sems can de dag rdzun du smra ba ste/de dag la rab tu 'byung ba'ang med na/bsnyen pa rdzogs par lta ga la 'gyur/nga ni chos gcig las
242a4(mdo sde): kyang mi 'dra'o//lha mo khyod kyis ni chos thams cad las 'das kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i lha yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la myur du bzod pa
242a5(mdo sde): gsol cig/de nas sor mo'i phreng ba la lha mos slar 'di skad ces smras so//bud med kyi dngos po rigs dma'o zhes zer ba ci la ldem po dag tu smra/sor
242a6(mdo sde): mo'i phreng ba bud med dam/skyes pa yin par ji ltar shes/sor mo'i phreng ba khyod myur du smros shig/khyod shu za'i dngos po da dung me zhi'o//de nas sor
242a7(mdo sde): mo'i phreng bas lha mo de la slar 'od skad ces smras so//rgyal po'i mal du khyi song nas ri mo med pa'i sems kyis mi gtsang bar byas pa de bzhin du lha mo khyod kyang
242b1(mdo sde): thabs kyi chos kyi brtse bas bud med kyi dngos por bsgyur te/'dod pa'i yul la sems shing ri mo byed do//de bas na lha mo khyod bud med kyi dngos po spongs la skyes pa dang /
242b2(mdo sde): bud med ces bya ba rab tu stong par sgoms shig/rab tu stong pa la goms na skyes pa'i dngos po myur du 'thob bo//de nas de'i tshe shA ri'i bu dang /modz+wal gyi bu
242b3(mdo sde): gnyis rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis dang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du num mkha' las 'ongs te/bcom ldan 'das ga lA ba der phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
242b4(mdo sde): bos phyag btsal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu le gas so legs so//khyod kyis mthun zhing rjes su
242b5(mdo sde): dgongs pa'i bsod nams byas pa shes par gyis shig/de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu dong la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams ltar bcug ste/rgyal bu
242b6(mdo sde): rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar 'dong ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu phyung nas/'jig rten skye bo'i phung po mang po ltar nam mkha' la zla ba
242b7(mdo sde): dri ma med pa dang /ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar chas te 'dong ngo //de nas sor mo'i phreng bas/tshe dang ldan pa mit+pal gyi bu chen po la slar tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/rdzu 'phrul
243a1(mdo sde): snyan pa gang yin+da 'jig rten na//rdzu 'phrul rtsu ba las ni ci zhig ste//rdzu 'phrul ldan thob 'gyur ba myur smos la//khyod kyis nga yi tshom myur du
243a2(mdo sde): sol//de nas tshe dang ldan pa mot+pal gyi blo chen pos sor mo'i phreng ba la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/gal te 'jog rten dag na sbyin bdag rnams//rtag tu lham
243a3(mdo sde): yang rab tu sbyin par byed//gal te dge slong tshul khrims rdzogs pa la//lham gyi rnam pa shin tu phul ba ste//rnam pa gnyis po de dag gis//rdzu 'phrul 'dod pa rdzu
243a4(mdo sde): 'phrul 'thog//sor phreng de ltar shes par gyis//rdzu 'phrul 'dod na de ltar spyod//de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo rnal gyi bu chen po la/sor mo'i phreng bas slar 'di ska
243a5(mdo sde): ces smras so//kye ma btsun pa mo d+gal gyi bu smyung bu'i spyod pa spyod do//rdzu 'phrul kun bzung bar mi shes so//byung bu'ang nam mkha' la 'gro/sbrang bud+d+ha 'bru
243a6(mdo sde): stobs can khyod cang ma zlar cig/bdag grol nas dgrol bar bya'o snyam ste/phan pa'i sems des ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa myur du 'grub bo//dam pa'i chos phan
243a7(mdo sde): par ljon pa nyam thag pa'i tshe/de'i mdun du bdag gi srog bor na/des rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa 'grub bo//sems can bye ba mang po bsgral ba las lhag pa rgyal ba'i
243b1(mdo sde): tshal/rna rdzu 'phrul ga la yod kyis nga mi 'gro'o//de ltar theg pa chen po dpag tu med pas na/de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dpag tu med do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
243b2(mdo sde): bu la sor mo'i phreng bas tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so//'jig rten dag na shes rab che ba gang //ji lta bur na blo gros skye bar 'gyur//ye shes chen po khyod
243b3(mdo sde): kyis myur bar yang //myur du smos te nga yi the tshomachod//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/sor mo'i phreng ba la tshigs su bcad pa slar smras pa/tshul khrims lnga
243b4(mdo sde): rnams rab tu bsrungs pas na//blo mchog shes rab chen po 'thob par 'gyur//lus 'di bor nas rang gi blor bcas te//gang dang gang du 'dod pa der skye ste//de dang
243b5(mdo sde): dang ni shes rub chen por 'gyur//phyogs su snyen pa rnam grangs sor mo'i phreng //dpa' chen blo ldan de ltar shes par gyis//de nas sor mo'i phreng bas/tshe dang
243b6(mdo sde): ldan pa shA ri'i bu la slar 'di skad ces smras so//de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'o zhes bstan pa mi 'chi ba'i tshig 'di las shes rab chen po skye ste/de ltar ston pa shes
243b7(mdo sde): rab dang ldan pa de na sangs rgyas yin te/kye ma btsun pa shes rab chen po shA ri'i bu ni sbrang bu'i spyad pa spyod de/sbrang bu lta bur 'gro ba khyod ni shes rab dang ldan pa mi shes/
244a1(mdo sde): so//sbrang bu lta bu'i shes rab can khyod cang ma zer cig/btsun pa ni sbrang bu lta bu'i shes rab can no//de nas de'i tshe kun dga' bo der 'ongs nas/
244a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so//legs so legs so//sor mo'i phreng ba khyod kyis mthun pa
244a3(mdo sde): rjes su dgongs pa'i bsod nams byas pa de dga'o//sor mo'i phreng bya myur du gsung rab yan lag dgu pa lhogs shig/de nas gnas brtan kun dga' bo la/sor
244a4(mdo sde): mo'i phreng bas slar 'di skad ces smras so//khyod mang du thos pa'i mchog tu de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs na/btsun pa kun dga' bo khyod la dri yis smros shig/
244a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten na mang du thos pa gang /ji ltar na mang du thos pa 'byung /btsun pa kun dga' bo ngas de skad dris pa myur du smros shig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun+da dga'
244a6(mdo sde): bos/sor mo'i phreng ba la slar 'di skad ces smras so//mdo sde yan lag dgu pa klog pa dang /gzhan yang ser sna med par rab tu ston pa dri las mang du thos shing
244a7(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzungs phun sum tshogs pa thos par 'gyur ro//de nas sor mo'i phreng bas gnas brten kun dga' bo la slar 'di skad ces smras so//'jig
244b1(mdo sde): rten na de bzhin gshegs pa ni ther zug g.yung drung ngo zhes bstan pa ston pa/bstan pa de ni 'jig rten na mang du thos pa yin te/mang du thos pa de lta bur shes par gyis
244b2(mdo sde): shig/kye ma btsun pa kun dga' bo ni sbrang bu'i spyad pa spyod de/mang du thos pa 'byung ba'i sgo mi shes so//sbrang bu la'ang mang du thos pa yod kyis/sbrang bu lta bu'i mang du
244b3(mdo sde): thos pa khyod cang ma zer cig/de nas gnas brtan sgra gtson zin/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs
244b4(mdo sde): kyi bu legs so//legs so//khyod kyis mthun zhing rjes su dgongs pa'i bsod nams byas pa nga dga'o//sor mo'i phreng ba myur du gus par bslab pa gzung zhig/de nas
244b5(mdo sde): sor mo'i phreng bas/sgra gcan zin la slar smras pa/btsun pa sgra gcan zin khyod bslab pa la dga' zhing gus pa'i mchog tu de bzhin gshegs pasra gsungs na/'jig
244b6(mdo sde): rten na bslab pa la gus pa gang yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras phangs pa myur du smos la dra'i the tshom tshod cig/de nas gnas brtan sgra gcan zin gyis sor mo'i phreng
244b7(mdo sde): ba la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/sangs rgyas gsung rnams shin tu gus par gzung //de nas bslab la gus par tshul khrims ldan//khong dpa' dbang gyur
245a1(mdo sde): khong pa'i mchog 'dzin pa//sor ma'i phreng ba de ltar shes par gyis//sor mo'i phreng bas sgra gcan zin la smrar 'di skad ces sproso//'jig rten na de bzhin/
245a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni mchog tu rtag pa'o zhes gus pas bstan pa ni gus pa'i mchog ces bya ste/btsun pa sgra gcan zin ston pa de ni 'jig rten na bsgrub pa la gus pa'i mchog tu shes
245a3(mdo sde): gyis shig/kye btsun pa sgra gcan zin ni sbrang bu'i spyod pa spyod de/sbrang bulta bu khyod brisla ba pA laM gus par mi shes//sbrang bu la'ang gus pa yod kyis/sbrang bu lta bu khyod ca
245a4(mdo sde): mazer cig/de nas gnas brnyan ma 'gags pa/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/sor mo
245a5(mdo sde): phreng ba la 'di skad ces smraso//leg so leg so//sor mo'i phreng ba khyod kyis mthun zhing rje suM dgongs pa'i bsod nams byas pa nga dga'o//sor mo'i phreng ba de ring por ma thogs
245a6(mdo sde): par nA'i mig can du gyis shig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la ser mo'i phreng bas srer 'di skad ces smraso//btsun pa ma 'gags pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pas
245a7(mdo sde): lha'i mig can gyis mchog tu gsungs na/'jig rten na lha'i mig can gang /lha'i mig ji ltar te/myur du spros la de'i the tshomachod cig/de nas sor mo'i phreng
245b1(mdo sde): tshodang ldan pa mau 'gags pas slar tshigs su bcad pa 'di spyad ces smras so//mar mes rtag tu mig zob 'gyur//yadun gzhan la nan d+han du//tshos bshad ngas
245b2(mdo sde): kyang shes par bya//gzugs can nang na gzugs mchog can//de ltar sor grong shes par gyis//de nas sor mo'i phreng bas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la 'di
245b3(mdo sde): skad ces smras so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rab tu nan tan du mi 'chab cing /sems can thams cad la phan par bsten pa ston nu/des rgyu'i mig zom
245b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/de ni 'jig rten na lha'i mig can no//kye ma btsun pa ma 'gags pa khyod ni sbrang bu'i spyad pa spyod de/lha'i mig bskyed pa mi shes
245b5(mdo sde): so//sbrang bu'ang rang gi yul mthong gis sbrang bu lta bu khyod cang ma zer cig/de nas gnas brtan dge sbyong gi kholo pos bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la
245b6(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag btsal nasasor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so//legs so legs so//sor mi'i byung ba khyod kyis mthun zhing
245b7(mdo sde): rjes su dgongs pa'i bsod nams byas par dga'o//sor mo'i phreng ba de ni bzod pa la mang du bsgom par bya'o//de nas sor mo'i phreng bas/
246a1(mdo sde): gnas brtan dge sbyong gi khol po la 'di skad ces smras so//'jig rten dag na bzod pa rdzogs pa su//bzod pa 'dod pas ji ltar bzod par 'gyur//
246a2(mdo sde): ji lta bur na bzod par 'gyur ba yang //myur du spros la nga yi the tshomachod//de nas gnas brtan dge sbyong gi khol pos/sor mo'i phreng ba la slar smras pa/dge/
246a3(mdo sde): slong bzod pa 'dod pa yis//ste'u dang tsan+dan 'dra bar bya//de nas bzod pa thob par 'gyur//de ni 'jig rten rdul bzod yin//sor phreng de ltar shes par gyis//
246a4(mdo sde): de nas sor mo'i phreng bas gnas brtan dge sbyong gi kho lnga po la 'angadi skad ces slar smras so//'jig rten na dri bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rab tu ston pa la mi mkhas pa//
246a5(mdo sde): yog par lta ba'i mi dag zhe sdang zhing bstan po ni bdag med pa'o zhes bdag nyid de ltar 'jog ni/de dag ni tshig la goms par mi byed cing /mtshungs pa med do
246a6(mdo sde): snyam nas/rang gi srog kyang btang ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rab tu ston pa de ni bzod pa'i dam pa ste/'jig rten na phan par ston pa'o//'jig rten na
246a7(mdo sde): bzod pa dul ba zhi pa 'jigs pa med pa'o//kye ma gnas brtan dge sbyong gi khol po khyod ni sbrang bu'i spyad pa spyod de/bzod pa bskyed par mi shes so//sbrang bu'i
