330a1(mdo sde): mnga'o//des 'di skad ces smra sa nas/de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
330a2(mdo sde): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de ci sgyu ma lags sum/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po ma 'di ni sprul pa yin no//sprul pa'i mas ji ltar smras pa bzhin
330a3(mdo sde): te/byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa sgyu ma'ang de bzhin no//de nas sor mo'i phreng ba'i mkhan po nor bu bzang po zhes bya ba ta la bdun tsam gyi nam mkha' la 'dug nas tshig 'di zhes
330a4(mdo sde): smras so//seng ge dang wa 'odra yun ring zhig tu mdza' bor byas kyang /des seng ge'i nga ro'i sgra 'dzin par mi nus te/wa 'dre yang thos pa tsam gyis mchi'o//yang ci wa 'dre de dom
330a5(mdo sde): gyi skad du 'byin na/seng ge'i rgyal po chen po sgra skad 'byin pa yin nam/sreng ge nga wa dang dom gyi sgra skad du'ang nga ro mi 'byin gyi/seng ge'i sgra rang sgrogs so//de bzhin du wa 'dre lha
330a6(mdo sde): bu bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' seng ge lta bu'i mkhan po bya ste/yun ring mo zhig tu lhan cig 'khod kyang byang chub sems dpa'i sgra skud 'dzin lta ge la nus te/gal te 'di
330a7(mdo sde): thabs ma yin na de'i rtsal gyis 'chi bar 'gyur te/yi dwags lta bu bdag gi glen pa'i chos la sbyor ba dang /nyan du gzhug pa lta ci smos/byang chub sems dpa' ni glen pa'i
330b1(mdo sde): chos mi spyod pa ste/spyod pa'ang thams cad la bu gcig pa lta bu'i byams par spyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa sgyu ma mang po ni sems can bye ba dang /bram ze'i mkhan pos mi shes te/sangs
330b2(mdo sde): rgyas nyid kyis sgyu mu mkhyen te/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas ni sgyu ma'i rgyal po'o//mkhan po'i chung ma dga' byed mas smras pa/kye ma sems can 'di bram ze'i bu mo 'ojo ma'i sku mthong
330b3(mdo sde): yang sangs rgyas kyi che ba yin par mi shes so//ji ltar tsan tsa sgyu ma yin pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyis sgyu ma sprul pa'o//de bas mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la bdag gis
330b4(mdo sde): bskyed do//gdol pas khyed la bsnyen par mi nus ni/rgyal po sems can mang po dang /'gro ba'i dpal dang /byin gyis brgyal bar 'gyur na/mdun du 'jug pa lta ci smros/de ltar
330b5(mdo sde): mis mi'i drung du bstan par mi nus na/lha drung mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstan par bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgyur bar lta ga la nus te/de bzhin gshegs pa la
330b6(mdo sde): rim gro byed pa'i lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /sha za dang /lha ma yin tshad med pa dang /nam mkha' lding gis de la gnod
330b7(mdo sde): par byed do//gal te 'di lta bu'i sems can 'byung na/bcom ldan 'das kyang sdig byed pa rnam pa mang po ston te/ma 'ongs pa'i sems can 'di lta bu'i sdig ma rungs pa byed pa 'byung
331a1(mdo sde): bdag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sgyu ma chen po'i thabs kyis su ston to zhes zer nas mi snang bar gyur to//de nas yang rgyal po shin tu ngo mtshur du
331a2(mdo sde): gyur te/bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci sgyu ma ljags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po mkhan po dang /mkhan po'i chung ma
331a3(mdo sde): dang /de'i ma sgyu ma gsum gyis smras pa bzhin te/nga'i sgyu ma ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam pa de gsum du sprul pa yin te/sems can bye ba mang po bsgral ba'i phyir sor mo'i phreng
331a4(mdo sde): babAb de ltar byon pa yin no//rgyal pos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dgung bdun nas sbyin pa chen po stsal na/de bzhin gshegs pa sor mo'i phreng ba lho phyogs logs kyi
331a5(mdo sde): sbyin gnas su gyur cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po de bzhin du gyur cig/de nas lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mgrin
331a6(mdo sde): gcig tu tshigs su bcud pa 'di dag smras so//sgyu ma'i rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa dpal chen thabs kyi sku//thabs kyi mtshan nyid rab tu phun sum tshogs//
331a7(mdo sde): thabs mchog dam pa'i chos rnams rab tu ston//thabs kyis dbyings rnams su yang 'jog par mdzad//thabs kyis sprul pa dag ni yongs su ston//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang
331b1(mdo sde): mtha' yas te//blo gros mtha' yas grags pa'ang mtha' yas te//de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzi brjid mtha' yas te//bde gshegs mtha' yas mtha' yas stobs chen ston//gsung
331b2(mdo sde): ba mtha' yas mtha' yas dgongs dag ston//'jig rten rab tu snang mdzad mtha' yas so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer mtha' yas pa//yon tan mtha' med grangs las shin tu
331b3(mdo sde): 'das//de bzhin gshegs ni mtshungs med dpag tu myed//chags med ye shes nam mkha' lta bur ston//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni nam mkha' bzhin//'jam dpal gzhon
331b4(mdo sde): nur gyur phan zhi bar byed//sor phreng slad du bde gshegs gshegs pa ni//gshegs dang ma ga shegs shes kyang brjod mi nus//bde gra shegs sgra gcan zin ltar
331b5(mdo sde): snyoms par gzigs//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das dgyes so//lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /nyan thos de
331b6(mdo sde): dag dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de dag thams cad kyang sor mo'i phreng ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /de'i sangs
331b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba dang /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
332a1(mdo sde): rlu sa sa ste pa nas ma sa su pa seM ts+tsha spya /gonas rgyam pa nga ga na du ma/
332a2(mdo sde): mid+hig/u dus ra wAr rab tu rnyed dka'o ba/'phags pa sor mo'i byung byel phan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i ma rjenas
332a3(mdo sde): /na kyi na ng+kung/ nga ma la la gas sa dus rkye ga nal
332b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa blon po zla ba bzang pos mthong nas rgyal po la smras pa/lha lags sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa'o skol gyi yul du byon pas grong khyer brgyan pa dang bsnyen bkur bya bar rigs
332b2(mdo sde): so//rgyal pos smras pa/dzam+bu'i gling na nga las che ba med par su la bsnyen bkur byed ces slar nyid du dregs par gyur to//de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i pho brang gi sgor gdan
332b3(mdo sde): bshams pa la bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs so//de ltar bzhugs par shes nas rgyal pos gyad chen po'i 'degs zhes bya ba rbad de rdo shin tu che ba bcom ldan 'das
332b4(mdo sde): la 'phangs so//rdo de nam mkha' la lding zhing de las sgra 'di skad ces grag go/kye ma 'dus byas rtag pa med//skye zhing 'gog pa'i chos can yin//skye ba yod na 'chi ba yod//
332b5(mdo sde): 'du ba yod na 'bral ba yod//bsags pa yod na 'dzad pa yod//lang tshe'i mdog kyang nad kyis 'phrog/'tsho ba'i tshe yang 'chi bas 'phrog/chags par gyur na sdug bsngal 'phel///
332b6(mdo sde): skyo bar byas na thar par 'gyur//zhes pa de rgyal po gzugs can snying pos thos pas mos par gyur te thad du song nas thal mo sbyar te 'khod pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
332b7(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po chos la mos par bya/khong du chud par bya/bsgo bar bya yid 'byung bar bya'o//rgyal pos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang la skyo bar bgyi/yid 'byung bar bgyi/
333a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'khor ba las rgyo zhing yid 'byung bar bya'o//rgyal pos gsol pa/ci'i phyir 'khor ba las skyo zhing yid 'byung
333a2(mdo sde): bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal pa/'khor ba 'di mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba'i phyir ro//rgyal pos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'di ji skad
333a3(mdo sde): mi rtag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/snod kyi 'jig rten 'di yang mi rtag lnga//bcud kyi sems can yang ni mi rtag go/rgyal pos gsol pa/snod kyi
333a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten ji ltar mi rtag pa legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/snod kyi 'jig rten ri rab gling khams kyang //'jig pa'i dus tshe bskal pa'i me byung nas//thal
333a5(mdo sde): ba'i lhag ma tsam yang mA lus so//chu dang rlung gis 'jig pa de bzhin no//gzhan yang dbyar drod skye la dgun grang bskum//lo legs lo nyes than zhod nges pa med//lo
333a6(mdo sde): zla 'das shing 'jig pa'i dus dang nye//de la sogs te mi rtag mngon sum ni//rtag pa yin nu ci phyir 'gyur zhing 'gro/rgyal pos gsol pa/bcud kyi sems can ji
333a7(mdo sde): ltar mi rtag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bcud kyi sems can tshe 'di nyid la yang //nyin zhag lo zla rim gyis gcod byed pas//nyin zhag 'das
333b1(mdo sde): shing 'chi dang phrar phar nye//mi shir 'dod kyang rang la rang dbang med//skye rga na 'chi rang thag ri mo 'dra//'chi bdag bdud ni so bya nya sdod 'dra//'chi ba'i rkyen ni bsam gyis mi
333b2(mdo sde): khyab ste//'chi rkyen ma song dngos po gang yang med//lus 'di zas kyis 'tsho yang brnangs nas 'chi//'jig rten 'di na che chung phrug dbul kun//'chi badrag dbang du mi 'gyur gang
333b3(mdo sde): yang med//snga ma shi bla'i mi rnams kun gyis kyang //rtag tu re nas bu dang nor bsags kyang //bu nor phyir lus bdag la phan pa med//rung gi drage sdig gnyis dang 'grogs/
333b4(mdo sde): te 'chi//dra ltar rang gi gnas pa'i ring 'di la'ang //dga' bshes gnyen 'dun mdza' dang mi mdza' dang //na tshod mthun dang rgan gzhon ji snyed cig/shi ba mthong zhing
333b5(mdo sde): thos pa ma yin nam//sa steng gnas pa'i sems can 'di kun kyang //lo brgya tshun chad sdod kyang ma lus 'chi//de bsu rang ri'ang 'chi ba'i chos can yin//deng 'chi sang 'chi sus
333b6(mdo sde): kyang mi shes te//tshod 'dzin pa yang mi 'jigs sbyin med pas//sang phod deng sang bdag nyid ji ltar 'gyur//'chi ba'i tshe na pha ma bu tsha dang //phu nu mdza' bshes bran khol nor
333b7(mdo sde): kun kyang //bdag nyid 'chi ba'i phyi na 'od med pas//sdug bsngal skal len 'ga' yang yod ma yin//de bas skyes kyang bdag nyid gcig pu skyes//tha ma 'chi yang bdag nyid
334a1(mdo sde): gcig pu 'chi//skad cig tshe lus mthun pa nye gzhi rnams//'gron po gnas mthun tsam ste so sor 'gro/skad cig tsam yang 'bral bar mi phod pa'i//gnyen
334a2(mdo sde): drang nor rdzas yul mkhar kun byor nas//bdag nyid gcig pu 'jigs pa'i lam du 'gro//dzi tsAm+ba sdig dang bsngos nas nor bsags kyang //sdig pa'i rnam smin rmongs pa bdag
334a3(mdo sde): nyid 'khur//bsags pa'i nor ni khong dag bu chos 'khyer//de phyir bsags pa'i nor gyis ci zhig phan//bdag lA shin tu phangs pa'i lus 'di yang //shi ba'i dus su
334a4(mdo sde): rje zhig bzhin du 'bor//lhan cig skyes pa'i sha rus gnyis kyang dbye//dbang med bdag nyid gcig pu 'khyams nas ni//las kyi dbang gis gang du skyes gyur na//dri bas
334a5(mdo sde): lus kyi phyir ni sdig mi bya//lus 'di sa gting 'gro ste chog mi shes//mi gtsang las byung mi gtsang phung po yin//na rga 'chi sogs sdug bsngal kun gyi gnas//shi na sa/
334a6(mdo sde): lus bor sa yi phyogs tsam btsog/bya dang khyi spyang la sogs rnams kyis za//bsnyen bkur 'bad kyang 'chi bdag srin pos 'phrog/mkhas pas smod cing blun po chags pa'i
334a7(mdo sde): gnas//de bas mkhas pa lus la su zhig chags//lus kyi phyir ni ya ngar 'jug mi bya//'di la gla rngan gos zas byin nas su//yun gyi phan phyir bsod nams sog tu
334b1(mdo sde): gzhug/bdag gi grogs ni dge sdig gnyis las med//de yang dge ba mtho ris thar pa'i rgyu//sdig pa ngan song sdug bsngal 'byung ba'i rgyu//ma shi bar du'ang lus ni mi rtag ste//bu/
334b2(mdo sde): chung byis pa gzhon nu nyid du 'gyur/de nas dar la bab dang dar yol dang //rgas par gyur te lus 'di rtag na ni//gnas skabs de snyed cig ni cis te 'gyur//longs spyod bde/
334b3(mdo sde): sdug rnams kyang mi rtag ste//btsan phyug 'dzom pa sdug phongs can du 'gyur//sdug phongs can yang btsan phyug 'dzom par 'gyur//lang tsho longs spyod na rga 'chi bas 'joms//'jig/
334b4(mdo sde): rten chos 'di thams cad mi rtag go/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba pa 'di'i sdug bsngal ji lta bu lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
334b5(mdo sde): stsal pa/'khor ba pa la nam yang badre ba med//byas pa thams cad don med sdug bsngal rgyu//sdug bsngal gtso bo skye rgan 'chi yini//dmyal bar skyes na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra'o//dmyal srung
334b6(mdo sde): dang ni dmyal ba'i me mthong nas//shin tu skrag dngongs cho nges cher 'drabs shing //ring la rngan 'grang sngon gyi sdig pa la//shin tu 'gyod kyang phan pa ci yang med//lus 'di shin tu
334b7(mdo sde): che la gzhon sha can//tshor ba che zhing drag po'i lus thob nas//kha cig rang lus me yi phung por 'bar//kha cig lcags mkhar khang pa sbrum mar rdung //'gre ldog byed cing phyogs ni
335a1(mdo sde): kun nas sreg/kha cig lcags las byas pa'i snod chen du//spyi tshugs 'bru nyungs chu khol thug bzhin 'tshed//khA cig srog les 'dra zhing gtun la brdung //
335a2(mdo sde): kha cig gnas dang khang pararwa bsrung zhing bsreg/me mar mur dang thul tshin chu la sogs//sdug bsngal mang po bsam gyis mi khyab bo//mi yi lo ni 'bum dang brgyad khri la//dmyal
335a3(mdo sde): pa kha cig na ni nyin zhag gcig/de las sogs pa bskal pa'i bar du gnas//shi bar dga' yang 'chir ni mi btub bro//las ma zad pa kha cig 'jig chags tshe//'jig rten
335a4(mdo sde): brgyud cing 'jig chags med par skye//yi dwags skyes pa bkres dang skom pas gdungs/mgo bo ri tsam kha ni khab mig tsam//ske rtsa rab phra gsus pa yul ljongs tsam//bza'
335a5(mdo sde): btung mthong yang gzhan gyis bsrungs pa dang //rnag khrag ngan skyugs la sogs gzhan du mthong //kha cig zos kyang khro chu khol mar 'gro/byol song skyes na gcig la gcig
335a6(mdo sde): za dang //rang la dbang med bkol btags brdeg 'chog dang //gzhan gyis gsod sogs gti mug rmongs pas sdug/mir skyes nu yang mngal na gnas pa'i tshe//ma ni
335a7(mdo sde): 'grangs tshe brag par btsir ba 'dra//bkres pa'i tshe na dpyang la btang ba snyam//drag shul byed tshe gtun la rdung ba snyam//btsas pa'i tshe na pags pa bshus nas ni//rtsig pa'i//
335b1(mdo sde): logs la drud pa byas kyang rngug//chu 'brum bkres sgrom rkang lag na nas sdug/cher skyes na yang so nam brel phongs dang //nye du bral drang dgras bcom bu lon dang //bkres rlom
335b2(mdo sde): tsha grang don la sogs pas sdug/phongs pa rnams ni btsal thabs med nas sdug/yod pa rnams kyang 'tsho skyong ma la tshes sdug/zhing rmo tshad byed 'du byed las kyis sdug/
335b3(mdo sde): la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab//sdug bsngal gzhi ni phal cher lho rgyab gnyis//'jig rten 'dri yi bde ba'i longs spyod kyang //phal cher phyi ma'i ngan song sdug bsngal rgyu///
335b4(mdo sde): lha min skyes na nga rgyal phrag dog dang //khro gtum 'thab rtsod la sogs dbang gis sdug/lhar skyes kyang ni 'chi 'pho ltung ba dang //'chi ltas lnga dang 'du byed dbang gis sdug
335b5(mdo sde): rgas pa yang ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal te//mgo dkar gnyer 'dus gzhan gyis mthong mi mos//kha sna chu 'dzag rkang lag kun kyang 'dar//sems kyis dran yang lus la nyams
335b6(mdo sde): stobs med//bu tsha kun kyang shin rung snyam sems//zhal ta byas kyang mi nyan dbang yang shor//kha cig srin rgun shi 'phyis zhes kyang zer//kha cig ber dbyug thogs nas
335b7(mdo sde): rdung bar byed//de ltar mthong thos shing 'dong shir ma btub//na ba rnams ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal te//lus kyi 'byung tshon bzhi ni ma snyoms pas//rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus
336a1(mdo sde): bas lus gdungs te//longs spyod mthong yang 'di la 'dod pa med//lus kyi nyams stobs shor bas ldang mi nus//mdzes pa'i gzi mdangs shor bas rma
336a2(mdo sde): dwags 'dra//'chi ba rnams kyang 'di ltar sdug bsnol te//gnyen bshes tshogs kyis cho de 'debs byed kyang //de la nyan lta bus mtha'i yul med de//gnad gcod pa ni
336a3(mdo sde): mtshon chas gtub pa 'dra//mdza' dang mi mdza'i don du sngar byas pa'i//dge sdig las ni rmi lam yul bzhin snang //gshin rje'i pho nya shin tu 'jigs pas bskor//bred
336a4(mdo sde): shathon nas kun tu bltas byas kyang //mgon skyabs byeng pa su yang ma mthong nas//shin tu 'jigs bzhin kun tu yi mug ste//bdag nyid gar 'gro gar rdol med par
336a5(mdo sde): 'byung //mi rtag sdug bsngal mi zad yun ring 'di//thog ma med nas da lta'i bar du yang //'phags lam ma thob bar du rtag tu gdung //rgyal pos gsol pa/bcom ldan
336a6(mdo sde): 'das 'khor ba 'di shin tu sdug bsngal ba la gas na bde legs dang ldan pa gang lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mya ngan las 'das pa ni bde legs phun sum
336a7(mdo sde): tshogs pa yin no//rgyal pos gsol pa/ji ltar bde legs phun sum tshogs pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba bde ba'i mchog
336b1(mdo sde): rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin dang nyon mongs med//ngan stong gsum sogs bkres skom grang dro dang //skye rgan 'chi la sogs sdug bsngal med//'khor ba mi rtag sdug bsngal gtan
336b2(mdo sde): zad nas//las su gzhan don 'ba' zhig spyod byed cing //mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab bo//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'khor ba
336b3(mdo sde): las yid byung nas rgyal skying mchil ma'i thalo bA ltar bor te/mya ngan las 'das pa bsgrub pa la gzhol bar gyur to//de ltar gyur pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po
336b4(mdo sde): chen po legs so logs so//rjes thams cad kyi nang na glang po che'i rjes mchog go//me tog rnams kyi nang na pad+ma dkar po mchog go/'du shes thams cad kyi nang na mi rtag pa'i
336b5(mdo sde): 'du shes mchog go/bsam pa rnams kyi nang na 'khor ba lus yid byung ba mchog go//rgyal po chen po 'khor ba las yid byung ba legs so//skyo ba skyes pa legs so//chags
336b6(mdo sde): na 'khor ba yin no//ma chags na mya ngan las 'das pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/rgyal po gzugs can snying po la sogs pa thams cad yi
336b7(mdo sde): rang ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gdams pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so///
337a1(mdo sde): rgyu gar gyi mkhan po d+han shI la dang /ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/rgya gar skad du/rAdz+nyA dwe sha nA ma ma hA s+thAn s+yA tra/
337a2(mdo sde): bod skad du/rgyal po la gdams pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa
337a3(mdo sde): dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po ba ra NA si na 'khor rnams la chos ston pa na/bad sa la'i rgyal po 'char byed 'dul ba'i dus la bab par gzigs nas 'khor
337a4(mdo sde): dang bcas pa bad sa la'i yul du gshegs pa dang /bad sa la'i rgyal po 'char byed grong khyer chen po gser can zhes bya ba gzhom pa'i phyir dmag bzhi dang chas pa dang phrad
337a5(mdo sde): pas rgyal po 'char byed khros te/'di 'dra ba'i bkra mi shis pa dang phrad pas bsad par rigs so zhes nas mda' ste'u kha nya rnga ma blangs te/bcom ldan 'das la 'phangs so///
337a6(mdo sde): de nas mda' de nam mkha' la 'khor zhing 'di skad ces glag go//zhe sdang gis ni sdug bsngal bskyed//'dir yang sha thang 'thab dang rtsod//phyi mar dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal
337a7(mdo sde): 'byung //des na zhe sdang 'thab rtsod spang //zhes bya ba'i tshig de rgyal po 'char byed kyis thos por gyur pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la mos par gyur te phyag btsal nas phyogs
337b1(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod do//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po 'thab rtsod ni 'dir sha thang la phyi mar dran song du skye na ci'i phyir rtag tu 'thab rtsod 'ba' zhig byed/rgyal/
337b2(mdo sde): pos gsol pa/gau ta ma bdag gis gang dang 'thabs kyang pham mo myong ste rgyal bas bdag ni dmag dang 'thob pa la mos pa legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal
337b3(mdo sde): po chen po dgra 'di ni dgra chung ngu yin te/rgyal po chen po 'di ma yin pa'i dgra chen po shar gnyer ba zhig yod do//rgyal pos gsol pa dgra de gang lags/bcom ldan 'das
337b4(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/dgra chen po nyon mongs pa bdug tu 'dzin pa zhes bya ba zhig yod do//rgyal pos gsol pa/dgra de ji lta bu lags bshad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das
337b5(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa'i dgra chen po//'di ni rgyu bzhin dngos po med bzhin du//thog ma med nas bdag la gnas nas na//bdag gi chos su yid
337b6(mdo sde): bzhin rin chen de//gzod ma'i mu nas dgra yis brkus nas su//mtshan ma'i tshang tshang gseb tu sbas nas bdag/dA rung 'ching zhing 'khor bar 'khyam du 'jug/'jig
337b7(mdo sde): rten dgras ni bsad nas nor 'phrog tsam//de la bzod byas bsod nams tshogs kyang rdzogs//dgra 'di zhi bde thar pa'i srog kyang gcod//de bstan bsod nams 'khor bar
338a1(mdo sde): 'dam du 'ching //rgyal pos gsol pa/dgra chen po de dang ji lhor 'thab par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//rnam rtog dgral rgol
338a2(mdo sde): ba'i sho ma ra yang //dad pas sbyin dang tshul khrims mkhar brtsigs te//dge ba'i dpung byas bzod pa'i go gyon la//brtson 'grus lhag thogs bsam gtan gzhu
338a3(mdo sde): brdungs te//bdag med stong pa'i mda' yis bdag 'dzin bsad//rgyal pos gsol pa bdag med pa zhes pa de bshad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
338a4(mdo sde): pa/gang zag bdag med rgyal po mnyan par gyis//gang zag lnga phung rgyun yin ci phyir na//rgyu ni las drang nyon mongs pas gang nas//'bras bu phung por zag ste de yi bdag
338a5(mdo sde): bdag ni sems can so so'i lus 'di la//nga dang bdag tu bzung nas chags gyur to//bdag na ni dang shi bkres grang gis dogs//bstod na dga' zhing smad na mi dga' ste//
338a6(mdo sde): de la dmigs nas mu stegs lnga rnams 'jug/nga 'am bdag de yod pa ma yin te//phung po 'di la brtags nas 'khrul pa yin//ming ni bdag ma yin te btags pa tsam//
338a7(mdo sde): lus ni bdag ma yin te sha rus rnams//'byung chen 'dus pa phyi rol rtsig pa 'dra//sems kyang bdag ma yin te dngos po med//chos la bdag med rgyal po mnyan
338b1(mdo sde): par gyis//chos ni gzugs sogs dngos po thams cad yin//byed pa med la mtshan nyid 'dzin phyir ro//de dag log rtog mtshan mar bcas pa dang //lha mi mthun pa yin//
338b2(mdo sde): te de med do//ci phyir zhe na phyi nang chos 'di la//dngos yid spangs nas stong nyid mi btsal gyis//snang ba nyid na stong pa nyid yin phyir//gzhig bcom mi rtag tsam la stong
338b3(mdo sde): ming gdags//snang la rang bzhin med par cis mngon nu//yod med dbus dang gsum du mi gnas te//yod par grags pa 'khor ba mya ngan 'das//'khor ba'i rang
338b4(mdo sde): bzhin yul sems rnam gnyis te//yul 'di dngos po med par 'di ltar brtag/rang snang rdul bshig rdul yang chas gzhigs med//dngos snang thams cad sems yin/
338b5(mdo sde): rmi lam bzhin//sems kyang kha dog dbyibs sogs rnams dang bral//des na 'khor ba stong zhing bdag med do//'khor ba med pas mya ngan 'das pa'ang med//yod pa ma
338b6(mdo sde): grub pas na med pa'ang med//mtha' gnyis med phyir dbus kyang med pa yin//de ltar rgyal pos bdag med sgom byas na//bdag 'dzin 'khor brtsad nas chod par 'gyur//
338b7(mdo sde): rgyal pos gsol pa/snga gong yan chad dgra ma yin pa la dgrar bzung ste bdag zhe sdang gis mnar bar gyur to//da ni bdag gis yang dag pa'i dgra ngo shes pas dgra de dang
339a1(mdo sde): 'thab pa'i phyir bdag med pa la mos par gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po legs so//bdag tu 'dzin pa'i
339a2(mdo sde): dgra pham par byas so//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la sogs pa yi rang ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
339a3(mdo sde): la mngon par bstod do//bad sA la'i rgyal po 'char byed la gdams pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shI la
339a4(mdo sde): dang /ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya a dzA ta shat+ma kau kr-id+b+ha bi no da na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/bod skad du
339a5(mdo sde): 'phags pa ma skyes dgra'i 'gyod pa bsal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/bam po dang po//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad
339a6(mdo sde): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi ri bya rgod kyi phung po la/dge slong brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byang
339a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas lhags pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa/
339b1(mdo sde): gzungs thob pa/spobs pa thogs pa med pa/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa/ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs sgrub pa shes shing mkhas pa/sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi
339b2(mdo sde): bsam pa ji ltar mos pa bzhin du chos ston pa rnams dang /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang /tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po dang /de ma yin pa gzhan lha
339b3(mdo sde): dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /num mkha' lding dang /mo 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po brgya stong mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//yang
339b4(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ri zhig gi bang rim gyi ngos la skyes bu dam pa nyi shu rtsa lnga dang lhan cig tu gnas pa 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' klu dpal dang /
339b5(mdo sde): klus byin dang /dpal 'byung dang /dpal gyi snying po dang /pad+ma bla ma'i dpal dang /pad+ma dpal 'byung dang /skye bo 'dzin dang /sa 'dzin dang /lhag na rin chen dang /lhag
339b6(mdo sde): nu rin chen phyag rgya dang /seng ge blo gros dang /seng ge'i 'gros bsgrags dbyangs dang /nam mkha'i mdzod dang /sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba dang /tshig
339b7(mdo sde): gi rab tu tha dad pa thams cad la spobs pa dang /spobs pa'i phung po dang /blo gros rgya mtsho dang /lhun po chen po dang /mthong na dga' ba dang /rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang /
340a1(mdo sde): mtha' yas mthong ba dang /mtha' yas dmigs par gnas pa dang /bdud kyi lta ba yang dag par 'joms pa dang /mya ngan med sbyin dang /don thams cad
340a2(mdo sde): grub pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /skyes bu dam pa nyi shu rtsa lnga po de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas s+ho//dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu bzhi'ang chos mnyan/
340a3(mdo sde): pa'i phyir 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur te/lha'i bu kun nas me tog ces bya ba dang /lha'i bu me tog 'od zer can zhes bya ba dang /lha'i bu me
340a4(mdo sde): tog man+da ra ba'i dri zhes bya ba dang /lha'i bu chos la gnas par rtag tu brtson pa zhes bya ba de dag dang /lha'i bu mang po gzhan dgra kyang 'di lta ste/chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'jam
340a5(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur to//'di lta ste/skyes bu dam pa de dag dang /lha'i bu de dag tshogs shing 'khod pa las bar skabs su kye grogs po
340a6(mdo sde): dag sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni rgya che ba/dpag tu med pa/tshad med pa/bosam+ba gyis mi khyab pa/mnyam pa med pa/gzhal du med pa/mi rtogs pa/mi mnyam pa dang
340a7(mdo sde): mnyam pa dang /bla na med pa yin te/de ni go cha dam pa yin pas rtogs par mi nus na go cha ji tsam zhig bgos na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ye shes chen po de rtogs par
340b1(mdo sde): nus skye de lta bu'i gtam+b+ha snod pa gyu pa dang /byang chub sems dpa klu dpal gyis smras pa/dge ba'i rna ba'i tshogs bas gsu pa bsngo ba la chog mi shes pa'i dge ba'i
340b2(mdo sde): laM gzhog par gnas shing mi brjed pa'i go cha bgos pas ye shes chen po de rtogs par nus so//byang chub sems dpa' klus byin gyis smras pa/sems snyoms pa dang /sems
340b3(mdo sde): dul ba dang /sems 'jam pa dang /sems drang ba dang /sems mnyen pa dang /sems cad shes pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yi dam brtan po snying po la gnas/
340b4(mdo sde): pa'i go rgyu bgos pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes/ye shes chen po de rtogs par nus so//byang chub sems dpa' drab la 'byung gis smras pa/kye grogs po dgra bskal pa'i
340b5(mdo sde): grangs kyis ye shes chen po dri rtogs par mi nus kyi/bskal pa dpag tu med par go cha bgros pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de rtogs par nus so//byang chub sems dpa'
340b6(mdo sde): dpal gyi snying pos smras pa/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' badrag gi bde ba la chags shing gnas pas ye shes chen po de rtogs par mi nus kyi/bdag gi bde ba la ma chags pas
340b7(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de rtogs par mi nus te/gang zang zing med pa lan du bya ba ma yin pa'i bde ba de sems can thams cad la bstabs so zhes sems can thams cad bde zhing
341a1(mdo sde): bde ba dang ldan pa la gzhog par byed pa des thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de rtogs par nus so//byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma bla ma'i dpal gyis smras pa/bdag nyid
341a2(mdo sde): ma dul/ma bsrungs/ma byang ba des pha rol ma dul ma bsrungs/ma byang ba dul bar bya ba dang /zhi bar bya ba'i gnas de ni med kyi/bdag nyid shin tu dul/shin tu bsrungs/shin
341a3(mdo sde): tu byang ba des pha rol ma dul/ma bsrungs/ma byang ba/dul bar bya ba dang /zhi bar bya ba'i gnas de ni yod do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de skad gsungs te/de bas na dul ba
341a4(mdo sde): dang zhi gnas kyi rnal 'byor la zhugs shing pha rol dul ba dang /zhi gnas drang mthun par bya ba la mkhas pas ye shes chen po de rtogs par nus so//byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma dpal
341a5(mdo sde): 'byung gis smras pa/kye grogs po dag 'jig rten gyi chos dang 'brel bas 'jig rten las 'da' bar mi nus kyi/gang 'jig rten gyi chos dang ma 'brel ba de ni 'jig rten las 'da' bar
341a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//de bas na byang chub sems dpa' gang rnyed pa dang /mi rnyed pa dang /grags pa dang /ma glags pa dang /bstod pa dang /smad pa dang /bde ba dang sdug bsngal
341a7(mdo sde): bas mi 'phrogs shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mkhengs pa/mdud pa des ni ye shes chen po de rtogs par sla'o//byang chub sems dpa' skye bo 'dzin gyis smras
341b1(mdo sde): pa/kye grogs po dag gzhan la klan ka tshol bsna ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chen po de rtogs par mi nus kyi/gcig pu gnyis su med la bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi phyir
341b2(mdo sde): go cha chen po bgos pas sems can thams cad kyi gang ci'ang rung /yongs su thob par bya ba de thams cad bdag gis yongs su thob par bya'o zhes/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /sems
341b3(mdo sde): can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du sems bskyed de/yud tsam du'ang brtson 'grus mi gtong zhing de ltar brtson 'grus la gnas pa'i byang chub
341b4(mdo sde): sems dpas ye shes chen po de rtogs par nus so//byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin gyis smras pa/kye grogs po dag 'di lta ste/dper na sa ni rtswa dang /shing gel ba dang /sman dang /
341b5(mdo sde): nags tshal thams cad kyi gnas yin te/de la gnas shing rtswa dang /shing grel ba dang /sman dang /nags tshal gyi sa bon thams cad skye bar 'gyur mod kyi/sa chen po de ni la na re/
341b6(mdo sde): ba'adra med do//sems can thams cad kyang sa chen po lngas 'tsho myod kyi/sa chen po ni skyo bar yang mi byed do//rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chags pa dang /zhe sdang
341b7(mdo sde): ba'i sems dang bral ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba dang len re ba med pa'i phyir sa dang 'dra bar sems bskyed na ye shes chen po de rtogs par nus so//byang chub sems
342a1(mdo sde): dpa' lhag na rin chen gyis smras pa/kye grogs po dag shes par gyis shig 'di ni go cha chen po yin te/dman pa la mos pas ni ye shes chen po de rtogs
342a2(mdo sde): par mi nus kyi/gang gnyid log pa'i rmi lam na'ang theg pa gnyis la sems mi 'jug cing rin po che'i sems thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems de pha rol dag kyang 'dod par byed du
342a3(mdo sde): 'jug la rin po che'i sems de la ser sna mi byed kyi/sems can thams cad kyang theg pa chen po'i go cha de skon par byed cing sems mnyam pa med pa de'ang gang ba 'am bri bar yang
342a4(mdo sde): mi mthong zhing /de ltar ser sna med pa'i sems kyis ye shes chen po de rtogs par nus so//byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen phyag rgyas smras pa/kye ma'o sems can/
342a5(mdo sde): 'di dag ni 'gro ba drug tu lhung gis/de dang de dag tu snying rje chen po bskyed de/sems can thams cad la chos kyi phyag rgya rin po che'i phyag rgya gsum gyis btab pa sbyin par bya ste/
342a6(mdo sde): sems can thos pa nyung ba rnams la ni thos pa'i lag pa sbyin par bya'o//sems can ser sna can rnams la ni gtong ba'i lag pa sbyin par bya'o//sems can ngang tshul ngan
342a7(mdo sde): pa can rnams la ni tshul khrims kyi lag pa sbyin par bya'o//sems can gnod sems can rnams la ni bzod pa'i lag pa sbyin por bya'o//sems can le lo can rnams
342b1(mdo sde): la ni brtson 'grus kyi lag pa sbyin par bya'o//sems can dran pa nyams pa rnams la ni bsam gtan thob pa'i lug pa sbyin par bya'o//sems can shes rab 'chal pa rnams la ni
342b2(mdo sde): shes rab kyi lag pa sbyin par bya ste/sems can dgra chos dkar po gang dang gang dag las bral bar gyur pa'i chos de dang de dag nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir lag pa sbyin
342b3(mdo sde): par bya ste/byang chub sems dpa' de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i lag pa'ang rin po che'i phyag rgya gsum gyis gdab par bya'o//gsum gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can thams cad
342b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bsngo ba rin po che'i phyag rgyas gdab par bya ba dang /bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub pa rin po che'i phyag rgyas gdab par bya ba
342b5(mdo sde): dang /sems can thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi phyag rgyas gdab par bya ba ste/rigs kyi bu de 'dra ba'i gnas la gnas pas ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chen po de
342b6(mdo sde): rtogs par nus so//byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i blo gros kyis smras pa/kye ma'o grogs po dag 'di ni mi 'jigs pa'i go cha'o//'di ni mi skrag pa'i go cha'o//'dra ni ma
342b7(mdo sde): zhum pa'i go cha'o//'di ni le lo med pa'i go cha'o//kye grogs po dag de bas na mi 'jigs pa dang /sems mi skrag pa dang /ma zhum pa dang /le lo med pa dang /'jigs
343a1(mdo sde): shing skrag pa spyi bung zhes byed pa dang bral ba dang /'khor ba'i nyes pa mi bskyed pa dang /mya ngan las 'da' ba'i yon tan yang dag par mthong ba dang /ba
343a2(mdo sde): ba dang sdug bsngal ba'i chos la snyoms par gnas pa dang /mi dmigs pa la gnas pa dang ldan pas thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par sla'o//byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i
343a3(mdo sde): 'gros bu sgragasde dbyangs kyis smras pa/kye grogs po dag 'gros de ni skyes bu ngan pa'i ma yin gyi/de ni skyes bu dam pa'i 'gros yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/skyes bu dam pa
343a4(mdo sde): dge ni sdig pa'i lta ba dang bral bas yang dag pa la zhugs pa yin no//skye sA bu dam pa dag ni rtag par drang ba'i rang bzhin dang ldan pas g.yo med pa yin no//skyes bu dam pa
343a5(mdo sde): dag ni bla ma la rim gro bskyed pas nga bcom pa yin no//skyes bu dam pa dag ni bstan na mthun par len pas tshig bzang ba yin no//skyes bu dam pa dag ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba la
343a6(mdo sde): gnas pas lus kyi mtha' grags pa yin no//skyes bu dam pa dag ni skyo ba dang bral bas 'dod chags dang bral ba yin no//skyes bu dam pa dag ni khong khro ba dang bral bas zhe sdang
343a7(mdo sde): dang bral ba yin no//skyes bu dam pa dag ni zhi ba rab tu zhi ba nye bar zhi bos mun pa mun nag dang bral ba yin no//skyes bu dam pa dag ni sdug bsngal ba dang dbul po la snying rje bar
343b1(mdo sde): gyur pas 'jam pa rnams yin no//skyes bu dam pa dag ni lus dang /dug dang /yid kyi las kyi mthu' yongs su dag pas 'dzem pa dang bcas pa yin no//skyes bu dam pa dag na
343b2(mdo sde): dag bya ba la yang dag par zhugs pas ji skad smras pa bzhin du byed pa yin no//skyes bu dam pa dag ni rtag tu brtul ba brtan pas lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa yin no//skyes bu
343b3(mdo sde): dam pa dag ni log pa'i chos dang bral bas bden pa la gnas pa yin no//skyes bu dam pa dag ni chos kyi dga' bas dga' zhing mgu bas chos 'dod pa yin no//skyes bu dam pa dag ni
343b4(mdo sde): lus dang srog gtong bas dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yin no//skyes bu dam pa dag ni sems can thams cad dang 'brel pas mi gtong ba yin no//skyes bu dam pa dag ni don dam
343b5(mdo sde): pa'i rjes su 'jug pas nyes pa mthong ba yin no//skyes bu dam pa dag ni sdig pa'i chos rnam par spangs pas dge ba'i chos la zhugs pa yin no//skyes bu dam pa dag ni dbul po rnams
343b6(mdo sde): kyi gter yin no//skyes bu dam pa dag ni nad pa rnams kyi sman pa yin no//skyes bu dam pa dag ni 'jigs pa rnams kyi mgon yin no//skyes bu dam pa dag ni dpung gnyen med pa
343b7(mdo sde): rnams kyi skyabs yin no//skyes bu dam pa dag ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor zhugs pa rnams kyi gnas yin no//skyes bu dam pa dag ni rten med pa rnams kyi rten yin no//skyes bu dam pa
344a1(mdo sde): dag ni mun pa mun nag tu zhugs pa rnams kyi snang bar byed pa yin no//skyes bu dam pa dag ni lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams kyi 'dren pa yin no//skyes bu dam
344a2(mdo sde): pa dag ni chos smra ba rnams kyi yongs su 'dren pa yin no//skyes bu dam pa dgra ni bzod pa dang dul ba'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas tha ba'i nyes pa dang /gnod sems dong gnod pa
344a3(mdo sde): 'chab pa dang /khro ba'i yongs su gdung ba thams cad dang bral ba yin te/de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa dag de 'dra ba'i chos la gnas pas ni ye shes chen po de rtogs par nus so//
344a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/nam mkha' dpag tu med pa bzhin du byams pa sgom pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa/snying rje chen po la gnas pa rgyun mi 'chad
344a5(mdo sde): pa/dbang po rtag tu dga' zhing dgod pa/'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad la btang snyoms su gtong ba/sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/tshul khrims nam mkha' dang
344a6(mdo sde): mtshungs pa/bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs
344a7(mdo sde): pas thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par nus so//byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo sgyur bas smras pa/sems bskyed pa gang las bdud sdig can
344b1(mdo sde): gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par mi 'gyur ba dang /lha dang mi dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /bdag gis dge ba'i phyogs yongs su 'bri bar
344b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpas mi bskyed par bya'i/sems bskyed pa gang las bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs
344b3(mdo sde): pa mnyes par 'gyur ba dang /lha dag dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /bdag gis dge ba'i phyogs yongs su 'bri bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems bskyed pa de dgra ni bskyed par bya ste/de de
344b4(mdo sde): ltar zhugs na sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' des sems bskyed ma thog tu rgyu dang dmigs
344b5(mdo sde): pa'i rkyen la skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyang ma skyes pa las rtogs par 'gyur la/byang chub ji lta bar chos kyi 'khor
344b6(mdo sde): lo sgyur ba'ang de bzhin du shes te/sems kyi bsam pa'i go cha de dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par nus so//byang chub sems dpa' tshig gi rab tu tha dad pa thams
344b7(mdo sde): cad la spobs pas smras pa/skyes bu dam pa dag byang chub ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba ste/kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rjes su song ba/rnam par byang ba'i rjes su song ba/'dus
345a1(mdo sde): byas kyi rjes su song ba/'dus ma byas kyi rjes su song ba/zug pa dang bcas pa'i rjes su song ba/zag pa med pa'i rjes su song ba/kha na ma tho ba dang bcas/
345a2(mdo sde): pa'i rjes su song ba/kha na ma tho ba med pa'i rjes su song ba/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rjes su song ba/mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rjes su song ba/'jig rten gyi chos kyi rjes su song ba/'jig
345a3(mdo sde): rten las 'dus pa'i chos kyi rjes su song ba/'khor ba'i rjes su song ba/mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes su song ba/chad pa dang rtag pa'i rjes su song ba/phung po dang /khams dang //
345a4(mdo sde): skye mched kyi rjes su song ba ste/skyes bu dam pa dag byang chub ni sa dang chu dang /mi dang /rlung dang /nam mkha'i rjes su song ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos thams cad ni 'di
345a5(mdo sde): lta bu'i rang bzhin te/rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//de dag ni brjod pa gang dang gang gis brjod par bya ba'i rnam pa de thams cad stong pa nyid smos par byed pa'o//'di lta ste/
345a6(mdo sde): dper na/nam mkha'i dbyings ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ngo //de bzhin du byang chub kyang thams cad kyi rjes su song ste/skyes bu dam pa dag byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i
345a7(mdo sde): ye shes la mos pa ni dmigs pa thams cad la spobs pa 'byung zhing de ni tshig gi rab tu tha dad pa shes pa thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur te/tshul gcig la 'thob par 'gyur te/tshul
345b1(mdo sde): gcig la 'jug pa des thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so//byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa'i phung pos smras pa/kye grogs po dag brjod pa thams cad ni brjod du med pa ste/sgra thams
345b2(mdo sde): cad bsnyad du med pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' ye shes de la mos pa ni sems mi g.yo bar 'dug pa yin te/snyan par smras pa dang /mi snyan par smras pa la dga' ba dang zhum pa med
345b3(mdo sde): do//'dre lta ste/dper na ri lhun po'i phung po la rlung bab pa las slar log na ri lhun po ni g.yo ba'ang med/rab tu g.yo ba'ang med do//rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
345b4(mdo sde): de 'dra ba'i ye shes rtogs pas thams cad kyi sgra dang brjod pa kun bzod de/g.yo bar mi byed/rab tu g.yo bar mi byed cing pha rol mu stegs can gyi smra ba gang la'ang chags par mi
345b5(mdo sde): 'gyur/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang /mu stegs can gyi tshig kyang chos mnyam pa nyid du mthong /mnyam po nyid la'ang 'gal bar mi byed/mu stegs can thams cad kyi spobs
345b6(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyang zad pa'i chos su mthong /zad pa'i chos kyis chos la chos chen por yang mi byed de/skyes bu dam pa dag byang chub sems dpa' de 'dra ba'i ye shes la mos pa ni myur
345b7(mdo sde): du thams cad mkhyen pa thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos smras pa/skyes bu dam pa dag byang chub sems dpas thos pa thams cad bzung ba'i phyir blo gros rgya
346a1(mdo sde): mtsho la sems 'jug pa rtogs par bya'o//chos nyid la sna tshogs med pa'i phyir des chos ro gcig pa la mos par bya'o//rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mi
346a2(mdo sde): 'gal ba'i phyir des chos nyid la brtag par bya'o//zlog ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir chos gang yang ma bri ba dang mA 'phel bar bya'o//bsod nams mi zad pa'i phyir sems can
346a3(mdo sde): thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o//chad pa dang rtag pa las dben pa'i phyir des mtha' gnyis rtogs par bya'o//sems kyi sgom pa tshad med pa'i phyir des
346a4(mdo sde): chos thams cad la brtag par bya'o//chos yang dag par mi brjed pa'i phyir bdag gi dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa'ang yongs su gzhog par bya'o//sems can thams cad la snyoms
346a5(mdo sde): par chos 'chad pa'i phyir zhes snyoms pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa lhur byed pa'i phyir mi dge ba'i chos
346a6(mdo sde): thams cad dang mi 'grogs par bya'o//skyes bu dam pa dag dran pa'i ye shes kyi go cha des ni thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par nus so//byang chub sems dpa' lhun po chen pos
346a7(mdo sde): smras pa 'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi ye shes de ni 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i ye shes te/de ni tshad yod pa'i spyod pas rtogs par mi nus so//de
346b1(mdo sde): bas na bsam pa 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang /thos pa 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang /dad pa 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par
346b2(mdo sde): 'phags pa dang /sbyin pa 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang /de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab
346b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang /bsod nams ri rab lhun po bzhin du mngon par 'phags pas thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par nus so//byang chub sems dpa'
346b4(mdo sde): mthong na dga' bas smras pa/skyes bu dam pa dag gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi gzugs kyi sems yongs su dag pas gzugs su snang ba yid du mi 'ong ba gang yang
346b5(mdo sde): mig gis mthong zhing snang bar mi 'gyur/bdag gi rna ba'i sems yongs su dag pas sgra yid du mi 'ong ba gang yang rna bas thos shing grag par mi 'gyur/de bzhin du de'ang ma yin/
346b6(mdo sde): ro'ang ma yin/reg kyang ma yin/rang gi yul gyi sems yongs su dag pas chos yid du mi 'ong ba gang yang yid la snang bar mi 'gyur/rang gi sems yongs su dag pas
346b7(mdo sde): yid dga' ba dang /mi dga' ba dang /ma 'brel cing sems can gang yang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod ma yin par ma mthong ste/gang log par nges pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi
347a1(mdo sde): chos kyi snod du gyur par mthong zhing /gang bdag shin tu dga' bar gyur pa'i dngos po de dga' zhing yongs su gtong la byin nas kyang mi 'gyod pa yin te/
347a2(mdo sde): de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos smras pa/gang gi tshe na smyos pa dang /
347a3(mdo sde): brgyad pa dang /smod pa dang /brnyas pa dang /brdegs pa dang /tshar bcad na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba bskyed cing gang zag de la'ang dge ba'i bshos gnyen
347a4(mdo sde): du 'du shes skyed la/bzod par byed/bzod pa'i mthu ston cing rab tu dga' ba skyes nas spro bar byed pa 'di su/gang lo spyo bar bya zhes de chos nyid kyi rjes su 'jug par
347a5(mdo sde): byed/nang gi stong pa nyid la mos shing byi'i stong pa nyid la the tshom med pas bdag tu lta ba'ang mi bskyed cing bzod la/rkang pa dang lag pa yongs su gtong ba dang /mig
347a6(mdo sde): dang mgo yongs su gtong ba dang /chung ma dang /bu pho dang bu mo yongs su gtong ba dang /rgyal srid yongs su gtong bas rab tu dga' ba yin/lus dang srog yongs su gtong bas
347a7(mdo sde): dga' ba yin te/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob pas dga' ba ma yin gyi/legs par bshad pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig thos pas shin tu dga' ba yin/brgya byin
347b1(mdo sde): rdothob pas dga' ba ma yin gyi/gzhan chos 'chad pa la shin tu dga' ba yin/tshangs pa thob pas dga' ba ma yin gyi/sems can gcig kyang bla na med pa yang dag dar rdzogs pa'i
347b2(mdo sde): byang chub la gzhag na rab tu dga' ba yin/stong gsum rin po ches bkang byas dga' ba ma yin gyi/de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas rab tu dga' ba yin te/de ni gzhar yang
347b3(mdo sde): dbang po nyams par mi 'gyur zhing dga' bar gyur nas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dga' zhing mgu ba'i spyod pa 'dis sgrub par byed pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par nus so///
347b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas mthong bas smos pa/skyes bu dam pa dag gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad mthong mod kyi/bdag tu lta bar yang mi lhung //
347b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shes mod kyi/rnam par rtog pa spyod pa'ang ma yin/sangs rgyas thams cad mthong mod kyi/gzugs la dmigs pa'i 'du shes kyang mi bskyed//
347b6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad mthong mod kyi sems can du 'du shes kyang mi bskyed/las kyi rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir sha'i mgu gsal bar gyur pa yin/mngon por
347b7(mdo sde): shes pa thob pas lha'i mig dang ldan pa yin/nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bas shes rab kyi mig rtogs par khong du chud pa yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
348a1(mdo sde): wa grub pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan la mos pa yin/stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs pas chos kyi spyan snang ba thob pa yin te/rigs kyi bu de 'dra ba'i ye shes mthong
348a2(mdo sde): ba yongs su rdzogs pas thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par nus so//byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas dmigs par gnas pas smras pa/byang chub ni thams cad dmigs
348a3(mdo sde): pa ste/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dmigs pa thams cad ni nang na'ang mi gnas/phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/dbus na'ang
348a4(mdo sde): mi gnas par brtag par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa la mi gnas pa ni nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa dang /las la dmigs pa dang /bdud la dmigs
348a5(mdo sde): pas nyams par mi 'gyur te/las dang /nyon mongs pa dang /bdud la dmigs pa las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so//byang
348a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bdud kyi lta ba yang dag par 'joms pas smras pa/rigs kyi bu bdag tu lta ba ni bdag tu lta ba las ldang zhing byung ba yin/bdud kyi las ni lta ba las ldang zhing byung ba
348a7(mdo sde): ste/bdag tu lta ba yongs su shes na lta ba 'byung bar mi byed do//lta ba yongs su shes na phung po 'byung bar mi byed do//phung po yongs su shes na bdud mi mthong ngo //
348b1(mdo sde): bdud kyi yul las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la reg par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa thob na thams cad mkhyen pa
348b2(mdo sde): rtogs so//byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan med sbyin gyis smras pa/las nyes pa byed pa ni phyis 'gyod par 'gyur/las legs par byed pa ni phyis mya ngan byed par mi 'gyur ro//
348b3(mdo sde): de bas na byang chub sems dpas las legs pa byed pa/las mi smad pa byed pa/las mi 'gyod pa byed pa/las khan ma tho ba med pa byed par bya'o//sems can mya ngan gyi zug rngus
348b4(mdo sde): zug pa rnams kyang mya ngan zhi bar bya ba dang /zug rngu dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir chos bshad par bya ste/de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so//
348b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad grub pas smras pa/rigs kyi bu dag skyes bu gang zag tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems kyi smon pa 'grub/smon lam 'grub par 'gyur la/tshul
348b6(mdo sde): khrims kyi rtsa ba la'ang bag byed pa brten/bag byed pa'i rtsa ba la'ang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams rten/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi rtsa ba la 'di thams cad mkhyen pa brten to//
348b7(mdo sde): de bas na byang chub sems dpa' bag byed pa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos lo brten pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so//lha'i bu kun nas me tog gis smras pa/rig
349a1(mdo sde): bu dag 'di lta ste/dper na shing me tog gis brgyan pa ni 'gro ba mang po'i nye bar 'tsho ba yin no//rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
349a2(mdo sde): chen po rnam par thar pa'i chos kyi me tog rgyas pa ni 'gro ba mang po'i nye bar 'tsho ba yin no//rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/dper na lha rnams kyi shing pa ri ya tra kra ko bi dA ra me tog
349a3(mdo sde): rgyas na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu rnams mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i chos kyi me tog
349a4(mdo sde): rgyas na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/dper na lha'i nor bu rin po che skyon thams cad dang bral la yon tan thams
349a5(mdo sde): cad dang ldan pa de bzhin du/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa yongs su dag pa skyon thams cad dang bral la yon tan thams cad dang ldan pas thams cad
349a6(mdo sde): mkhyen pa rtogs so//lha'i bu me tog 'od zer can gyis smras pa/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na nyi ma'i 'od zer btang na mun pa bsal cing gzugs kyi rnam pa thams
349a7(mdo sde): cad snang bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi snang ba'i 'od zer dang ldan pa'ang gang gi tshe na chos kyi snang ba gtong ba de'i tshe//
349b1(mdo sde): ma rig pa dang glen pa'i mun pas bsgribs pa'i sems can rnams la snang ba chen po byed cing chos kyi rang bzhin yang ston te/mun pas ni snang ba zil gyis non par mi 'gyur gyi/snang //
349b2(mdo sde): bas ni lam rtogs par nus pas byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas na sems can lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams la yang dag pa'i lam ston te/byang chub sems dpa' lam la
349b3(mdo sde): gnas na thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so//lha'i bu me tog mAn+da ra bA'i dris smras pa/rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste dper na/me tog man+da ra ba'i kho ra khor yug dpag tshad gcig tu
349b4(mdo sde): drisras khyab par byed de/dri de'ang rnam par rtog pa med do//rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gtong ba dang /tshul khrims dang /thos pa dang /ting nge 'dzin
349b5(mdo sde): dang /shes rab la gnas pa'ang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dris khyab par byed de/dri de'ang nyon mongs pa'i nang thams cad sel bar byed do//
349b6(mdo sde): de bas na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dri dang ldan na thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so//lha'i bu chos la gnas pa rtag tu brtson pas smras pa/kye grogs po dag byang chub sems
349b7(mdo sde): dpa' brtson pas byang chub par 'gyur gyi/mi brtson pas ni ma yin no//de bas na byang chub sems dpas rtag par brtson zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba la chog mi shes par bya'o//des chos
350a1(mdo sde): brgyad la brtson par bya'o//brgyang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi sbyor ba la brtson par bya ba dang tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi sgrub pa la mngon
350a2(mdo sde): par shes pa lnga shes shing rtogs par khong du chud pa'i ye shes dang /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ste/bzhi gang zhe na/sbyin pa dang /
350a3(mdo sde): tshig 'jam po dang /don spyad pa dang /don mtshungs par bya ba dag dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la bzod pa thob pa dang /gzhan sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzhog pa
350a4(mdo sde): dang /bdag byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang /thabs mkhas pas spro bar byed pa dang /gus par byas shing dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ste/chos brgyad po
350a5(mdo sde): de dag la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas skyes bu dam pa de dgA dang /lha'i bu de dag la 'di
350a6(mdo sde): skad ces smras so//kye grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' gang ma 'brel ba dang /mi brtson pa des thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/mu 'brel ces
350a7(mdo sde): bya ba ni khams gsum dang ngo //mi brtson zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa dang /rnam par rtog pa dang /yongs su rtog pa thams cad la'o//ma 'brel ces bya ba ni nang dang ngo //
350b1(mdo sde): mi brtson zhes bya ba ni phyi la'o//ma 'brel ces bya ba ni nyan thos kyis dang do//mi brtson zhes bya bA ni rang sangs rgyas kyis la'o//ma 'brel nes bya ba ni 'khor bun spyod pa'i nyon
350b2(mdo sde): rmongs pa dang lci ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang ngo po//mi brtson zhes bya ba ni byis pa lta bu so so'i skye bo'i chos thams cad la'o//ma 'brel ces bya ba ni ming dang ngo //mi brtson zhes bya ba
350b3(mdo sde): ni gzugs la'o//ma 'brel ces bya ba ni rgyu dang ngo //mi btsun zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu la'o//mo 'brel ces bya ba ni lta ba'i rnam pa dang ngo //mi brtson zhes bya ba ni lta ba dang bral ba la'o///
350b4(mdo sde): ma 'brel ces bya ba ni chags pa dang ngo //myi brtson zhes bya ba ni khong khro ba la'o//ma 'brel ces bya ba ni ngar 'dzin dang ngo //mi brtson zhes bya ba ni bdag gi rI 'dzin pa la'o//ma
350b5(mdo sde): 'brel ces bya ba ni ser sna dang ngo //myi brtson zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa'i snyems pa la'o//ma 'brel ces bya ba ni ngang tshul ngan pa dang ngo //mi brtson zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims snyems
350b6(mdo sde): pa la'o//ma 'brel ces bya ba ni gnod sems drang ngo //mi brtson zhes bya ba ni bzod pa'i snyoms pa la'o//ma 'brel ces bya ba ni le lo dang ngo //mi brtson zhes bya ba ni brtson
350b7(mdo sde): 'grus snyems pa la'o//ma 'brel ces bya ba ni dran pa nyams pa dang ngo //mi brtson zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan snyems pa la'o//ma 'brel ces bya ba ni shes rab 'chal pa dang /
351a1(mdo sde): ngo//mi brtson zhes bya ba ni shes rab snyems pa la'o//ma 'brel ces bya ba ni dge ba dang ngo //mi brtson zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba sgro 'dogs pa lnga'o//
351a2(mdo sde): ma 'brel ces bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi chos dang ngo //mi brtson zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mngon par bya bar chags pa la'o//ma 'brel ces bya ba ni 'dus
351a3(mdo sde): byas dang ngo //mi brtson zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa'i chos la yongs su rtog pa la'o//ma 'brel ces bya ba ni kha na mtho ba dang bcas pa dang ngo //mi brtson zhes bya ba ni
351a4(mdo sde): kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos sgro 'dogs pa la'o//ma 'brel ces bya ba ni zag pa dang bcus pa dang ngo //mi brtson zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa'i zad pa'i chos su snyems pa
351a5(mdo sde): la'o//kye grogs po dag de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'brel ba dang /ma 'brel bar lta ba dang bral bas thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs
351a6(mdo sde): mod kyi/yang kye grogs po dag thams cad mkhyen pa ni mi rtogs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byed pas thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
351a7(mdo sde): byed pa dang bral ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin te/thams cad mkhyen pa la rtogs par byed pa la rtogs par byed pa su'ang med do//thams cad mkhyen pa ni gzugs
351b1(mdo sde): kyis kyang mi rtogs/tsho rabs ma yin 'du shes kyis kyang ma yin/'du byed kyis kyang ma yin/rnam par shes pas mi rtogs so//thams cad mkhyen pa ni chos kyis kyang //
351b2(mdo sde): mi rtogs/chos ma yin pas kyang mi rtogs so//thams cad mkhyen pa ni smyon pas kyang mi rtogs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sbyin pa nyid thams cad mkhyen pa'o//thams cad
351b3(mdo sde): mkhyen pa ni tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyis kyang mi rtogs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab nyid thams cad
351b4(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'o//yang kye grogs po dag thams cad mkhyen pa ni 'das pa ma yin/ma 'ongs pa ma yin/da ltar byung ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kye grogs po dag thams
351b5(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa ni dus gsum lngas 'dras pa'i phyir ro//yang kyi grogs po dag thams cad mkhyen pa ni mig gis rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin no//kye
351b6(mdo sde): grogs po dag thams cad mkhyen pa ni rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kye
351b7(mdo sde): gogs po dag thams cad mkhyen pa ni yul thams cid las 'das pa'o//kye grogs po dag thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par 'dod pas thams cad mkhyen pa ji ltar gnas
352a1(mdo sde): pa de bzhin du gnas par bya'o//smras pa/thams cad mkhyen pa ji ltar gnas pa lags/smras pa/gang chos thams cad la mi glanas pa de ni thams
352a2(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa'o//chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid de ni thams cad mkhyen pa ste/so so'i skye bo'i sa mnyam pa nyid dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos su mnyam zhing de ltar chos
352a3(mdo sde): thams cad mnyam pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'o//byang chub sems dpas 'byung ba chen po bzhi las byung ba'i lus de nyid ma gtogs par gzhan du thams cad mkhyen pa
352a4(mdo sde): btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lus de ni dngos po med pa'o//lus zhes bya ba de ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos la lhun gyis grub pa'o//lus zhes bya ba de ni
352a5(mdo sde): bdag ma yin pa dang bdag med pa'o//lus zhes bya ba de ni ma byung ba yang dag par ma byung ba ste/de la gdags pa med do//gang de la gdags pa de'ang ma byung ba'o//
352a6(mdo sde): gang dri mthong ba de'ang ma byung ba'o//gang ma byung ba de ni yang dag par ma byung ba'o//gang yang dag par ma byung ba de ni mi shes pa dang mi rtogs pa'o//gang mi shes pa
352a7(mdo sde): dang mi rtogs pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'o//bstan pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe lha'i bu nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//lha'i bu khri nyis stong ni bla na
352b1(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa'i phung pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces
352b2(mdo sde): smras so//'jam dpal tshur spyon/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar dong la/byang chub sems dpas ji lta bur bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon sum du zhu'o//de nas
352b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sa'i phyogs de nyid du/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i kha dog dang /dbyibs dang /chu zheng 'dra ba'i dri bzhin gshegs pa zhig mngon par sprul to///
352b4(mdo sde): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa'i phung po la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bur bya ba
352b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du bzhugs pa 'di la zhus shig/de nas sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa'i phung pos
352b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ji lta bur bgyi zhes de skad gsol pa dang /des bka' stsal pa/nga ci 'dra ba ltar byang chub sems dpas kyang de bzhin du bya'o//gsol
352b7(mdo sde): pa/'o na bcom ldan 'das ji 'dra/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/sbyin pa ma spyad/tshul khrims ma spyad/bzod pa ma spyad/brtson 'grus ma spyad/bsam gtan
353a1(mdo sde): ma spyad/shes rab ma spyad/'dod pa'i khams su ma spyad/gzugs kyi khams su mu spyad/gzugs med pa'i khams su ma spyad/lus kyis ma spyad/
353a2(mdo sde): ngag gis ma spyad/yid kyis ma spyad pa ste/thams cad du ma spyad cing ma zhugs pa'o//rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ji sprul pas spyad dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan
353a3(mdo sde): 'das sprul pas ma spyad do//bka'o stsal pa/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas de ltar bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa'i phung pos 'jam
353a4(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jom dpal de bzhin gshegs pa 'di sprul pa ma yin grang /des smras pa/rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni sprul pa'i
353a5(mdo sde): rang bzhin du nges te/sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid las mi ldog go/smras pa/'jam dpal de bzhin no//chos thams cad ni sprul pa'i rang bzhin can te/sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid
353a6(mdo sde): las mi ldog go/smras pa/chos thams cad sprul pa'i rang bzhin can yin na/khyod ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa 'di sprul pa ma yin grang snyam du byed par gyur/smras pa//
353a7(mdo sde): sus sprul/smras pa/bdag gis las kyi rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pas sbrul gyis/'di na rang bzhin gyis bdag gam/sems can nam/srog gam/gang zag
353b1(mdo sde): dag sangs rgyas su gnas pa'am/so so'i skye bor gnas pa ni ma yin no//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa'i phung pos
353b2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis gang la bslabs nas byang chub thob par gyur/bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu mi slob pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i slob pa'o//mi sdom/
353b3(mdo sde): pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'o//mi 'jigs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i slob pa'o//mi rtog pa ni byang chub sems drapa'i slob pa'o//mi slob pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i
353b4(mdo sde): slob pa'o//rigs kyi bu gnas med pa dang /mi snyems pa dang /ma spros pa dang /mi len pa dang /mi gtong ba dang /mi rgyu ba dang /yi ge med pa dang /mi skye ba dang /mi 'gag
353b5(mdo sde): pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /ma song ba dang /mi gnas pa dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /dngos po med pa dang /mi dmigs pa dang /'du shes thams cad dang bral ba ni byang chub/
353b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi slob pa ste/gang de ltar slob pa de dag ni yang dag par slob pa'o//gang de ltar slob pa de dag ni gang la'ang zhe sdang ba med do//gang
353b7(mdo sde): de ltar slob pa de dag ni gang du'ang chags pa med do//gang de ltar slob pa de dag ni gang du'ang zhen pa med do//gang las kyang grol ba med do//gang de ltar slob pa de dag ni gar
354a1(mdo sde): du'ang 'dod chags pa med do//gang nas kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba med do//zhe sdang med do//gti mug med do//gang de ltar slob pa de dag ni slob
354a2(mdo sde): 'dod pa zhes bya'o//gang slob 'dod pa de dag ni 'gro ba gang du'ang mi 'gro'o//mi 'ong ngo /de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par
354a3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas nga ji lta ba bzhin du 'khor ba'ang med/mya ngan las 'da' ba'ang med/gtong ba'ang med//len
354a4(mdo sde): pa'ang med/tshul khrims kyang ming /ngang tshul ngan pa'ang med/bzod pa'ang med/gnod sems kyang med/brtson 'grus kyang med/le lo'ang med/bsam
354a5(mdo sde): gtan yang med/g.yeng ba'ang med/shes rab kyang med/shes rab 'chal pa'ang med/slob pa'ang med/mi slob pa'ang med/spyod pa'ang med/mi spyod pa'ang
354a6(mdo sde): med cing //nga ji lta ba bzhin du thob pa'ang med/ma thob pa'ang med/mngon par byang ba'ang med/byang chub kyang med/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang med/bdag tu
354a7(mdo sde): 'du shes pa'ang med/sems can du 'du shes pa'ang med/srog tu 'du shes pa'ang med/gang zag tu 'du shes pa'ang med/chos su 'du shes pa'ang med/'du
354b1(mdo sde): shes pa nyid kyang med/'du shes med pa'ang ma yin par nga'i rjes su bslab par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pa
354b2(mdo sde): dang /tha dad par gyur pa med pas mi 'gyur ba'o//rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni so so tha dad pa med pas gnyis su med pa'o//rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni mig gi lam
354b3(mdo sde): las 'das pas bltar mi snang ba'o//rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni khyad par med pa'i phyir mnyam pa'o//rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni g.yo ba med cing byed pa med pa'i phyir
354b4(mdo sde): glen pa ste/de dag la gdags pa med do//gdags pa med pa'i chos rnams ni shin tu ma skyes pa'o//gang de ltar mos pa de dag ni grol bas mi snyems/spyod pas mi snyems//
354b5(mdo sde): byang chub kyis mi snyems so//rigs kyi bu de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di 'dra ba'i slob pa dang /spyod pa bshad pa'i tshe mi 'jigs/mi dra dang /skrag
354b6(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur te/de ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na nam mkha'i dbyings ni mes mi 'jigs/rlung gis mi 'jigs/char pas mi 'jigs//
354b7(mdo sde): than pas mi 'jigs/rdul gyis mi 'jigs/du bas mi 'jigs/sprin gyi phung pos mi 'jigs/glog gis mi 'jigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/nam mkha'i dbyings ni bzung
355a1(mdo sde): du med pa'i phyir ro//rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang chos thams cad kyis mi 'jigs par bya'o//bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba thams cad
355a2(mdo sde): la mi bsam par bya ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems nam mkha' drang mtshungs pas bdud kyi sde las rgyal bar nus so//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
355a3(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus so//sems can rnams kyi don byed nus so//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa des de skad gsungs nus/de nyid du mi
355a4(mdo sde): snang bar gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa'i phung pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dag
355a5(mdo sde): gshegs/smras pa/gang nas gshegs par ro//smras pa/'o na gang nas gshegs/smras pa/gang du gshegs pa nas so//smras pa/'jam dpal sprul pa ni//
355a6(mdo sde): song ba'ang med/'od ba'ang med do//smras pa/rigs kyi bu sprul pa song ba'ang med/'ong ba'ang med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de'i 'gros can nyid do//sems
355a7(mdo sde): can thams cad kyang de'i 'gros can nyid do//smras pa/'jam dpal chos thams cad ji lta bu'i 'gros can lags/smras pa/rang bzhin gnas pa'i 'gros can no//
355b1(mdo sde): rgyus pa/yang sems can rnams cad de lta bu'i 'grus can lags/smras pa/las kyi rnam pAr smin pa ji lta bu'i 'gros can pa de bzhin no//smras hA/'dum dpal la
355b2(mdo sde): mas cad las kyi rnam par smin bra ma mchis pa ma legs sam/smras pa/rigs kyi bu chos nyid l-I ni lus kyi rnam par smin pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos thams cad ni/
355b3(mdo sde): chos nyid kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir ro//smras pa/'o na ji ltar ni las kyi rnam par smin pa ji lta bu'i 'gros can pa de bzhin pa lags/smras pa/las de ji lta ba rnam par
355b4(mdo sde): smin pa'ang de bzhin/de'i 'gro ba'ang de bzhin no//smras pa/'jam dpal las ji lta bu lags/rnam par smin pa ji lta bu lpags/'gro ba ji lta bu lags/smras pa/de bzhin
355b5(mdo sde): nyid ji lta bar las kyang de bzhin/rnam par smin pa 'dri de bzhin/'gro ba'ang de bzhin no//smras pa/'jam dpal de bzhin nyid la ni las kyang ma mchis/rnam par smin pa'ang
355b6(mdo sde): mA mchi ste/'gro ba'ang ma mchis so//smras pa/rigs kyi bu ji ltar de bzhin nyid la las kyang med/rnam par smin pa'ang med/'gro ba'ang med pa ltar las kyi rnam par
355b7(mdo sde): smin pa'i 'gro ba'ang de bzhin du shes par bya'o//las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'gro ba ni 'ong ba med pa can 'gro ba med pa can yin te/de bzhin nyid kyi 'gros las 'da' bar mi
356a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//ston pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang /nyan thos chen po gzhan drug kyang //
356a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan snga na bstan pa 'di la nyan to////bam po gnyis pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das lnga tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i busa'i
356a3(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos nyid ni gcig pa kho na lags na/skyes bu dam pa skyes bu chen po de dag brjod pa sna tshogs kyis ston kyang chos nyid drang yang mi
356a4(mdo sde): 'gal bar bgyid pa ngo mtshar to//bcom ldan 'das su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub tu sems mi skye bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'/
356a5(mdo sde): sbrusbyastsalnga pa/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ni de ltar ma chags pa'i slob pa la slob cing /mi chags bzhin du ston te/shA ri'i bu sa bon ji lta ba bzhin bskyed kyang de
356a6(mdo sde): bzhin no//shA ri'i bu de dang 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ji lte ba bzhin du de dag gi ye shes so//de bzhin du de dag gi ston pa'o//shA ri'i bu khyod
356a7(mdo sde): kyis bslab pa ji lta bu la bslabs pa khyod kyi ye shes kyang de bzhin no//spobs pa'ang de dang 'dra bar khyod kyis thob po//byang chub sems dpa' 'od bkod pas gsol
356b1(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi bslab pa ji lta bu lags/byang chub sems dra ba'i bslab pa ji lta bu lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu ny+dzan thos
356b2(mdo sde): kyi bslab pa ni tshad yod pa/byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ni tshod med pa ste/rigs kyi bu ji ltar nyan thos kyi bslab pa tshad yod la chags pa dang bcas pa de bzhin du de'i ye
356b3(mdo sde): shes kyang tshad yod la chags pa dang bcas pa'o//rigs kyi bu ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i bsgrub pa tshad med lde chags pa med pa de bzhin du de'i ye shes kyang chad med la
356b4(mdo sde): chags pa med pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bkod pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di nas
356b5(mdo sde): su'ang chos nyan pa mi spong bar bgyi na/skyes bu dam pa de dag 'dir mchi bar mtshan ma zhig mdzad du gsol/de ci'i slad du zhe na/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni zab mo la
356b6(mdo sde): mos pas de'i chos bshad pa'ang zab mo logs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir mtshan ma mdzad do//de nas 'jam
356b7(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa skyes bu dam pa nyi shu rtsa lnga po de dag dang 'grogs/lha'i 'khor de dag dang 'grogs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /bcom
357a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bkod pas 'jam
357a2(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal khyod ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor nas byung la phyogs gcig tu song ste chos ston/smras pa/
357a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag ni mnyes par dka' ste/gau ta ma thams cad kyis mnyes par mi nus so//smras pa/'jam dpal gtam ji lta bus de
357a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par 'gyur/smras pa/bcom ldan 'das nyid mkhyen te thugs su chud mod kyi/bdag ji ltar spobs pa de bzhin du ston to//rigs kyi bu gtam
357a5(mdo sde): gang chos kyi dbyings dang yang mi 'gal/de bzhin nyid dang yang mi 'gal/yang dag pa'i mtha' dang yang mi 'gal ba de 'dra ba'i gtam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes
357a6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//gtam gang 'thab pa med pa/rtsod pa med pa/rtsom pa med pa/klan ka med pa/sgro 'dogs pa med pa/de 'dra ba'i gtam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa
357a7(mdo sde): mnyes par 'gyur ro//gtam gang bdag la sgro mi 'dogs/gzhan la sgro mi 'dogs/chos ma yin pa la sgro mi 'dogs/'khor ba la sgro mi 'dogs/mya ngan las 'da'
357b1(mdo sde): ba lnga sgro mi 'dogs pa de 'dra ba'i gtam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya/
357b2(mdo sde): ba byin nas legs so legs so//'jam dpal khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par bshad pa yin te/'di 'dra ba'i gtam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par 'gyur mod kyi//
357b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpral gtam gang spros pa thams cad las 'das pa/hA cung yang mi zhib pa/ha cang yang mi rtsing ba/mtshan ma med pa'i gtam dri brjod na ting nge 'dzin kyang mi gtong //
357b4(mdo sde): rtag tu shin tu sems mnyam par yang gzhog cing ston par byed la chos gang yang 'phel ba'am/'bri bar yang mi mthong ba de 'dra ba'i gtam gyis dri bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par
357b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//ston pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to//'khor de nas lha'i bu sngon spyod pa dang ldan pas
357b6(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sems rab tu sbyor ba nyi sa brgya 'di snyam du gyur te/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang de ltar tshad med pa/byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'ang de ltar shin tu bslab dka' ba
357b7(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang de tsam du bsgrub dka' ba yin na bdag cag gis slob pa 'di bslab mi nus kyis/gang bdag cag ni nyan thos kyi theg pa
358a1(mdo sde): 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa
358a2(mdo sde): sems kyis mkhyen nas/kye ma'o lha'i bu 'di nas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya ba'i skul ba yod do zhes lha'i bu de dag gdul ba'i dbang gi
358a3(mdo sde): phyir 'khor gyi phyi rol tu khyim bdag gcig mngon par sprul nas khyim bdag des lhung bzed kha zas ro brgyas gang ba zhig lag pa g.yas pa na thogs par gyur to//de nas
358a4(mdo sde): khyim bdag de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/lhung bzed kha zas kyis bkang ba de bcom ldan 'das la
358a5(mdo sde): phul nas/bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du zhal zas 'di bzhes par gsol zhes de skad gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed zas
358a6(mdo sde): kyis bkang ba de bzhes so//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di
358a7(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das zhal zas 'di las bdag la ma stsal bar gsol na ni bcom ldan 'das byas pa ga zo ba mi mdzad par 'gyur ro//de nas tshe dang
358b1(mdo sde): ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du gyur te/kye mu'o 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sngon bcom ldan 'das la ji lta ba bzhin phan btags na de'i phyir byas pa gzo ba myed pas
358b2(mdo sde): rgal snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i sems kyi rtog pa mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsol to//shA ri'i bu de
358b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen te/khyod la bka' stsol gyis sdod cig/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed de sa chen po'i nang du btang ba dang /btang ma thag tu 'og gi
358b4(mdo sde): phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho ga zhes pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi spyan sngar lhung

358b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na lhung bzed de ma bzung bar bar snang la 'dug par
358b7(mdo sde): gyur to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la'ang bdag bdag gi bsnyen bkur byed pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das lhung bzed 'di ga las mchis zhes zhus nas/sangs rgyas//
359a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang steng gi phyogs kyi cha 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
359a2(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i drung nas 'ongs te/byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gdul ba'i phyir btang ba yin no zhes bstan to//de nas bcom
359a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu lhung bzed de phyungs shig/gang na 'dug pa ga lo 'dug pa de'ang tshol cig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa

359a5(mdo sde): de'i gnas sam gzhi'ang ma mthong nas de slar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag
359a6(mdo sde): gis lhung bzed de'i gnas sum gzhi'ang ma mthong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mod+gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//mod+gal gyi bu/

359b1(mdo sde): stobs kyis 'og gi phyogs kyi cha sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag ban+d+har song yang lhung bzed de'i gnas sam gzhi 'ang ma mthong nas de sbyar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dun

359b3(mdo sde): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor khyod kyis lhung bzed de tshol cig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu gnyis la

359b6(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid du nyan thos chen po lnga brgya tsam bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang /lha'i mig gis lhung bzed de btsal kyang ma rnyed do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub
359b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so//byams pa khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs par lung
360a1(mdo sde): bstan na/lhung bzed de gang na 'dug ga la 'dug tshol cig ces de skad smras pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams bras tshe dang ldan pa

360a3(mdo sde): lung bstan mod kyi/bdag gis ni ting nge 'dzin de dag gi ming yang ma 'tshal te/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni ting nge 'dzin de dag la mnyam par yang gzhog/

365a7(mdo sde): na 'dug par gyur pa las khye'u des dge slong de rkyong ma nas 'ong ba mthong ngo mthong nas ma ma'i pang pa nas babs te/dge slong de ga la ba der brgyugs nas bza' ba bslangs
365b1(mdo sde): pa las/dge slong des de la mo da ka gcig byin pa dang /de bza' ba des sgrogs nas dge sbyong de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur pa las/de rim gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi
365b2(mdo sde): thub pa'i rgyul mtshan ga la ba der song ste phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyagro btsal te spyan sngar 'dug go/de nas dge slong ye shes rgyal pos bsod
365b3(mdo sde): snyoms ci rnyed pa khye'u de la byin nas/kye khye'u bsod snyoms 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol cig ces byas so//de nas khye'u nges bsod snyoms de blangs te/bcom ldan
365b4(mdo sde): 'das de'i lhung bzed bkang yang bsod snyoms de yongs su zad par ma gyur to//shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste bsod snyoms gcig pu de las khye'u des nyan thos brgyad khri bzhi stong po de
365b5(mdo sde): dag dang /byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong po de dag dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan de zhos par byas shing bstabs kyang bsod snyoms
365b6(mdo sde): de yongs su zad par ma gyur to//de nas khye'u de dga' mgu rangs rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/tshigs su bcad
365b7(mdo sde): pa 'di dag smras so//dge slong dge 'dun zhes byas kyang //lhung bzed nam yang ma zad pas//sbyin gnas bsod nams zhing gyur pa//bdag gis nges par mchod par gyur//
366a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten mgon po zhes byas kyang //'bras chan zad par ma gyur pas//sangs rgyas la ni phul gyur na//sbyin pa mi zad the tshom med//ji ltar 'bras
366a2(mdo sde): can mi zad cing //phyi phyir 'phel bar 'gyur ba ltar//sangs rgyas dag la gang gus pa'i//dge ba dag ni de bzhin 'phol//shA ri'i bu de lta ste/khye'u des bsod
366a3(mdo sde): snyoms gcig pu de las de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa nyi ma bdun du zhos par gsol nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /khye'u de'i sems kyi
366a4(mdo sde): bsam pa dang bas zas de yongs su zad par ma gyur to//de nas dge slong ye shes rgyal pos khye'u de sangs rgyas la skyabs su btang /chos la skyabs su btang /dge
366a5(mdo sde): 'dun la skyabs su btang ngo //khrims kyang phog go/nyes pa'ang mthol du gzhug go//rjes su yi rang bar bya ba dag kyang rjes su yi rang bar byed du bcug go//gsol ba
366a6(mdo sde): gdab par bya ba dag kyang gsol ba 'debs su bcug nas phyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed du bcug go//shA ri'i bu de lta ste/khye'u
366a7(mdo sde): de'i pha dang ma khye'u de tshol zhing de bzhin gshegs pa mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te spyan
366b1(mdo sde): sngar 'dug go/de nas khye'u des pha ma de dag gi rkang pa la phyag btsal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//lus can kun la bde ba'i phyir//bdag ni byang chub rab zhugs
366b2(mdo sde): gyis//khyed kyang legs par gnas par gyis//dal 'byor shin tu dkon pa'o//sangs rgyas sku ni 'bar ba dang //mtshan dag gis kyang brgyan la ltos//ye shes kyis ni
366b3(mdo sde): pha rol phyin//byang chub de la su mi smon//de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu dkon//bdag ni khyim nas khyim med par//'di nyid du ni rab tu 'byung //khyed cag gnyis
366b4(mdo sde): kyis gnang bar mdzod//pha dang mas smras pa/bdag cag gnyis ni khyod 'dod kyis//byang chub rab la smon par bgyid//rab tu 'byung bar bgyi ba'i phyir//bu khyod kyi ni
366b5(mdo sde): rjes su slob//shA ri'i bu de lta ste/khye'u de dang /khye'u de'i pha ma dang /gang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i srog chags lnga brgya tsam po de dag thams cad rab tu byung ngo //
