474b2(mdo sde): theg phra la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/then pa chen po la yang dge par zhugs pa'am/sems can gzhan dag
474b3(mdo sde): rlung ste/blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyu bar 'dod pa sa nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du thanas phyug pa gcig tug par la
474b4(mdo sde): mu~M sa pa'i ltungs la btsugs te/thul mo sbyar ba btud nam chog 'di skad du skyob mang ni ma ldan pa dang /spyis mang bal ba ba dang /'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /
474b5(mdo sde): bal po che dang /lha dang /mi rnams kyi don dang /spyan pa dang /de ba'i snying du sangs rgyas btsum ldan 'das gang dag sgyur phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na dz+nyA na med pa yang ngas
474b6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nis chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba/chos kyi la ba rim ston pa/chos kyi tshul rab tu 'dzin pa dang /chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa/

475a1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par mdzad pa/nyam bag tu spyod du 'dzud pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal lo//

480b3(mdo sde): tu phab pa/chos char rab tu btang ba/chos kyi rnga rab tu brdungs pa/chos kyi rnga bo che brdungs pa/chos kyi dung bud pa/chos kyi srog shing bsgreng ba/chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad pa/
480b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par mdzad pa/nyam bag tu spyod du btsud pa gang lags pa dang /de la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa
480b5(mdo sde): 'am/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'am/de las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la'ang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog
480b6(mdo sde): gis rjes su yi rang ba nas/rjes su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rang ngo //skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten la
480b7(mdo sde): thugs brtse ba dang /skye bo phal po che dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /sman pa dang /bde ba'i slad du ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bla na med pa yang dag par
481a1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba'i bar dag gang lags pa dang /de la nyan thos kyi theg pa
481a2(mdo sde): pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'am/de las gzhan pa'i sems can dag dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur ba gang lags pa de dag
481a3(mdo sde): thams cad la'ang rjes su yi rang ba mchog gis rjes su yi rang ba nas rjes su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rang ngo //skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /
481a4(mdo sde): skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /skye bo phal po che dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /sman pa dang /bde ba'i slad du da ltar na phyogs bcu'i 'jig
481a5(mdo sde): rton na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/chos kyi
481a6(mdo sde): 'khor lo rab tu ston pa/chos kyi tshul rab tu 'dzin pa/chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa/chos kyi char rab tu gtong ba/chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa/chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad
481a7(mdo sde): pa/chos kyi rnga rdung ba/chos kyi rnga bo che rdung ba/chos kyi dung 'bud pa/chos kyi srog shing sgreng ba/sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par mdzad pa/nyam bag tu
481b1(mdo sde): spyod du 'dzud pa gang lags pa dang /de la nyan thos kyi thag pa pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba 'am/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'am/de las gzhan pa'i sems can dag
481b2(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtse ba bskyed pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la'ang rjes su yi rang ba mchog gis rjes su yi rang ba nas rjes su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rang
481b3(mdo sde): zhes brjod par bya'o//shA ri'i bu 'di ni rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po'o//rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'dis
481b4(mdo sde): rjes su yi rang ni bsod nams kyi phung po mang po grangs med/dpag tu med pa skyed do//shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can nam/'jig rten
481b5(mdo sde): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa zag pa zad par gyur la/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang lnga la zhig gis de dag la ji
481b6(mdo sde): srid 'tsho'i bar du gos da //zas dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas pabs gang zhig rjes su yi rang ba 'dis rjes su yi rang na de ni de byas bsod
481b7(mdo sde): nams ches mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa skyed do//shA ri'i bu de bas na rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tsha
482a1(mdo sde): rgyu bar 'dod pas rjes su yi rang ba 'dis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o//bud med skyeb pa'i dbang po thob par 'dod cing bud med kyi dbang po rjes par 'dod pas
482a2(mdo sde): kyang rjes su yi rung ba 'dis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal po dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
482a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ba dang /da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos
482a4(mdo sde): pa skyed par 'gyur ba'i bskol ba'i phung po bshad du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
482a5(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/theg
482a6(mdo sde): pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas
482a7(mdo sde): nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzur la pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad du sangs rgyas bcom
482b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga dag da ltar na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag la phyag 'tshal la/
482b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag btsal nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bskul gyis/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis skye bo mong pol snyan pa dang /
482b3(mdo sde): spyiskyeb+h+yo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten lo thugs brtse ba dang /skye bo phal po che dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /smon pa dang /bde ba'i slad du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor sna
482b4(mdo sde): gsol/chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bstan du gsol/chos kyi tshul rab tu bzung du gsol/chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa gzung du gsol/chos kyi ston ma 'bar bar mdzad du gsol/
482b5(mdo sde): chos kyi char dbab tu gastsol/chos kyi rnga brjing du gusaso/chos kyi bo che brdung du gsil/chos kyi drung bung du gsal/chos kyi srog shing bstung du gsol zhes brjod par b+ha/
482b6(mdo sde): shwA ri'i bu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mnyan thos kyi thig pa li yad dag par zhugs pa'am/r-ing sangs rgyas zlog pa layang dge par zhugs pa'am/theg po chen pa
482b7(mdo sde): la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du blagos phrag pa gcig tu gzar la pus ma g.yas pa'i lhungs la bcugs
483a1(mdo sde): te/thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na tshe'i 'du byed gtong ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
483a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag phyag btsal nas gsol ba 'debs kyis/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag skye bo mang po la
483a3(mdo sde): sman pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /skye bo phal po che dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /sman pa dang /bde ba'i slad du chos kyi 'khor
483a4(mdo sde): lo ni rab tu bskor/chos kyi sgron me ni 'bar bar mdzad/chos kyi char ni rab tu 'bebs/chos kyi char ni rab tu gtong /chos kyi rnga ni rab tu rdung /chos kyi rnga bo che ni rab tu
483a5(mdo sde): rdung /chos kyi dung ni rab tu 'bud/chos kyi srog shing ni rab tu bsgreng /chos kyi sgron ma ni mched par mdzad/sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas ni tshim par mdzad//
483a6(mdo sde): nyam bag tu spyod du ni 'dzud cing re shig bzhugs su gsol/gsol ba btab pa'i phung po 'di 'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ji ltar
483a7(mdo sde): na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de bzhin du 'di ltar yongs su bsngo'o zhes brjod par bya'o//shA ri'i bu 'di ni gsol ba gdab pa'i phung po ste//
483b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gsol ba btab pa'i phung po 'dis gsol ba 'debs na/bsod nams mang po grangs med dpag tu med pa skyed do//shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/
483b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul ba
483b3(mdo sde): phul ba bas/gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar bskul na de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du grangs meng dpag tu med pa skyed do//shA ri'i bu stong
483b4(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lta zhog ste/shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am//rigs kyi bu mo
483b5(mdo sde): la la zhig gis rin po sna bdun gyis bkang ste/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul ba phul ba byas/gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la gsol ba btab na ni de bas
483b6(mdo sde): bsod nams ches mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa skyed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos
483b7(mdo sde): kyi 'khor lo skor bar gsol ba btab ste/dge ba'i rtsa bo des na nga la lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /
484a1(mdo sde): skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /skye bo phal po che dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /sman pa dang /badre ba'i slad du chos
484a2(mdo sde): kyi 'khor lho rab tu bskor bar gsol zhes chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gsol ba btab po/shA ri'i bu ngas sngon byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na de bzhin gshegs pa
484a3(mdo sde): rnams la ring du bzhugs par gsol te/dge ba'i rtsa ba des na nga mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
484a4(mdo sde): bco brgyad dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa thob ste/nga'i dam pa'i chos kyang
484a5(mdo sde): yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
484a6(mdo sde): 'das rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/thig pa
484a7(mdo sde): chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal
484b1(mdo sde): bas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du dgu ba'i rgyu ba rnams ji ltar yongs su bsngo bar bgyi/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis na
484b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi
484b3(mdo sde): theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
484b4(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas nyin lan gsum du mtshan lan gsum du tshig 'di skad ces thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis par 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe bdag gis
484b5(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus bgyis par gyur pa/sangs rgyas sam/chos sam/dge 'dun nam/gang zag gam/tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba rnams sam/sems
484b6(mdo sde): can dag la'ang rung ste/zan chang gcig tsam sprul bar gyur po dang /'chags pa gang lags pa dang /gsol ba gdab pa gang lags pa dang /skyabs su mchi ba gang lags
484b7(mdo sde): pa dang /bslab pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /so sor 'chags pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba lags pa dang /rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i
485a1(mdo sde): bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po gang lags pa dang /gsol ba gdab pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus
485a2(mdo sde): gzhal bzlums te/sems dul zhing rnam par grol ba dang /bzung ba ma mchis pas sems can thams cad la stsal to//ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems cani
485a3(mdo sde): thams cad la gtang bar bgyi ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi chags pa mi mnga' bas ji ltar mkhyen pa de lta bu sa bdag gis dge
485a4(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba btang ngo //sems can thams cad lag na rin po che dang ldan par gyur cig/nam mkha'i mdzod dang longs spyod zad mi shes pa dang /bsod nams zad mi
485a5(mdo sde): shes pa dang /chos zad mi shes pa dang /ye shes zad mi shes pa dang /spobs pa zang mi shes pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
485a6(mdo sde): par byang chub pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par gyur cig/bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can thams cad la stsal pa las byung po'i bsod nams gang yin
485a7(mdo sde): pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus gzhal bzlums te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o//dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang sems can
485b1(mdo sde): thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ji ltar sngon gyi byang
485b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du
485b3(mdo sde): bdag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo'o//dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang /sems can thams cad
485b4(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus
485b5(mdo sde): kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur
485b6(mdo sde): ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi bo'i slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo'o//dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang /sems can thams
485b7(mdo sde): cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ji ltar da lta na da ltar byung
486a1(mdo sde): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
486a2(mdo sde): yongs su sngo ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo'o//dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang sems/
486a3(mdo sde): can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ji ltar
486a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs te/sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dri ma med pa shin tu dkar ba la
486a5(mdo sde): bzhugs nas bdud sdig can bcom ste//shes par bgyi ba dang /blta bar bgyi ba dang /rtogs par bgyi ba dang /mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bgyi ba gang ci'ang
486a6(mdo sde): rung ste/de thams cad nam gyi tho rengs skya reng 'char kar skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bdud rtsi brnyes te/'chi ba med par 'gro ba'i lam mngon par rdzogs par
486a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas pa de bzhin du bdag dang sems can thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/thams cad
486b1(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag myed dang /'od mchog dang /'od dge dang /bsod nams 'od dang /mi 'khrugs pa
486b2(mdo sde): dang /seng ge dang /'od zer brgya pa dang /'od zer mtho dang /'od dra ba can dang /rin chen 'od 'phro dang /'od 'bar dang /snang ba'i rgyal po dang /shin tu brgyan dang /rin chen
486b3(mdo sde): tog dang /chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang /yan lag mchog de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan
486b4(mdo sde): dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji tsam du skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten la thugs brtse
486b5(mdo sde): bdang /skye bo phal po che dang /lha dang /mi rnams kyi don dang /sman pa dang /bde ba'i slad du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba de bzhin du bdog dang /sems can thams cad kyang bla na med
486b6(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzon par sangs rgyas nas skye bo mang po la smin pa dang /skye bo mang po la byede ba dang /'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /skye bo phal po che dang /
486b7(mdo sde): lha dang /mi rnams kyi don dang /sman pa dang /bde ba'i slad du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar shog cig ces brjod par bya'o//shA ri'i bu 'di ni yongs su bsngo bo'i phung po ste/bsod
487a1(mdo sde): nams kyi phung po sngam pas yongs su bsngo ba'i phung po 'di'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas dpe'i bar du'ang nye bar mi bzod do//shA ri'i bu rigs
487a2(mdo sde): kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shig mdo 'dri len tAm/kun chub par byed dam/'dzin tam/klog bam/gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na de ni bsod
487a3(mdo sde): nams kyi phung po ches mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa skyed do//shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med/
487a4(mdo sde): par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob nas kyang rang byang chub thob par gyur te/de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig
487a5(mdo sde): gis sti stang dang /phu dud du bya ba'i phyir gos dang /zas dang /malo cha dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad rnams kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur
487a6(mdo sde): bya sa te/rim gro bya ba lan cig cing yang rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsam gyi rin po che rnams yongs su zad par byas la/yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang de dag gi mchod
487a7(mdo sde): rten rin po che sna bdun te/gser dang /dngul dang /mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /shel dang /spug dang /mu tog dmar po las 'phang du dpag tshad bcu
487b1(mdo sde): pabyas te/de dag la gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /ba dan phra mo rnams kyis mchod pa byas na shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am/
487b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so//bcom ldan
487b3(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang mang 'dzin tam/kun chub par byed dam/'don par byed dam/klog gam/sku bye
487b4(mdo sde): mang po lnga yang dag par rab tu ston tam+b+ha/bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'dibs na de ni de bas bsod nams chos med du spyad de/bsod
487b5(mdo sde): nams kyi phung po snga mas bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas dpe'i bar du'ang mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ro'i bu 'di ltar rigs
